story:
Hello world! My name is Caleb Green, and I'm a musician and aspiring audio engineer here in the city of Boston, Massachusetts.

Music has always been one of the most important aspects of my life. From the very beginning music and art have been a medium to express emotions and feelings I felt I could not communicate with normal language. My father put a guitar in my hands at a very early age, and since then I haven't looked back. The feeling I get when playing and listening to music is like nothing else I've ever experienced. It's my passion. In college I studied audio, but the program lacked the hands-on experience I needed. I searched far and wide for other educational programs to help me take my passion for audio to the next level, and that's when I found Plaid Dog Recording's Apprentice Program.

This IndieGoGo campaign is the final step toward gaining the skills I need to pursue that dream career -- and with your help, I know I can make this a reality.

This campaign is raising funds for my apprenticeship at Plaid Dog Recording, where I would be learning from and working with Bryan Fennelly, a fantastic Boston-based producer and engineer that works with both established and up-and-coming musicians.

​One of the things I'm most excited about is just how hands-on this program would be, which is the quickest, best way to learn this trade. Bryan will not just be helping me learn to produce and engineer in a state-of-the-art studio; he'll be helping me build my portfolio by creating my first professionally recorded single. Having this as part of my resume would be a game changer for me, creating bigger and better opportunities for employment once I complete this program.

While I've had a lot of experience in the classroom, my college program hasn't given me the hands on experience I really need to grow. This apprenticeship would include the following components to help me enter the working world as an audio professional:

1. One-on-one training workshops: Plaid Dog's training program consists of 20 comprehensive lessons taught in one-on-one workshops, which keeps this personal, tailored to me, and hands-on. This is where I get to work with Bryan and Plaid Dog's knowledgeable engineering staff and really hone my skills on a variety of important topics.
2. Assisting on real recording sessions: I might be most excited about this part! Perhaps the coolest thing about this apprenticeship is that Plaid Dog puts me to work straight away when I start the program -- and, I GET PAID for my time assisting on sessions, which means from day 1, I get to put "Plaid Dog Assistant" on my resume. How cool is that? This is exactly what I need to start my career.
3. Hands-on recording labs: This is where I get hands-on opportunities with Plaid Dog's awesome resources, and get to work with actual bands to practice my recording skills. I can't stress how huge this is -- with audio, things don't fully click until you can apply this stuff with your own hands in a real setting.


And what will you get for your generosity and support? So many awesome things!

I'm so appreciative and grateful for any support you can lend to this campaign. In exchange for your generosity, I've put together a really exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign. 

Check out some examples below and a full list to the right!


It's hard to express how much this project would change my life.

I've always wanted to bring my music to life and share it with as many people as possible. To that end, recording myself and other artists has been the dream, and now I feel like I have the nerve and opportunity to really make it happen.

With this opportunity, I'll have the newfound skills and resources to make high quality recordings of my own music and release new songs as they’re written. On top of that, it unlocks the door to laying the groundwork for starting my own studio someday along with future collaboration with a whole world of musicians and recording spaces. Lastly, given the understanding on how to run studio sessions, I'll be able to contribute knowledge and advice on songwriting and performance to my fellow artists, and get chances to play as a session musician.

This will be one of the biggest professional undertakings I've made to advance my career in music. Through all my years of studying performance, this is the biggest opportunity I’ve had to bring every aspect of my studies to one place. I get to bring my study of performance, audio, and music business to this project and campaign. Most importantly, I am bringing all of my varied experience together into something sustainable that my friends and family can be a part of.

If you're ready to contribute, just click the pink "Back It" button on the top right of this page! Every little bit counts, and I'm so grateful for all your support.

If you have people in your network that would be interested in supporting us, please help get the word out and make some noise for me! There are social media share buttons on this page, and please tell your friends how grateful I am for this support.

Thank you so much for checking out my campaign page. I can't wait to have an amazing experience in this multi-faceted and unique recording studio thanks to your help!

 

Special thanks to the talented Ariel Diorio for the professional photos!!!

Check her out here: http://arielsdiorio.wixsite.com/ariel-diorio

story:
Introducing: The HiFi Console

The first affordable modern day stereo console with good looks and great sound. Built to be the focal point of any living space.

 ___

(Press Kit)

___

- As Featured in - 

Using the console

The HiFi Console is very easy to use, simply plug in the power cord and flip the switch to "on". You’re able to then connect wirelessly via Bluetooth or through one of the audio-in connections.

Design & Audio

Here at Department, design is our main focus and we made the HiFi Console for the music listener as well as the furniture enthusiast. Our inspirations stem from the simplicity of furniture design in the 1950’s and 60s. Personalize your console by selecting the finish / color combinations that best suit your space.

______

Department is teaming up with an experienced audio engineer to help develop the sound and function of the HiFi Console. Working closely with an audio specialist ensures the best quality sound at an affordable price.

______

Storage:

Details & Specs:

For stability and damping the HiFi Console is made from select hardwood solids with thin layers of MDF, offering excellent sound reproduction. Genuine Walnut and Maple veneers are hand sanded and sprayed, with environmentally friendly water-based stains & topcoat for a smooth finish.

Dimensions: L48"x D16" x H25" 

Current Setup: 

- 100 watt Class D Stereo Amplifier 

- 6” Aluminum/Magnesium driver 

- 1” titanium dome tweeter 

- Bluetooth 4.0 APT-X Music Streaming

- RCA inputs 


Why a crowdfunding campaign?

We will be retooling our workshop to improve our efficiency as well as be able to handle larger production schedules. The funds will also be used to upgrade the final audio system, to further improve the sound quality. As we grow we will hire on employees with woodworking experience to help with production. Creating jobs in our local area is as important to us as is the quality of our products. We are excited to be a part of the movement to bring manufacturing back to the USA. We're almost to the finish line...all we need is you!

Estimated Timeline:

April / May   - Kickstarter is live

June / July   - Retool our workshop 

June / Aug.  - Order all audio components 

Sept.            - Begin construction 

Oct. / Nov.    - Start Shipping

*These are just estimates for potential construction dates as well as shipping dates. These dates may change. We will keep everyone updated as we progress!

Kickstarter special:

Each HiFi Console will ship with anti-vibration feet.

**When placing your turntable on the HiFi Console, we recommend using anti-vibration feet. This will greatly reduce vibrations resonating into the needle. **

What you get:

Shipping:

The shipping price includes all packaging, insurance, cost of delivery, etc.

Are you in the Chicago area? Free shipping for Chicago and surrounding area customers!Shipping price will be refunded for local buyers. 

Currently we are unable to ship internationally, but are looking into shipping our consoles around the world! 

*Ships to US Only - We are not able to ship to international locations, U.S. territories, Alaska & Hawaii

Follow us on Instagram & Twitter: 

@deptchicago | @deptaudio 

Get updates on future products, deals, availability, etc

Sign-up for our mailing list: HERE

_____

Special Thanks:

Elaine Ho

Masha Safina

Mark Perkins 

Philip Dembinski

Meredith Overmyer

Zack Limbaugh 

Music by: Alexander Search "I'm all in"

This campaign would not be possible with out the help of these amazing people!

story:
Ditoo is a product with a fusion design concept between vintage PC and classic arcade machine. Underneath its retro appearance, Ditoo is a well-tuned Bluetooth speaker, a customizable smart alarm, and a platform for the pixel art enthusiasts to rejoice. Thanks to its mobile companion APP, Ditoo offers over 30 different functions, and it will continue to evolve beyond your imagination.

Really appreciated our previous backer's sincere support!

We couldn't reach this far without you!

 

 

Ditoo comes with a small and retro body but delivers the optimal sound that fills up any places. It's standard with 10W DSP Digital Amplified Audio, Dual Passive Design. 

 

With over 13 years of professional audio-tuning experience, this compact-sized speaker delivers incredibly crisp and clear sound, even at full volume.

You can also insert it with a TF-Card, and enjoy the favorite music without the Internet.

 

 

With five years of effort, we successfully built one of the largest pixel art communities in the world. From award-winning artists like Mr.Dotman/Eboy to professional pixel game developers, user can share and inspire others with their awesome creations! This is a heaven for all the pixel art enthusiasts in the world.

 

 

You can find pixel art everywhere in your life. From the Pacman to the walking figure on the crossroad sign, pixel art is just part of our life. 

 

Equipped with 256 programmable LED, Ditoo is capable of displaying 16 million colors, and we chose the iconic 16x16 pixel size as the Ditoo display foundation. With various drawing tools, you can make any pixel art design and show them on the Ditoo. You can even convert pictures into a pixel GIF, which makes Ditoo your most unique desktop ornament ever.

 

 

Scan the QR code and try the Divoom Smart APP. 

 

 

 

It's your faithful personal assistant! Ditoo provides a visual notification for the incoming message, in case of your phone is in silent mode. And that is just one of Ditoo's many daily functions, which includes: alarm, sleep aid, daily planners, anniversary reminder, and more... 

All of its useful utilities will help you to make your day perfect!

You can get notified with your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Line, and more message on it.

 

Or set up a timer for brushing, reading, working, yoga... 

 

 

Your best entertainment companion is here - Other than its 50000+ Internet radio stations, you can enjoy the classic mini-games like Tetris, Slot machine, Dice, Snake...

You can also remix and record your favorite songs with 96 DJ sound effects & 23 unique instruments.

With Ditoo, you will never run out of FUN!

 


 

Ditoo also comes with five different colors and a fancy packing box which can be used as a gift box.

If you are looking for a Christmas gift for your beloved one, look no further; Ditoo is your perfect gift for any special occasion.

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks for the YouTubers giving us the honest review!

 

 

 

 

How to use...

 

 

Established in 2006, Divoom was formed by a team of music enthusiasts that absolutely loves playing around with speakers. Over the last 12 years, the Divoom team introduced numerous iconic portable speakers to the market. However, they’re always striving to take their work to the next level.

Back in 2014, Terry, the founder of Divoom, came across several interesting LED gadgets in the San Francisco Maker's Faire, which utilized the SD card loading image on LED. At that time, there were barely any LED speakers on the market, so he saw an opportunity. In turn, Terry came up with the idea of LEDs in the form of pixel art.

story:
Mantas True Wireless Earbuds

The Mantas stream wireless audio from your phone, computer, tablet, and just about any other Bluetooth device. These are True Wireless earbuds so there are no cables anywhere. Our athlete-inspired design and engineering have enabled perfect sound, sweat resistance, and an ultra-light, super comfortable, no-slip fit. The 12-hour playtime gives you plenty of time for your workout, bike ride, or run.

Incredible Features at an Unbeatable Price

We are bringing True Wireless earbuds to the masses. Our Mantas will outperform similar products at a fraction of what they cost.

What Does the Press Think?

The press loves our products and so do our customers. Check out what has been said about us and the products we create.

 

High-Performance Never Fall Out, No-Slip Fit

The Mantas are here to revolutionize your hike, workout, bike ride, and all your other activities. We made the Mantas for athletes but kept the cost down because not everyone is sponsored. These earbuds are completely wireless; there are no wires to hold you back. The secure-fit ear hooks make sure the Mantas stay put when doing what you do. We threw in multiple ear tip options for extended comfort. These lightweight earbuds are built for performance, with sweat and water resistance, so the Mantas can handle your workout. With up to 12 hours of playtime and powerful sound, you’ll always have your music or podcast to motivate you.

 

 

Pro Sound for Pro Athletes

We listened to professional athletes and amateurs alike in order to create True Wireless earbuds that can stand up to the toughest workouts. Our research tells us that the sound has to be amazing, the earbuds have to be comfortable, they have to look good, and function in the toughest conditions. You want everything, no compromises, so that’s what we created. We made sure that the Mantas audio is powerful and balanced with enhanced clarity and superior dynamic range. The Mantas sound amazing.

 

 

One Earbud or Two, The Choice is Yours

With the Mantas, you can use both earbuds for stereo sound or use one earbud for mono sound. Right, left, or both, enjoy 100% control over your audio and how you listen to it. In certain situations, it can be dangerous to have two earbuds in. When riding a road bike, you want to keep the ear that is closest to the cars open. When hitting some downhill trails on your mountain bike, you should keep an ear open to listen for wildlife and anyone that might be “on your left”. Whatever the application is, staying aware and being safe is important. For safety reasons, some state and local laws prohibit the use of headsets when operating a bicycle. So you should only use the Mantas for off-highway activities and do not use the Mantas at excessive volumes because it may cause permanent hearing damage.

 

 

Enough Power for the Whole Day

Wake up and run while listening to music. Commute to work listening to a podcast. Conference call during lunch. Hit the gym in the evening. The 12-hour playtime will get you through your busy, active day. If you forget to charge the Mantas at night, just plug in any micro USB cable to get full power in about an hour and a half. We also include a two-in-one split micro USB charging cable that enables you to charge both earbuds at the same time. That way you can spend less time worrying about powering up and more time powering ahead.

 

Personal Assistants Are A Tap Away

Getting a hold of your favorite personal assistant (Siri or Google) is just a few taps away. Just tap the left earbud 3 times and ask away. Have a text read to you, set some reminders, or make a call. All while your phone is tucked away.

 

Stable Consistent Wireless That Works

The Mantas use a premium Class 1 Bluetooth 5 chip for maximum wireless stability. The high-performance frequency range makes sure they stay connected as you and your world keep moving. 

 

The Perks

Get up to 55% off of the retail price. This is the only time you will ever see the Mantas or Mini Rhinos at this discount.

 

 

 

Guaranteed Delivery

We have delivered on over 5 crowdfunding projects in the past. We know how this works and how to deliver products to our supporters. We want you to get an amazing deal on the perfect True Wireless earbud. The Mantas True Wireless earbuds are ready right now. The product is fully functioning, the packaging is designed, and the product manual is complete. The Mantas are already in production. We will ship them to you as soon as they are ready.

Bonus: The Mini Rhinos

As a special offer to the Indiegogo crowd, we are also giving you a chance to get another brand new product. The Mini Rhinos are rugged water-resistant Bluetooth Headphones. They come with some amazing features as well.

  • 12 Hour Playtime
  • IPX6 Water-resistant
  • Built-in Microphone
  • Flexible Headband
  • 40mm Drivers
  • Amazing Sound Quality
 

 

JUST ADDED: The Ultimate Party Pack!

To celebrate the success of our campaign, we just added the Ultimate Party Pack as a perk. Now you can get a Turtle Shell 3.0, a Kodiak Mini, and a Calamari Ultra at a special Indiegogo Price.

Turtle Shell 3.0 Features:

  • Audiophile-quality sound.
  • Fully IPX7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker.
  • It floats, so no turtle overboard drills necessary.
  • High capacity 20-hour rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery.
  • The 3600 mAh capacity, 5 volt, 1amp out Power Bank charges your small electronics.
  • Patented Dual-Directional Sound™ so it can lay flat and fill the room or sit on its side and jam in your face.
  • Built-in microphone for calls and quizzing Siri or Cortana.
  • Standard 1/4"-40 camera threading & custom strap mounts for multiple mounting options.
  • 3.5 mm audio-in (& out) port in case you are still rocking a Walkman.
  • PLAYTIME: 20 hours.
  • WIRELESS RANGE: 32 feet.
  • INCLUDED: USB charging cable, 3.5mm to 3.5mm cable, signature ODT carry pouch and user manual.

Kodiak Mini Features:

  • Rechargeable 2600 mAh lithium-ion battery.
  • Super portable and lightweight making it the perfect travel accessory for your power-hungry life.
  • Universal USB port with 1.0 amp output charges most all of your small electronics, from your GoPro® to your smartphone.
  • Indicator LED informs you when it is actively charging.
  • Shock, dust, and water-resistant.
  • WEIGHT: 3.104 ounces.
  • SIZE: 3 x 1.25 x 4 inches.

Calamari Ultra

  • 3 connectors in one cable.
  • Apple MFI Certified Lightning connector.
  • USB C connector.
  • Micro USB connector.
  • About 3 feet long.
  • Can be used for charging devices or data transfer.

 

Who is Outdoor Tech?

The purpose of Outdoor Tech is to address the burning desire and need to be active in the age of mobile technology with the drive to be outdoors. It's in our DNA, it's our modus operandi that motivates every idea, every product we design and develop. We are a small team of diverse people in Southern California. The best isn't good enough, that's why we created the Mantas True Wireless earbuds.

 

Why Do We Need Your Help?

We have invested a huge amount of our resources into the development of the Mantas True Wireless earbuds. Bringing the perfect solution from idea to a physical product is time-consuming and extremely costly. We have done everything to make this product a reality but we just need a little more help to actualize the dream. So we are turning to the wonderful crowdfunding community to be our partners in this venture.

 

No Risks

We have taken all the risks and can't wait to deliver this amazing new product to you.

The Mantas stream wireless audio from your phone, computer, tablet, and just about any other Bluetooth device. These are True Wireless earbuds so there are no cables anywhere. Our athlete-inspired design and engineering have enabled perfect sound, sweat resistance, and an ultra-light, super comfortable, no-slip fit. The 12-hour playtime gives you plenty of time for your workout, bike ride, or run.

Incredible Features at an Unbeatable Price
We are bringing True Wireless earbuds to the masses. Our Mantas will outperform similar products at a fraction of what they cost.

What Does the Press Think?
The press loves our products and so do our customers. Check out what has been said about us and the products we create.



 
High-Performance Never Fall Out, No-Slip Fit
The Mantas are here to revolutionize your hike, workout, bike ride, and all your other activities. We made the Mantas for athletes but kept the cost down because not everyone is sponsored. These earbuds are completely wireless; there are no wires to hold you back. The secure-fit ear hooks make sure the Mantas stay put when doing what you do. We threw in multiple ear tip options for extended comfort. These lightweight earbuds are built for performance, with sweat and water resistance, so the Mantas can handle your workout. With up to 12 hours of playtime and powerful sound, you’ll always have your music or podcast to motivate you.
 

 
Pro Sound for Pro Athletes
We listened to professional athletes and amateurs alike in order to create True Wireless earbuds that can stand up to the toughest workouts. Our research tells us that the sound has to be amazing, the earbuds have to be comfortable, they have to look good, and function in the toughest conditions. You want everything, no compromises, so that’s what we created. We made sure that the Mantas audio is powerful and balanced with enhanced clarity and superior dynamic range. The Mantas sound amazing.
 

 
One Earbud or Two, The Choice is Yours
With the Mantas, you can use both earbuds for stereo sound or use one earbud for mono sound. Right, left, or both, enjoy 100% control over your audio and how you listen to it. In certain situations, it can be dangerous to have two earbuds in. When riding a road bike, you want to keep the ear that is closest to the cars open. When hitting some downhill trails on your mountain bike, you should keep an ear open to listen for wildlife and anyone that might be “on your left”. Whatever the application is, staying aware and being safe is important. For safety reasons, some state and local laws prohibit the use of headsets when operating a bicycle. So you should only use the Mantas for off-highway activities and do not use the Mantas at excessive volumes because it may cause permanent hearing damage.
 

 
Enough Power for the Whole Day
Wake up and run while listening to music. Commute to work listening to a podcast. Conference call during lunch. Hit the gym in the evening. The 12-hour playtime will get you through your busy, active day. If you forget to charge the Mantas at night, just plug in any micro USB cable to get full power in about an hour and a half. We also include a two-in-one split micro USB charging cable that enables you to charge both earbuds at the same time. That way you can spend less time worrying about powering up and more time powering ahead.
 
Personal Assistants Are A Tap Away
Getting a hold of your favorite personal assistant (Siri or Google) is just a few taps away. Just tap the left earbud 3 times and ask away. Have a text read to you, set some reminders, or make a call. All while your phone is tucked away.

 
Stable Consistent Wireless That Works
The Mantas use a premium Class 1 Bluetooth 5 chip for maximum wireless stability. The high-performance frequency range makes sure they stay connected as you and your world keep moving. 
 
The Perks
Get up to 55% off of the retail price. This is the only time you will ever see the Mantas or Mini Rhinos at this discount.

 

 

 

Guaranteed Delivery
We have delivered on over 5 crowdfunding projects in the past. We know how this works and how to deliver products to our supporters. We want you to get an amazing deal on the perfect True Wireless earbud. The Mantas True Wireless earbuds are ready right now. The product is fully functioning, the packaging is designed, and the product manual is complete. The Mantas are already in production. We will ship them to you as soon as they are ready.

Bonus: The Mini Rhinos
As a special offer to the Indiegogo crowd, we are also giving you a chance to get another brand new product. The Mini Rhinos are rugged water-resistant Bluetooth Headphones. They come with some amazing features as well.

12 Hour Playtime
IPX6 Water-resistant
Built-in Microphone
Flexible Headband
40mm Drivers
Amazing Sound Quality

 


 
JUST ADDED: The Ultimate Party Pack!
To celebrate the success of our campaign, we just added the Ultimate Party Pack as a perk. Now you can get a Turtle Shell 3.0, a Kodiak Mini, and a Calamari Ultra at a special Indiegogo Price.

Turtle Shell 3.0 Features:

Audiophile-quality sound.
Fully IPX7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker.
It floats, so no turtle overboard drills necessary.
High capacity 20-hour rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery.
The 3600 mAh capacity, 5 volt, 1amp out Power Bank charges your small electronics.
Patented Dual-Directional Sound™ so it can lay flat and fill the room or sit on its side and jam in your face.
Built-in microphone for calls and quizzing Siri or Cortana.
Standard 1/4"-40 camera threading & custom strap mounts for multiple mounting options.
3.5 mm audio-in (& out) port in case you are still rocking a Walkman.
PLAYTIME: 20 hours.
WIRELESS RANGE: 32 feet.
INCLUDED: USB charging cable, 3.5mm to 3.5mm cable, signature ODT carry pouch and user manual.

Kodiak Mini Features:

Rechargeable 2600 mAh lithium-ion battery.
Super portable and lightweight making it the perfect travel accessory for your power-hungry life.
Universal USB port with 1.0 amp output charges most all of your small electronics, from your GoPro® to your smartphone.
Indicator LED informs you when it is actively charging.
Shock, dust, and water-resistant.
WEIGHT: 3.104 ounces.
SIZE: 3 x 1.25 x 4 inches.

Calamari Ultra

3 connectors in one cable.
Apple MFI Certified Lightning connector.
USB C connector.
Micro USB connector.
About 3 feet long.
Can be used for charging devices or data transfer.


 
Who is Outdoor Tech?
The purpose of Outdoor Tech is to address the burning desire and need to be active in the age of mobile technology with the drive to be outdoors. It's in our DNA, it's our modus operandi that motivates every idea, every product we design and develop. We are a small team of diverse people in Southern California. The best isn't good enough, that's why we created the Mantas True Wireless earbuds.
 

Why Do We Need Your Help?
We have invested a huge amount of our resources into the development of the Mantas True Wireless earbuds. Bringing the perfect solution from idea to a physical product is time-consuming and extremely costly. We have done everything to make this product a reality but we just need a little more help to actualize the dream. So we are turning to the wonderful crowdfunding community to be our partners in this venture.
 

No Risks
We have taken all the risks and can't wait to deliver this amazing new product to you.

story:
Mars's levitating 360° sound projection reduces sound wave absorption into surfaces by levitating above the subwoofer charging station.

 

Press


"If you're after a wireless speaker that's a little less conventional, then Hong Kong-based
start-up Crazybaby might have just the thing." WHAT HI-FI?
 


"So in such a crowded field, it takes something truly innovative to rise above the rest. The Mars speaker from Crazybaby does exactly that -- literally -- thanks to levitation technology." CNET
 


"This unique disc will actually float above a sleek black subwoofer column, as though it were
hanging there by an invisible thread or magic." Ubergizmo
 


"You won't have to look to the stars to spot UFOs anymore." Softpedia
 

 

Mars by crazybaby

 

 

 

Powered by aptX

The system blends a 3¾” high-excursion subwoofer with a custom 1¾” high-sensitivity driver with a neodymium motor system. The result is a rich, high-fidelity sound that stretches from 50Hz - 20kHz. To get the most from the high-fidelity system, we’ve included aptX®, which allows for CD-quality, low latency streaming over Bluetooth.

 

 

 

Play music via Bluetooth or use the Mars app to control smart features like proximity volume and pairing multiple speakers for stereo sound.

 

 

Elevate your audio

 

 

 

Perk

 

 


 

In Progress



 

Allen demostrate the lighting System.


 

Team

 

 

Allen Zhang - Founder, Lead Designer
Pioneer of audio device design. Decades of proven expertise in product strategy, branding, and manufacturing. Delivered product solutions for large companies such as Polaroid, Skullcandy, and others.

Davis Lin - Acoustic Engineer
Lifelong acoustic engineer. 15 years of experience in designing and manufacturing high-performance analog and digital components for Audiophile. A widely sought-after consultant in the field of scientific and electro-acoustic engineering.
   

 

Summer Su - Social Media Guru
Maintains communications between the CrazyBaby Team and the wider community. Holds a masters degree in Communications from Hong Kong Baptist University. She can play the acoustic guitar.
   

Roadmap to Delivery

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

 

 

Please click the category below to find the answer to your question:

 

  1. ABOUT MARS
  2. SHIPPING
  3. TECH SPECS
  4. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
  5. ABOUT CRAZYBABY
  6. CUSTOMER SUPPORT
 
ABOUT MARS
Who is Mars made for? Anyone who loves their music and wants to make a design statement in the home or in the office.
How can magnetic levitation improve sound quality? It will avoid the resonance between the speaker and the surface it lies on, which helps to decrease the loss of acoustic fidelity.
What's in the box? · Mars Craft
· Mars Base
· Power Adapter
· Quick Start Guide
How do I control Mars? 1.You can control basic music play function with your bluetooth device.
2. Using Mars App you can control: Craft lifting & landing/ Auto Volume Control/ Multi-speaker pairing/ EQ settings/ Power saving mode, etc.
How do I set up Mars? 1. Put Mars Craft on the Mars Base.
2. Turn on by pressing the power buttons.
3. Connect Mars with your smart device via Bluetooth, then play Music.
Why should I buy a pair of Mars Speakers? · When you pair two Mars together, they will build a 2.1 stereo speaker system, which is super amazing and very rare among Bluetooth speakers.
· If there are two Mars speakers in the same room, just connect to one of them, then the other one will finishing pairing automatically. You will see more in our Quick Start Guide.
Is Mars portable? It is one of the most portable Bluetooth speakers: you can even put it into your pocket or on your bicycle frame. It is also sand & water proof to IPX7 standards.
Can I use it for phone conferencing? Mars speaker is just as comfortable in the board room.
a) The Mars has a high sensitivity electric microphone with flat frequency response, providing a better experience than mobile phones.
b) Mars has a 360-degree acoustic lens design that allows everyone at the table to hear the call clearly.
How do you make Auto Volume control possible? · The Bluetooth module inside Mars Craft will calculate the distance between itself and the connected device.
· The Mars App is necessary for this function. You can also turn it on/off or adjust volume manually via this App.
· We hope this will serve help to protect your hearing.
What colors do you offer? We offer black and white. We would love to hear your thoughts on what color to offer next!
SHIPPING
How can I choose color and modify shipping info? After 24 hours that you succussfully complete an order, please choose color and fill in shipping detail here: https://support.crazybaby.com/selectColor.jsp. You can always modify your info before shipping.
When will Mars ship? We’re planning to start shipping Mars to our crowdfunding supporters in end-March 2015, with all units delivered by end-April 2015. Actual ship dates may vary. The CrazyBaby Team will keep you updated of your Mars ship date!
Why do I have to wait so long? You're helping us to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. Mars is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce Mars.
Where do you ship? We plan to ship to all countries. We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver. If we find that we cannot ship to your county, we will work to refund you the amount minus the credit card processing fees and Indiegogo platform fees.
Can I split a bulk order into multiple shipments? Our system doesn't support shipping to multiple addresses at this point. Please make a second contribution if you would like to ship to multiple addresses. For all quesitons regarding bulk orders, please email orders@crazybaby.com and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.
Is shipping included? Shipping is free to the US, Canada, and China. For other countries, please contribute an additional $30.
Do I have to pay VAT? We will pay customs and VAT if applicable, however you are making a contribution and receiving a Mars speaker as a gift and should not have to pay VAT. 
TECH SPECS 
What functions are available on the Mars base? ·Subwoofer integrated, working together perfectly with Mars Craft for better sound
·Auto charging for Mars Craft, with magnetic levitation inside
·Working as a mass power bank with two USB ports for smart phones and tablets
Except for the levitation technology, what else do you do to improve the sound quality of Mars? ·1.75’’ ultra-thin full range horn and passive radiator inside Mars Craft, with the help of aptX® from CSR.
· The subwoofer inside Mars base provides excellent bass supplement for the Craft, generating the 1.1 HiFi sound together
· 360° surround sound design
Does Mars support Bluetooth pairing? Yes. Mars has Bluetooth 4.0 pairing.
What are the dimensions and weight of Mars? Height: Craft: 1.3" (33mm). Base Subwoofer: 7.87" (200mm).
Diameter: Craft: 4.72" (120mm). Base Subwoofer: 5.2" (132mm).
Weight: : Craft: 392 g. Base Subwoofer: 1534 g.
Technical specifications are subject to change and are intended to represent a general illustration of the product and its features.
What outputs does Mars have? 2 USB Power outlets, which can charge your smartphone and other devices.
What is the battery life? The Mars Craft will last for 8 hours of continuous playback, and the Mars Base will last 8 hours of continuous playback as well. When the Base is plugged in and the Mars Craft is paired with the base, the Craft will continue to take-off and land for endless music playback.
Will you publish results of acoustics tests? Of course we will. Some top acoustics experts have been invited to join our team to test. In the future, we shall release it on our forum.
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS 
Do I need a WiFi Network? No. You only need bluetooth 4.0 to connect your device.
Which devices are compatible with Mars? With the latest Bluetooth 4.0 module, any Bluetooth-Smart devices, such as smart phones, music players, tablets and laptops, are able to connect to Mars.
What audio inputs are supported? We focus on a sleek look, so we only offer Bluetooth audio input.
What are the power requirements? 120 - 240 VAC Power.
ABOUT CRAZYBABY 
Who created Mars? The Crazybaby core team.
Who are your investors? We are a self-funded start-up.
Who do I contact for investment opportunities? Please email investors@crazybaby.com.
How big is your team? We now have 10 team members!
 
Will Crazybaby make some cool stuff with ASR? Thank you for your support and expectation. We will keep pushing news about our new products.
Tell me more about Crazybaby in the field of audio hardware manufacture. Crazybaby is a new company, but our core technical team is very experienced and excellent. We’ve got an audio engineering veteran with over 15 years with tier 1 audio companies, a world-famous acoustic counselor, a super geek who knows almost everything, etc. What’s more, we share the same audio manufacturer with Harmon/Kardon, which provides a guarantee for our quality.
Are you hiring? We are always looking for good talent that is passionate about sound. Please send resumes, Linkedin profiles, and/or demo tracks to jobs@crazybaby.com
Who did your website, www.crazybaby.com? Who led your crowdfunding campaign? We worked closely with RainFactory on our website and crowdfunding campaign.
I’m a member of the press. Who do I contact? We encourage you to use our images and video as long as you credit CrazyBaby and link to http://www.crazybaby.com. Press assets are also available on our website. For interview requests, please email press@crazybaby.com.
CUSTOMER SUPPORT 
Is there a warranty for Mars? Of course! Mars by Crazybaby comes with a one-year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.
Can I get a refund? Pre-orders are not refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.
Is there a guaranty of delivery? Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.
I pre-ordered Mars but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status? Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com.
There was an error with my contribution. What happened? Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.
Why am I checking out through Indiegogo? We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.
How do I choose more than one perk? The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email support@crazybaby.com and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.
Bulk Orders: how can I order a larger number of units? For all bulk order inquires, please email support@crazybaby.com and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.
I don’t see my answer here. Who do I contact? We have a few team members answering emails, so please be patient with us & keep in mind that we're getting many customer support requests per day. We will get back to you ASAP. Please email support@crazybaby.com.

story:
Overview

Teracoustix is a result of countless trials and revisions by seasoned Chicago-based acoustic guitar enthusiasts binded with a common goal of providing a top-quality product that will make avid acoustic guitar owners enjoy playing their instrument to full potential. The Teracoustix was indeed a work in progress during the design phase. It took us 14 design revisions from idea conception to final prototype.  It only shows our keen and relentless work efforts in coming up with a truly one-of-a-kind product every guitar player will be proud to own. We have accomplished to have a tested working prototype of the product on March 2019, it was the exact representation of the product that we envisioned right from the beginning. Since our NAMM 2019 Trade Show in Nashville, we were able to even more improve two of the product features based from booth visitor feedbacks. First, by switching to another rubber material and second, by integrating wood veneers for a more customized option that matches the classic look of the guitar. Our next move is to venture to the production stage and distribute worldwide. It can only be made possible through our backers' contribution and valuable support in this campaign.

 

 

Six Useful Features That Make Teracoustix An Acoustic Guitar Must-Have Accessory

1. Tone Enhancer - It dampens the vibration of the top sounding board of the acoustic guitar while opening up the bass and mid voicings creating a pleasing tone-altering effect for a tighter, more focused sound ideal for playing and recording.

2. Feedback Buster - Two side air vents are pointing upward directly to the guitar player when closed to allow more of the guitar’s natural highs to come out. It prevents muffled and over- bassy sound while eliminating unwanted feedback when playing amplified.

3. Access To Soundhole Controls - After-market brands of soundhole pickup EQ and Volume controls can be accessed with ease. Some placement adjustments might be necessary.

4. As A Guitar Mute - When closed, it deadens the sound which is ideal for silent practicing.

5. As A Pick Holder  - It is the closest and quickest way to insert and access the guitar pick at an angle. A fingerstyle and picking guitarist dream when alternating between these two techniques.

6. Engravable Wood Veneer - Names, brands and band names can be engraved on 15 different wood veneer inserts.

 

What Makes This Campaign Important To Us

A successful campaign launch will tell the world what our product will deliver to the $700 million a year acoustic guitar industry. To the community of guitar players around the world, Teracoustix is introducing a discoverable new guitar voicing  allowing them to get the best out of their instrument. 

What We Need & What You Get

The completion of final product delivery to our backers on December 2020 will be the immediate goal. The valuable and generous contribution to our campaign will set us up to rock our way into the production stage, realize our stretch goals for the company,  and we will roll in fulfilling our promise to our backers. Our ultimate goal is to stay highly competitive to become a viable company in the future, focusing solely on finding new ways to diversify into more products in other categories.

More About Our Unique Perks                                                                                                                         

The rewards will be available as soon as we finish the first batch of our production. From basic black to wood veneer finish of choice of tone woods or exotic woods, you are guaranteed to receive a joy-to-use, high-quality product. Custom engraving will also be available for personalized or promotional brand purposes.  We are pleased to offer this product design to countless guitar players in the US and around the world.

 

Risks And Challenges

The Teracoustix Team will be ready to start mass production of this great guitar product as soon as we achieve our goal amount. At a minimum, it will finance the rubber and plastic toolings  and initial short production run. We can switch to a more mass-produced quantity and even make the smaller size 3.3 inch diameter version as soon as we reach the next tier of our stretch goal. 

We depend on our partnerships with Fastradius in Chicago for all our plastic and rubber injection jobs and Illinois Plastics for packaging supplies.  Ordering of our parts from our suppliers will depend on how busy their production line facilities are. If there will be an unforeseen delay, an additional two months will be the maximum estimated delay that may occur.   

Our Success, Our Backers 

All the financial contributions, picking up of rewards, or sharing in social media efforts means a lot to us, setting us up in the production roadmap. Our guitar friends in the USA and around the world will surely get big smiles in their faces the moment they get hold of our Teracoustix tone enhancing soundhole cover.  We thank our backers for providing equal opportunity to startups like us and by making Teracoustix a potential standard product in the competitive acoustic guitar accessory market. Share us to your friends in social media.
story_txt:
Overview
Teracoustix is a result of countless trials and revisions by seasoned Chicago-based acoustic guitar enthusiasts binded with a common goal of providing a top-quality product that will make avid acoustic guitar owners enjoy playing their instrument to full potential. The Teracoustix was indeed a work in progress during the design phase. It took us 14 design revisions from idea conception to final prototype.  It only shows our keen and relentless work efforts in coming up with a truly one-of-a-kind product every guitar player will be proud to own. We have accomplished to have a tested working prototype of the product on March 2019, it was the exact representation of the product that we envisioned right from the beginning. Since our NAMM 2019 Trade Show in Nashville, we were able to even more improve two of the product features based from booth visitor feedbacks. First, by switching to another rubber material and second, by integrating wood veneers for a more customized option that matches the classic look of the guitar. Our next move is to venture to the production stage and distribute worldwide. It can only be made possible through our backers' contribution and valuable support in this campaign.

story:
Introduction

 

re.corder is a new take on a traditional instrument used worldwide in schools as a simple and durable tool for music education.

By enclosing a simple but powerful electronic into a mute-able, fully acoustic wind instrument a whole world of functions opens up. 

The Kickstarter campaign is here to help us finalizing the industrialization phases of the re.corder allowing you to have an highly discounted unit! (20-25% for the standard edition!) from the final street price!

 

 

 
 

 

From enhanced school teaching, to a class re.orchestra, to an app-based virtual teacher, up to a standard MIDI controller for the  music production studio, re.corder, with is portable nature, is the instrument for everyone.

 

 

The bundled app (iOS and Android) puts several applications at your fingertips! The two UI versions (for children and for grown-up girls and boys!) put a teaching functionality, a comprehensive sound library, a multi-player (no-pun intended!) environment and a simple yet sophisticated looper to create music everywhere you are.

 

 

Some videos showing the re.corder potential. The re.corder is connected by bluetooth to the macbook. The USB cable is only for powering purposes, given that we are waiting for the custom lithium battery from the manufacturer (note of the engineering dept.!)

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

A professional player experimenting with the re.corder. Here you can see him playing it (the cable is just for powering the recorder) against several applications, from GarageBand, to Ableton Live up to playing an hardware synth (UNO Synth by IK multimedia) through the Mac used as a midi router. 

 

 

re.corder can be played in three different modes! 

 

 

  • Acoustically, with or without the application running, as a powerful and augmented instrument for the learning of music.
  • Digitally playing the re.corder (you can mute it with the supplied mute-plug) silently and using the sounds of the app's library, alone or with up to three other friends! This will allow you to to practice everywhere, day and night, without annoying anyone!
  • Using the re.corder as a powerful MIDI wind instrument controller. There will be also a future direct "re.corder to analog CV/GATE/ wired MIDI interface" for the musicians that already owns a modular synthesizer!!

 

 

 

 

Soundmachines will produce a dedicated module that can integrate the recorder into a modular synthesizer, without resorting to a PC/Mac to do the routing job. Contact the manufacturer (www.sound-machines.it) directly to know more about the re.ceiver!

 

 

Inside the re.corder there is a set of technologies that works smartly and silently to achieve the functions that allows you to feel a real instrument in your hands and a powerful controller when linked to an application or a software. Please check the following infographic:

 

The breath sensor is an high performance pressure sensing device, that can measure the strength of your blow, and transform this information into an expression parameter. This is used by the app, and most softwares, as a modifier for modulation or other sound characteristics. The mouthpiece of the re.corder can also sense your lips, understanding when you really want to play or not!

Under every note hole there's a single or dual touch sensor that detect your finger and the note that you want to play. The software can be modified to swap fingering styles or to allow impaired mobility players to have their own custom fingering map.

We didn't left out anything and in fact, to allow extreme expressivity and many other applications, we implemented an inertial platform with a 3D accelerometer MEMS. This sensor is capable of interpreting the movement and the attitude of the product, opening the possibility of modifying the sound following the player's gestures.

Under the hood, there is a powerful MCU that reads the sensors and manages the quick BLE connectivity with the app or the host computer and software. Everything runs for several hours on battery, easily rechargeable with the standard microUSB connector. When out of juice and in desperate need to play, just connect your power bank and the re.corder will recharge itself while allowing you to play without any problems!

 

 

We thought about playing the re.corder on the bus and train, in bed and in many other situation where you don't want to annoy anyone! The re.corder comes with a mute plug (that can be linked, for safety, to the ring on the bottom) that works without changing much of the air resistance that you have when playing it acoustically.

 

The app will be available both for iOS and Android. The app will have two different, selectable, appearances; the first particularly suited for children and the second one more oriented to young adults and musicians!

 

The following functionality pictures shows some beta graphic pages (children version).  While all present in the delivery versions of the app, we reserve the right to change appearance and workflow of the functionalities to conjugate user-friendliness, platform-specific aspects and processing power.

 

 

 

 

One of the key points in the creation process of the re.corder has been the potential aid to special persons. Having the possibility to play something even with less than ideal execution, lack of breathing capabilities, impaired mobility or simply shifting the output frequency in the low range to suit deaf and blind-deaf persons, is equally important to us as to provide a fun and productive approach to music to the ones that doesn't have to deal with those limitations! Our vision, having the opportunity of developing something completely new,  is to be able to give this 'something' to EVERYONE.

 

We ran a survey on the pre-launch pages and many people had the opportunity to indicate the preferred colors in a group of 8. As the campaign evolves, we will send out few more information on color bundles and other option!

EXTENDED REWARDS:

Printed Pattern Recorders! When we will reach 100.000€ this reward will appear. You can obviously upgrade from the standard re.corder! We will have a poll to define which patterns/motives will be printed. 

 

 

 

As with any product, re.corder was born as a cluster of ideas, targets and technologies that were embodied in several prototypes. The next pictures will show you small glimpse of the steps we took to make the re.corder a reality!

The first pic is what we dubbed the 'Ugly Duck'. A commercial recorder where we tested technologies in order to understand the feasibility of the product! Guess what the verdict have been? Well, in the last two years many other studies have been made and patents covering key aspects of the product have been deposited worldwide!

 

The following was a first conceptualization of the electronic board of the re.corder, on which a first fully working prototype was manufactured. Still few optimizations to do, until the Kickstarter proto surfaced later this year. 

The Kickstarter version of the product is already a fully working, refined mechanical and electronic prototype. Starting from this, we will put in place concept and design for manufacturing approaches. Key points are sound quality, robustness, easy of manufacturing and compatibility with mobile and desktop platforms

 

There are many activities behind a complex product, especially one that includes both hardware, software and a real-sounding musical instrument! 

 
 

Behind re.corder and the company Artinoise, lies a compound industrial expertise that sums up to more than 80 man-years.  Electronic, firmware and hardware design couples tightly with human factors, mobile app development and  industrialization and production management backgrounds. We present now the core team that will bring to you the re.corder!

 

 

 

https://www.midifan.com/modulenews-detailview-34529.htm

https://www.toutiao.com/i6751217421178110478/

https://kontroleryzm.pl/re-corder-flet-prosty-i-kontroler-midi-w-jednym/

https://ask.audio/articles/re-corder-is-the-recorder-reinvented-for-a-new-generation

https://synthcafe.blog/2019/10/17/artinoise-re-corder-il-flauto-dolce-reinventato-in-chiave-moderna/

https://www.matrixsynth.com/2019/10/artinoise-recorder.html

https://newmusicalinstruments.it/2019/10/artinoise-re-corder/

https://icon.jp/archives/17992

https://cdm.link/2019/10/recorder-reboot/

http://www.synthtopia.com/content/2019/10/18/artinoise-intros-midi-augmented-re-corder-wind-instrument/

https://fr.audiofanzine.com/controleur-midi-divers/artinoise/re-corder/news/a.play,n.46262.html

https://www.amazona.de/news-artinoise-rec-order-eine-digitale-floete-mit-midi/

story:
Hello world! My name is Krystyna, and I'm an aspiring audio engineer here in the beautiful city of Boston, Massachusetts.

I've always loved music since a young age. I started taking piano lessons, and eventually moved to the guitar and singing. In High School I became obsessed with taking every music class that was offered, even creating an independent study in It. The more I studied music the more I wanted to learn, and I soon realized that this was the career path I wanted to be on. I started performing more seriously, writing my own songs, and making my own demo recordings.  I studied music production at Berklee College of Music , and in Spain at Berklee's Valencia campus. While I learned a lot through classes, I've realized that these learning opportunities lacked the hands-on experience I needed. I searched far and wide for other educational programs to help me take my passion for audio to the next level, and that's when I found Plaid Dog's Apprentice Program.This IndieGoGo campaign is the final step toward gaining the skills I need to pursue that dream career -- and with your help, I know I can make this a reality.

This campaign is raising funds for my apprenticeship at Plaid Dog Recording, where I would be learning from and working with Mike Davidson, a Boston-based producer and engineer with 15+ years of experience working with both established and up-and-coming musicians.

One of the things I'm most excited about is just how hands-on this program would be, which is the quickest, best way to learn this trade. So many schools make students wait for years to touch any equipment or make their own recordings, but Plaid Dog cuts right to the chase. My apprenticeship would include the following components to help me enter the working world as an audio professional:

1. One-on-one training workshops: Plaid Dog's training program consists of 20 comprehensive lessons taught in one-on-one workshops, which keeps this personal, tailored to me, and hands-on. This is where I get to work with Mike and his knowledgeable engineering staff and really hone my skills on a variety of important topics.
2. Assisting on real recording sessions: I might be most excited about this part! Perhaps the coolest thing about this apprenticeship is that Plaid Dog puts me to work straight away when I start the program -- and, I GET PAID for my time assisting on sessions, which means from day 1, I get to put "Plaid Dog Assistant" on my resume. How cool is that? This is exactly what I need to start my career.
3. Hands-on recording labs: This is where I get hands-on opportunities with Plaid Dog's awesome gear, and get to work with actual bands to practice my recording skills. I can't stress how huge this is -- with audio, things don't really click until you can apply this stuff with your own hands in a real setting.

 

And what will you get for your generosity and support? So many awesome things!

I'm so appreciative and grateful for any support you can lend to this campaign. In exchange for your generosity, I've put together a really exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign. Check out some examples below and a full list to the right!

It's hard to express how much this program would change my life.

As far back as I can remember, music has always been a part of my life. From the piano lessons that I took at a young age, up until the theory and composition classes I took in high school. It always intrigued me that music is a subject where there is always something more to learn. This is what led me to dive deep into the world of music production, leading me to Berklee College of Music online, and now to Plaid Dog. With this opportunity, I’ll gain new hands on experiences that will help me master the skills I need to make high quality recordings of not only my own, but other musicians, and will help get me to my dream of someday owning my own studio. I’ll learn not only how to record, but be able to contribute guidance on songwriting and performing, and get chances to play as a session musician.

This will be one of the greatest moves I’ll make to advance my career in music and recording. I’m grateful for all the skills I have learned leading up until now, not only at Berklee College of Music, but from my high school teachers and through many private lessons. I’m super excited for this opportunity with Plaid Dog to help me make music my day-to-day life in an actual studio, and to have all my friends and family along for the ride!

If you're ready to contribute, just click the pink "Back It" button on the top right of this page!  

Every little bit counts, and I'm so grateful for all your support. If you've got folks in your network that would be interested in supporting me, please help get the word out and make some noise! There are social media share buttons on this page, and please tell your friends how grateful I am for this support.

Thank you so much for checking out my campaign page. I can't wait to take this big step towards a bright future.

How cool is that? This is exactly what I need to start my career.3. Hands-on recording labs: This is where I get hands-on opportunities with Plaid Dog's awesome gear, and get to work with actual bands to practice my recording skills. I can't stress how huge this is -- with audio, things don't really click until you can apply this stuff with your own hands in a real setting. And what will you get for your generosity and support? So many awesome things!I'm so appreciative and grateful for any support you can lend to this campaign. In exchange for your generosity, I've put together a really exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign. Check out some examples below and a full list to the right!It's hard to express how much this program would change my life.As far back as I can remember, music has always been a part of my life. From the piano lessons that I took at a young age, up until the theory and composition classes I took in high school. It always intrigued me that music is a subject where there is always something more to learn. This is what led me to dive deep into the world of music production, leading me to Berklee College of Music online, and now to Plaid Dog. With this opportunity, I’ll gain new hands on experiences that will help me master the skills I need to make high quality recordings of not only my own, but other musicians, and will help get me to my dream of someday owning my own studio. I’ll learn not only how to record, but be able to contribute guidance on songwriting and performing, and get chances to play as a session musician.This will be one of the greatest moves I’ll make to advance my career in music and recording. I’m grateful for all the skills I have learned leading up until now, not only at Berklee College of Music, but from my high school teachers and through many private lessons. I’m super excited for this opportunity with Plaid Dog to help me make music my day-to-day life in an actual studio, and to have all my friends and family along for the ride!If you're ready to contribute, just click the pink "Back It" button on the top right of this page!  Every little bit counts, and I'm so grateful for all your support. If you've got folks in your network that would be interested in supporting me, please help get the word out and make some noise! There are social media share buttons on this page, and please tell your friends how grateful I am for this support.Thank you so much for checking out my campaign page. I can't wait to take this big step towards a bright future.

story:
WE GUARANTEED TO SHIP!

Why buy the Moto Hint; when you can get the Mini cheaper and in more colors?

Short Summary

Hi, my name is Lao Dara. I am the founder of MicroElements, and the designer of the MINI , the smallest Bluetooth earbud that fits comfortably right inside your ear.

WHAT EXACTLY IS THE MINI?

The Mini is:

  • a single stereo high-end audio quality speaker
  • 2.5 hours of nonstop music playing on a single charge
  • a unique in ear no hook design.


The MINI comes with everything you need – an on/off button, a play/answer button, and a hidden charging port (so you can charge it using the supplied USB cable). It also comes with a silicon cap to ensure a comfortable placement in the ear.

The Bluetooth headset with its ear hook used to look stylish – but the latest technology, represented by the MINI – is to simply have the Bluetooth inside your ear. You can talk to family and friends, and listen to music, all without having that Bluetooth headset prominently placed outside your ear.



How does it look in your ear? 




COLORS




Full Product Description:



SPECS


Bluetooth Version: V 3.0+EDR

IC: CSR

Transmission power: Class 2

Transmission frequency: 2.4-2.48 GHz

Speaker: Stereo (can listen to music)

Talking Time: 5 hours

Charging Time: 2 hours

Standby Time: 120 hours

Distance: 32.8 ft

Weight: 15 g

Size: 23x27 mm

Accessories: USB cable, earcaps, manual, packaging.




Users of iPhones will be able to check the battery charge of the MINI  on their iPhones. This earbud is also compatible with iPads, PCs, laptops and smartphones

What will we do if we not only reach our goal but surpass it?


Get us to $10,000 and we will upgrade the battery giving you more talk and music time.
Get us to $15,000 and we will add 4 new  colors schemes:

Black/Red 
Black/Pink 
Black/Blue
Black/Orange

Get us to $30,000 and we will add 5 new colors schemes:

White/Red 

White/Pink 

White/Blue

White/Orange

White/Green


Get us to $50,000 and we will upgrade every backer to an extended 1 year warranty, up from the standard 3 months. And we will give every backer free shipping.*

*Backers must have chosen a perk with a value of $15 or higher.

Why crowdfunding?

When we decided to create a consumer friendly product, we knew that crowd funding was the best way to determine the demand for our product and gain market research. 

PROJECT TIMELINE

We currently have fully working pre-production units with finalized hardware!

Several devices were made and sold to few customers, received positive feedbacks. Your funding will help us place order for mass production and provide you with one of these efficient devices and research further on product betterment.


Use of Funds

Prototypes and test run already completed by the design company. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to order MINI device into mass production. Our aim is to provide you this premium product ahead of everyone else and encourage the guys behind design.

What We Need

The MINI has been fully developed, fully tested, and is ready to go into full scale production, at the Jia Shan Xiang Yin factory in China. The world’s largest manufacturer of earphones and headphones, they are an ISO 900:1200 factory.

All that is needed is an infusion of $7,500 capital to pay for liability insurance (standard for any product, as I’m sure you know) and for the first production run.

You can make that possible and get some pretty sweet rewards for yourself as well! You’ll be receiving the MINI for half off the normal price that people will pay when it hits the stores.

More Ways You Can Help

Please be sure to share this campaign on your social media pages, and send the URL to anyone you think will be interested in freeing themselves from the “ear hook” with the Bluetooth MINI earbud.


What You Get

Be one of the first to own the MINI and you get it all for 50% off the MSRP!

Perks will ship before Christmas 2014

story:
We have been working on the Phantom Air for more than 1 year to ensure that we produce the best quality truly wireless in earbuds to date.

We know how to make great sounding personal audio equipment. Our reputation and track record to date proves this. Since our launch on Kickstarter almost 2 years ago we have gone from strength to strength producing some of the finest in ear headphones.

Each Phantom Air comes supplied with our renowned tuning filters. The filters for the Phantom Air allow you to tune the bass and higher frequencies to give you your preferred sound signature. They simply unscrew and can be swapped in and out within seconds!

Every model we make is built with premium materials and our renowned tuning for a audiophile quality sound while still retaining musicality. The Phantom Air is no exception, utilising our 7mm Titanium dynamic drivers for a precise sound unlike no other truly wireless earbuds EVER made!

Each shell of the Phantom Air is made from CNC precision machined Aluminium.

Each Phantom Air is coated with a Hydrophobic layer protecting them from water and sweat making them as ideal at the gym as they are at home.

The Phantom Air is ALL about the quality of the audio you are hearing. As we concentrated on just superior audio quality we have kept the Phantom Air's controls simple to keep them compact, lightweight and uncluttered from pointless gadgets that distract from its most important feature, Audiophile quality sound!

Recharge on the go by placing the Phantom Air's into the charging case to recharge them on the go, 45 minutes to 75-80% charge and 1 hour until fully charged. The pocket charger can recharge the earbuds up to 10 additional times, giving you up to 30 hours use!

Each Phantom Air earbud offers 3-4 hours of use per charge.

Trinity Phantom Air have been designed with supreme comfort and a secure fit in mind and due to the Phantom Air's ergonomic design, unique filter system and 5 gram (per earpiece) weight ensure effortless long time wearing and supreme fit no matter what you are doing.

The Trinity Phantom Air can be paired to any device capable of transmitting Bluetooth audio such as smartphones and computers. The Phantom Air use a industry leading CSR Bluetooth v4.2 chip (also compatible with Bluetooth 3.0.) specifically designed for micro wireless applications.

No other truly wireless earbud offers superior sound reproduction in such a small package as the Phantom Air.

The built-in microphone allows you to take calls on the go, hands-free.

Each Phantom Air will be available in the following colour choices.

The following colours have also been unlocked on Kickstarter by reaching stretch goals!

Each Phantom Air will come with the following:

  • 2x Phantom Air truly wireless earbuds (left and right)
  • 1 x Pocket Charger
  • 1 x USB Cable for charging the Pocket Charger
  • Trinity Silicone Tips - Small, Medium, and Large. Extra small, small, medium and large Spinfit tips. Small, Medium and Large Trinity Kombi isolation tips.
  • Instruction booklet

For those that are not looking for a wireless solution we also have our all new 6 driver push pull hybrid in ear monitor, The Phantom Master 6.

The Phantom Master 6 are the worlds first push pull hybrid in-ear monitors. Incorporating our twin titanium diaphragm 7mm dynamic drivers with 2 dual balanced armatures.

Each earpiece is fitted with twin 7mm titanium dynamic drivers in a push/pull out of phase configuration to create immense detail and smoothness along with reduced distortion and high resolution audio.

The dual balanced armatures provide extra sparkle, detail and precision that dynamic drivers can't achieve on their own, by utilising one dual driver woofer armature for low frequencies and lower midrange and the other dual driver armature for the rest of the midrange and high frequencies we have created one of the most precise yet enjoyable universal in-ear monitors available today!

The Phantom Master will offer one of the most enjoyable yet technically superior sound signatures available!

SPECIFICATION

  • All aluminium CNC machined shells Worlds first push/pull hybrid 
  • 2 x 7mm Titanium diaphragm drivers + 2 dual balanced armatures ( 6 drivers per earpiece) 
  • 2 Pin detachable cables x 3 (included as standard) 1 x standard Trinity multi-braid 1 x memory wire multi-braid 1 x fabric cable with remote and mic 
  • 5 x tuning filters in standard length for shallow insertion and long length for deep insertion. 
  • OFC copper cables 
  • Huge accessory package inc our standard case, 6.3mm adapter, huge selection of eartips (S/M/M/L silicone, double flange, S/M/L Memory foam, Spinfit tips XS/S/M/L
  • Available in Matte Black, Gunmetal, Polished Aluminium and Red

 

We have already completed all of the prototyping and testing all the way up to the point of a pre-production Phantom Air and pocket charger. Now to make them a reality we need to build them in a large quantity per production run and this is the part you can all make a reality!

story:
SweetVinyl's Brief History

 

Technology Demonstration at 2016 CES (January 2016)

This early SugarCube prototype had all the basic functions of the first SC-1 and SC-2 models and included a phono stage.  It proved the interest for the product and convinced us to keep refining the product and add a version with USB thumb-drive recording.

 

Indiegogo Campaign of the SC-1 and SC-2, Volume Product Fulfillment (2017)

The production SC-1 and SC-2 were first launched via an Indiegogo campaign. Over 200 units shipped to original backers worldwide and SweetVinyl has continued to support and develop the software and hardware.

 

  • Production, Disitribution, Worldwide acceptance. 2018 - 1H 2019.

Throughout 2018 and into 2019 SweetVinyl shipped over 400 additional units through traditional audiophile vendors - and had scores of favorable reviews online and in print.

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/reviews/

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/us-dealers/

During this time the software has continually been developed:

  • 2.0 version SC-2 software including track splitting, metadata tagging, normalization, and archiving.
  • 2.0 version click and pop removal software with improvements to deal with more clicks and pops and electronic music.
  • SVNR - Surface noise reduction software that will help reduce surface noise and tape hiss on early recordings like 78s and early magnetic tape. (SVNR is standard on Plus models like the SC-1 Plus offered here).
  • Continual refinement of features requested from users and updates for various bug fixes.

 

Lower cost and more integrated models - available here:

We have worked tirelessly to deliver a high quality product at an affordable price - but we have had many requests for a less expensive model and have noticed some users needed an integrated phono stage.

  • From the start we wanted to build a basic $1500 model -  this took significant design improvements to be able reach this price point.  Now you can be the first to get one of these units.
  • We have seen many users who have an integrated amp without a tape loop that want to use a SugarCube - our new phono stage does this without adding another component.
  • Now that these models are ready to go and we have the hard work done - backers can be the first one to get the benefit of all the work done to date.

 

2nd Generation SugarCubes - The Mini and Plus:

We have now developed a cost reduced and simplified design and are adding SVNR to the larger chassis SC-1. We are ready to produce the first units - these are available here with this campaign.

To help with the cost of building new inventory, we are pre-selling a small quantity of each model:

  • SC-1 Mini - This is a cost reduced and simplified version of the SC-1.

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/sc1-mini

  • SC-1 Mini/Phono - This adds a MM/MC phono stage to the SC-1 Mini.

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/sc1-mini-phono/

  • SC-2 Mini/Phono - This is a cost reduced and simplified version of the SC-2 with the new MM/MC phono stage from the SC-1 Mini/Phono.

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/sc2-mini-phono/

  • SC-1 Plus - This is an upgraded simplified version of the SC-1 with SVNR and digital outputs.

http://www.sweetvinyl.com/sc1-plus/

  • These units are in final production qualification - we have the majority of the long lead time components in house and are ready to do production assembly

First article qualification of all three  of the SC Mini models - from left there are 5 SC-1 Minis, 1 SC-1 Mini/Phono and 1 SC-2 Mini/Phono under test and burn in.  They test jig shows .0027 THD+N distortion through the AD-DA. (Dated 6/18/2019)

  • As all the engineering work is finished and now we just need to fund initial production - our funding goal is going to allow us to deliver product within this timeframe:
    • SC-1 Mini - 35 Units to ship beginning of August 2019 (or earlier).
    • SC-1 Mini/Phono - 15 units to ship beginning of September 2019 (or earlier).
    • SC-2 Mini/Phono - 30 units to ship beginning of September 2019 (or earlier).
    • SC-1 Plus - 20 units to ship beginning in October 2019 (or earlier).

 

Risks & Challenges:

While we are confident we are able to hit these milestones - there are always risks - what are they?

  • We don't see any hardware risks but there can be delays - recently the shipment that had over 100 mini chassis was lost at the Canadian border for over a month - we finally received them - but it is always a challenge to get all the needed components to assemble when needed - this risk is low  - but final shipment could improve or delay by a few weeks as there are nearly 200 individual components we buy to build a final product.
  • We do buy some components from China - you cannot build products like this today without them and tariffs have had an impact on our costs and sometimes slow deliveries - luckily we have reliable vendors and we think we are able to buy enough ahead of time.
  • Software - we have a great team - and we try very hard to predict when software will be ready - but the complexity of what we are doing and the number of different software components that are integrated and tested before we can ship a unit are a constant challenge.  We are over 90% done with all our software (including the SC-2 version 2.0) - so the delays with software schedule and final test and QA are the biggest risk - but we think we can achieve the schedule based on what has already been accomplished.
  • With all these risks we know backers will be the first to receive one of them - it will be production tested, with manuals, packaging software and factory support.

 

Tell your friends:

If you already have a SugarCube you can help by telling your friends about this opportunity. Indiegogo has helped us and many others get projects to the next step - so also look around the site and see what else is going on.

Yours in SweetVinyl.
