story:
PAPERorgan is the world's first modular organ completely made from paper. A kit with which anyone can build their own organ!

On the UNFOLDED Festival Gmund:

 

I attended the UNFOLDED Festival at the paper mill Gmund in Bavaria (Oct. 23-24), Germany. I showed my PAPERorgan to around 1000 visitors for two intense days. If that's not a successful test of endurance and stability, I don't know what else I could do :-)

I don't know how many times I filled the balloon, how many hundreds of fingers played on the organ... But she's in perfect shape and still playing!

After two years of engineering, countless prototypes and optimizing each and every element for most convenient assembly, finally it's here - Your own modular organ.

No matter if you want to show your children, pupils or students how a tone is made, or the mechanics of a simple organ.

Modular Design:

 

Add modules to extend the tone range!

 Experience the fascination of building a working musical instrument out of paper!

 

How to make a working pipe:

Simply connect the balloon to the nozzle and start playing! One balloon enables you to play up to 45 seconds!

Even unboxing is fun! You will receive a beautiful little box with all elements (and many tools) to build your own modular paper organ! All pieces are neatly stored in separate compartments.

 

 Here's a short unboxing video:

Music by Son of a Bach (Thank you so much!)

 

For the Minimalists:

You'll receive all pieces to build one 5-notes or 7-notes PAPERorgan, including assembly instructions. It will be shipped without glue, tools and balloon.

 

REWARDS:

Special reward:

 

I've built many prototypes of every element, until it was 

a) reliable and working

b) easy to build

c) made from as few as possible parts

 

Here are some of the many prototypes I've built in the past 2 years :-)

 

 

As seen on:
story_txt:
PAPERorgan is the world's first modular organ completely made from paper. A kit with which anyone can build their own organ!On the UNFOLDED Festival Gmund:

 
I attended the UNFOLDED Festival at the paper mill Gmund in Bavaria (Oct. 23-24), Germany. I showed my PAPERorgan to around 1000 visitors for two intense days. If that's not a successful test of endurance and stability, I don't know what else I could do :-)I don't know how many times I filled the balloon, how many hundreds of fingers played on the organ... But she's in perfect shape and still playing!After two years of engineering, countless prototypes and optimizing each and every element for most convenient assembly, finally it's here - Your own modular organ.No matter if you want to show your children, pupils or students how a tone is made, or the mechanics of a simple organ.Modular Design: Add modules to extend the tone range! Experience the fascination of building a working musical instrument out of paper! How to make a working pipe:Simply connect the balloon to the nozzle and start playing! One balloon enables you to play up to 45 seconds!Even unboxing is fun! You will receive a beautiful little box with all elements (and many tools) to build your own modular paper organ! All pieces are neatly stored in separate compartments.  Here's a short unboxing video:Music by Son of a Bach (Thank you so much!) For the Minimalists:You'll receive all pieces to build one 5-notes or 7-notes PAPERorgan, including assembly instructions. story:
Short Summary

Hi pilots!

I'm a software developer. My passion is to develop applications for digital simulators. One of my apps is 'Simshaker', that can work with popular simulators such as DCS World, iRacing an Assetto Corsa. SimShaker software receives row telemetry data from the simulator game and processes the data with inner logic to send vibrations to the user's body at appropriate time and place via vibrating cushion at user's chair.

Now Simshaker works with Gametrix vibe cushions, as you can see in the picture above. I know that DCS World virtual pilots who own the Gametrix vibe cushion enjoy SimShaker (formely ibaEffects) a lot. It helps them to control the aircraft by the seat of their pants. I also know that there are many pilots who don't have the Gametrix device, but do have Buttkicker-like sound mode device, and we can make those devices work with DCS World much better, using the simulator's telemetry data. Using an alernate sound device to output low freq. audio, we can feel the rumbling and vibration of the aircraft; rather than through vibration via the game sounds.

I love especially those takeoffs.... You are getting faster and faster along the runway, feeling the aircraft rumbling more and more.... nose gear up... and... oh my God! silence! I'm airborn!

What We Need & What You Get

Well, I'm almost ready to start hardcoding to make SimShaker work with Buttkicker-like devices. And to get started the project requires the following fundraising and assistance:

  • $560 (includes IndieGogo campaign fees)
  • One or two beta-testers with Buttkicker-like devices
You get the chance  to enhance your DCS World immersion and take part in creative process.

The Impact

I believe that by reaching our goal we will: 
  • enhance virtual pilots user experience that will bring a lot of fun and excitement;
  • make even more game, not war;
  • bring the flight sim community together, pilots from different countries, different continents.

Risks & Challenges

Yes, it's risky to try create something new and to achieve your goals. But this challenge excites me to overcome the hurdles. Below are the estimated risks of the project.

  • May encounter some severe technical issues - about 10 %;
  • You don't like at all what I implement - about 5 %;
What should I do to solve these challenges? 
  • Of course I can appeal to software developers community and get nessesary help. 
  • Every contributor will have the opportunity to test and influence the design of the software during development process.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please, help get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Workout and stay connected while leaving your phone behind. 

 

Perfect for 100+ workouts or activities.

With Vinci, you get over $1,000 of value.

"Vinci 2.0 is your perfect sports partner!"

Vinci 2.0 Testimonials in NYC gym.

Check out what real users think about Vinci 2.0!

 
Quick Start Demo and Test Run with Vinci 2.0 functional product.

Make calls and send messages directly from your headphones.

Vinci 2.0 is a standalone computing device with a Quad-Core ARM Cortex A-7 processor and WiFi, 3G cellular and Bluetooth connectivity. You can ask Vinci to make a call, send a text message, set a reminder, or give you directions. No phone is required so you can carry less and workout more.

Stream 42 million songs directly to your ears.

Vinci 2.0 integrates with Spotify, SoundCloud, Amazon Music, and KKBOX, with a library of over 42 million songs while leaving your phone behind. 

Don’t miss important alerts when you leave your phone at home.

Vinci 2.0 can receive push notifications directly from your phone no matter how far away you are from it. 

 

Voice control all your music and features.

Whether you are lifting weights, jogging, or cycling, just ask Vinci for your favorite songs, request songs by specific genres or moods, or let Vinci recommend a song for you, 20+ languages supported. 

Clear voice recognition with bone conduction mic.

Vinci 2.0 uses a bone conduction mic for crystal clear voice recognition, even in the nosiest environments. This technology is deployed in mission critical situations (military, emergency services) for near-field voice recognition. Ambient noise is filtered out and only the speaker’s voice is collected and amplified. With this technology you can whisper voice commands in a noisy gym or make sensitive calls on a busy street without raising your voice.

 

Music recommendations based on your preferences and activities. Always learning, always getting smarter.

Vinci 2.0’s AI works on 2 levels. First, it learns from your music listening habits and physical statistics to make intelligent music recommendations. Second, it uses natural language processing (“NLP”) algorithms to recognize your words and understand your intentions. All of this allows Vinci to recommend music that best matches your query, mood, location, and activity.

True gesture control. The easiest way to change your music.

 

Track a casual run or an intense ride, and share your results with your friends.

Vinci 2.0 has over 10 built-in sensors to accurately analyze your fitness and health data.

 A personal fitness coach in your ear.

 

Vinci 2.0 is fully integrated with Amazon Alexa, with English (U.S.) English (U.K.), English (India), German and Japanese. Also, we will support google assistant later, which supports 20+ languages including Spanish, French and Italian.  

 

Vinci collaborated with one of the greatest industrial design firm to create the most comfortable and ergonomic fitness headphones. Vinci 2.0’s unique “pentagon” shape is designed to fit perfectly and flexibly around your neck. 

Extremely lightweight and sublime comfort after 512 point ergonomics test.

Vinci 2.0 only weighs 86g and has a holding force of 150g so it’s very secure. No matter what activity you are engaged in, Vinci 2.0 will stay in place - even during the most vigorous activity.

Rock out without your earbuds falling out.

Magnetic neckband holds your earbuds in place and sweat-proof neckband fits securely during any workout.

Use Vinci 2.0 all day long.

Vinci’s subtle style goes well with whatever outfit you’re wearing, from athletic wear to a business suit. In addition, Vinci 2.0’s long-lasting 600 mAh lithium-ion battery is designed to charge quickly and last the entire day.

Include set of ear gels and in-ear fins.

Vinci 2.0 earbuds are highly customizable, and each Vinci 2.0 package will include a set of replacement earbuds and ear fins in various shapes and sizes .

8 different noise cancellation modes and settings to appropriately match your listening environment.

 Immersive 3D sound from all angles.

Listen with your headphones to get the real effect of Vinci 2.0's 3D sound.

5,850 hours of audio tuning (Dirac HD Sound).

 

Choose your own Vinci 2.0. 3 different versions, Lite, Pro, Super.

4 different stunning colors match your different styles.

 

Tech specs 

 Product Gallery

 

 

 

Dear Indiegogo backers,

Thanks for your continuous support! Since 2014, our mission has been to reinvent headphones. Pioneering something no one has done before has been challenging, but you’ve carried us through. Thanks to your support, we were able to win top Awards and were featured at NFL Super Bowl LI.

Now we are reinventing headphones again and announce Vinci 2.0 - the First Standalone Smart Sports Headphones, which let you workout without phones and completely hands-free. For the first time, music streaming, calls, and fitness tracking are integrated into a single device.

Our mission will always remain the same - to reinvent headphones. We would love for you to join us on the next chapter of our innovation journey, for Vinci 2.0 and beyond.

The Vinci Team

 

Experienced team of designers and engineers

Inspero Inc. was founded in 2014 by two MIT Alumni, David and Max. The company’s vision and mission is to completely rethink headphones by inventing a new way to experience -- and interact with -- sound.The Vinci team now consists of 70 talented and passionate headphone geeks with many years of experience from companies such as Intel, Oracle, and Microsoft, and from universities such as MIT, Harvard, RISD, and Parsons.We are spread across the globe, with offices in New York, San Francisco, Beijing, Bangkok, and Shenzhen. Our main offices are in China; this was a strategic decision to take advantage of China’s robust and ever-innovating supply chain.

From concept to reality

“Vinci” stands for invention. We’ve innovated before, and we’ll innovate again -- this time even more radically.

Share the love

Like what we're doing? Share Vinci 2.0 with your friends! 

Contact us

1. Back our campaign and leave a comment on our Indiegogo page 

2. Send a direct message to us on Indiegogo

3. For further support, contact support@inspero.im 

4. Follow us on our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/VinciHearable

Press kit 

If you’re a member of the press looking for info or media assets, please download our press kit here, or contact us at press@inspero.im. 

Fine print

International backers: We will ship Vinci worldwide, with the exception of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please note that you will be responsible for non-refundable duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. 

Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different estimated shipment month. While we do not expect these to change, the estimated shipment month might shift. We will provide updates if the estimated shipment date changes. At anytime up until your headphone has shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing support@inspero.im. 

Warranty: We stand firmly behind our products. Each Vinci headset includes a 7-day (after you receive it) money back guarantee, 6-month free exchange period, and 1-year limited warranty. Need help? We're here for you. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@inspero.im. 

Disclaimers notifications: Vinci headphones must be connected to the internet via either WiFi/3G or to a smartphone via Bluetooth in order to receive notifications and perform other functions. 

Heart rate monitor: Vinci’s heart rate (HR) monitor is intended to be a valuable tool that provides an accurate estimate of the user’s heart rate. The HR monitor is designed to monitor a user’s heart rate on a periodic basis. The frequency at which heart rate is measured varies and depends on the level of activity of the user. Vinci headphones are not medical devices and you should not rely on the accuracy of the heart rate data for any purpose, especially for medical or health purposes. 

Battery life: Actual battery life will vary based in part on cellular network performance, location, and other factors. 

3rd party applications: For 3rd party applications that are not native to, or built into Vinci’s operating system -- such as Spotify -- you must already have an account set up to use these services with your Vinci device. Additional fees and costs may apply to any such services. Use of third party services is subject to these services’ own terms. 

Trademarks: Trademarks and names that belong to third parties. Water resistance: Vinci is splash resistant but not waterproof. Incidental exposure to water–like unforeseeable rain–won’t ruin your device, but submerging the device is not recommended.

story:
Where are we at?

Our initial goal was to reach 40.000 USD so we would be able to start the production. After a longer period of negotiation we have been able to restructure our purchases and reservation of stock.

We have come to an agreement with the PCB and mFI chip supplier, that production will start when we reach 10.000 USD.

We are currently at 1406 USD so 8594 USD left to hit target.

 

Why are we not updating our goal?

  • When goal is set at pre-launch, the goal is not something we are able to change afterwards, regardless any changes in volume and budget.

 

Streaming music has never been easier

With a HALL WiFi Streamer you can provide any stereo or active speakers with a wireless connection AND turn them into multiroom solutions. 

The HALL WiFi Streamer has a built in 5V trigger signal enabling you to use it on classic speakers such as Beolab 8000. 

You simply connect the HALL WiFi Streamer to your stereo or active speakers and pair it with your smartphone, tablet or computer. Playlist, volume etc. is controlled by the paired device, such as your smartphone. The HALL WiFi streamer supports Airplay2 and can be connected to other Airplay2 devices including SONOS, B&O, HEOS etc. 

Specs:

  • Airplay2
  • WiFi 2,4GHz & 5GHz
  • Bluetooth 5
  • HDMI ARC
  • 5V trigger signal for B&O
  • RJ45 Audio In/Out

This is the perfect solution for you if you wish to modernize your B&O speakers using the built-in 5V trigger signal, using HDMI ARC from your TV or amplifier and so much more. This product will also combine your products across brand names with the Airplay2 function, or set up your own multi rooms through the companion app.

Help us bring this product alive and all the way to the retail shelves

This is an expensive product to develop, especially with our strong focus on quality, and we need to fund the first batch so to speak in order to start production. With your help we will be able to expand our product line with this product, and turn our prototypes into products on the shelves.

What's in it for you?

You will be welcomed into the HALL AUDIO family consisting of more than 6000 satisfied customers across Scandinavia. You will receive a HALL WiFi streamer, power supply and the specific cable you need to connect the product to your stereo or speakers all beautifully presented in our exclusive enclosures.

Minimal risk

As we have been producing audio equipment for 5 years and have our products on the shelves in more than 55 retail stores across Scandinavia, we have extensive experience with all factors you must take into account when producing and selling products like this, customer care, shipping possibilities etc. Our biggest obstacle when expanding our product line is the minimum quantity many subsuppliers demands, which is why we need your help to turn this exciting product into reality. Our prototypes have been developed and severely tested through 1,5 years and we guarantee you will love it. 

So please share this campaign and help us grow our crowd

story:
Hooke Lav is a wireless microphone that captures pro-grade sound with no wires, no dropouts and no hassle. The Bluetooth lav has 8GB of internal storage and connects to any device with the click of a button. This slick, minimalist microphone maximizes your freedom to record with no setup necessary!  

It’s the first truly wireless device to send high quality audio over Bluetooth at low latency. The stylish, clip-on gives you professional quality audio recording in the studio, on the go and out in the wild. It eliminates wind noise, cuts the cord and, thanks to its internal storage, picks up every second of audio even if Bluetooth cuts out. 


Smartphone cameras have been upgraded year after year, but their mics still don’t measure up, leaving you with subpar sound on crystal-clear videos. The same goes for mics on DSLR cameras and laptops—the quality isn’t there!

The only way to improve sound quality is upgrading to a better microphone, but that often requires sizable funds, technical know-how and a learning curve. And on top of that, most “quality” lavalier microphones on the market have messy cords or bulky design. 

With Hooke Lav, you can skip the confusion and opt for an affordable pro-quality mic that operates with one click! 

Hooke Audio is no stranger to success in the sound engineering world. In 2014, founder Anthony Mattana had a wildly successful Kickstarter launch of Hooke Verse that raised $163,166 with 1,385 backers.

Hooke Verse headphones were flawlessly delivered to backers in 2017, and since then, Hooke Audio hasn’t stopped revolutionizing the world of mobile Bluetooth sound.

Before Hooke Audio, creators sacrificed sound quality for utility with Bluetooth speakers and headphones that were limited to sending mono audio (3kHz – 5kHz). The only way to upgrade to stereo audio (20Hz – 20kHz) was using a more cumbersome setup with added weight and wires. Hooke saw this problem and built a custom codec that allows dual-channel streaming of high-quality audio to both Android and iOS at incredibly low latency. 

Android and iOS are not (yet) natively set up to receive our proprietary Bluetooth recording codec, so we use our mobile app to make the handshake with our recording codec. The result is a fully stacked mobile app designed to change the way you record the world!

Hooke Lav has just one button that’s used for powering on/off, beginning/ending recording and pairing. Plus, it automatically turns off after 10 minutes of non-use to conserve battery life. 

Cut the cord and slip on the smallest wearable mic that records wirelessly to any mobile device through Bluetooth 5.0. The stylish mic has 7 hours continuous recording battery life and takes less than an hour to fully charge.    

 Whether you need to be in the scene or on the scene, Hooke Lav ensures you get ridiculously crisp audio in one click.

 Hooke Lav is equipped with 8GB of internal storage, backing-up every capture in real time, so your audio is seamless even when Bluetooth is not. 

When a recording begins, the audio is sent to the phone or device over Bluetooth in real time, while an identical file is being written to internal storage. When a recording ends, Hooke Lav merges both audio files together for a pristine, dropout free recording.

Hooke Lav uses digital, omnidirectional microphones to capture the highest-quality, noise-free sound in both the loudest and quietest environments. When you play it back, it sounds like the audio is happening right in front of you. With Hooke Lav, you don’t have to be a sound engineer to access high-quality audio equipment!

Hooke Audio app for iOS and Android is the only app on the market that lets a device stream rich, dual channel, high quality audio (20Hz – 20 kHz) over Bluetooth to Android and iOS with no latency.

The Hooke Audio app also doubles as a field recorder. Put your device in your pocket and record audio on the fly! Share your videos and sound recordings via email, social media and text message straight from the app. No special speakers or algorithms required.

Hooke Lav was created to capture audio to your mobile device, but we know sometimes things don’t go as planned. And that’s why we created Island Mode. 

Island Mode lets you record hands-free, without connecting to a phone or camera. You can “unplug” from the world and still record your thoughts, songs and sounds with just a clip and a click! Hooke Lav stores the capture onboard until you’re able to connect and upload to a mobile device.

You don’t do everything on a mobile device. That’s why we created Receiver Mode, allowing one LAV to receive audio from the other and transmit it directly into the audio jack of any camera. Syncing your sound directly to picture.

Receiver Mode requires 2 lavs and allows you to override the internal microphone on your phone/camera/computer and record with Hooke Lav. Lav A connects wirelessly to Lav B and B pumps audio into the phone lightning port/Micro USB slot via a 3.5mm cable.

Use one LAV to record alone in Solo Mode or pair with a second for 2-channel input in Duet Mode. 

 

 Duet Mode is perfect for interviews, podcasts and more. Place Hooke Lav mics on two different interviewees and record their vocals respectively, and both recordings will transmit to the smartphone in real-time, mixed together with the video automatically

 Whether you’re vlogging on a busy street, recording a podcast in your basement or meeting in Zoom, Hooke Lav gives you freedom to move and still be perfectly heard.

 

 It’s ideal for: 

 

If a device is meant to be worn, it should look like it. Hooke Lav was designed with intention to be discreet, lightweight, and honestly, a little sexy. Brushed steel, secure clip, durable makeup...what’s not to LAV  

In a world where content is king, your sound matters more than ever. Your creations should be more than “played back” or heard. They should be felt and experienced!

Hooke Lav gives you the power to capture vivid, studio-grade sound over Bluetooth without breaking the bank. No expensive wires and equipment to set up, just a clip-on mic and app download and you’re ready to record on your favorite devices.

 Determine how many lavs you’ll need based on what you’re recording. 

We take reusable packaging and sustainable materials seriously, and we hate the idea of packaging that’s useless after shipping. That’s why we created packaging that helps you get more out of your Lav.

  •  Tube is a Lav carrying case that fits nicely in the lens case sleeve of your camera bag or bottom of your pack.
  •  Hot Shoe Mount inside the case allows you to clip the Lav into and use as a desktop mic (think Yeti mics). Perfect for podcasts, interviews, streams and more.

 Hot Shoe Clip inside the case can be removed and slid into the shoe mount of a DSLR camera. This allows you to securely clip a Lav onto your DSLR when operating in receiver mode and not have the lav dangling off your camera.

​

(Novel concept, right?)

Technological advances in photo and video have enabled us to record our lives vividly through filters and advances in image processing. But what about sound? Poor quality audio means that only half of the story is being told. It’s time to enable our smartphones to record audio like we actually hear it.

Hooke Audio was founded in 2014 by Anthony Mattana, who started his career in sound as a theatrical sound designer and composer. Cited by Live Design Magazine as “Young Designer to Watch,” Mattana is a professional at telling stories through sound in both large and small-scale productions. At the tender age of 25, determined to bring the professional audio tools he had access to in the theatre to smartphones, he invented Hooke Audio, a recording platform designed to change the way we record the world.

 

WHO WE ARE

Our team is made up of designers, engineers and artists with 20+ years experience in sales, marketing, audio, software and hardware. Our Board of Advisors has 30+ years in music, sound, tech and investing, as well.

Hooke Audio's first product Hooke Verse has been referred to as ‘the GoPro for sound.’ Having presented at Midem, NAMM, SXSW, Northside, CES, Taiwan Beats, NYVR Expo and various VR meet-ups as the audio thought leaders in the VR and 3D audio space since 2014. Hooke Audio has been featured in Fast Company, Digital Trends, Wired, Tech Crunch, Recording Magazine, Pro Sound Magazine and Gizmodo.

The Bluetooth lav has 8GB of internal storage and connects to any device with the click of a button. This slick, minimalist microphone maximizes your freedom to record with no setup necessary!  





It’s the first truly wireless device to send high quality audio over Bluetooth at low latency. The stylish, clip-on gives you professional quality audio recording in the studio, on the go and out in the wild. It eliminates wind noise, cuts the cord and, thanks to its internal storage, picks up every second of audio even if Bluetooth cuts out. 


Smartphone cameras have been upgraded year after year, but their mics still don’t measure up, leaving you with subpar sound on crystal-clear videos. The same goes for mics on DSLR cameras and laptops—the quality isn’t there!
The only way to improve sound quality is upgrading to a better microphone, but that often requires sizable funds, technical know-how and a learning curve. And on top of that, most “quality” lavalier microphones on the market have messy cords or bulky design.

story:
This will be the best way to enjoy audio in the pool. After years banging our head against the wall trying to help our swimmers get those fiddly in-ear buds to stay in and not get waterlogged we’ve decided to sidestep the ears altogether with the new Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones.

During our successful crowdfunding campaign to bring the Waterfi Swimcast to life, many of our supporters asked us to also bring bone conduction technology to the pool. They were looking for an alternative to using the in-ear buds that needed to have just the right size tip, and just the right angle, and just the right amount of headphone goop.

With our special silicone molding technique making these special headphones ourselves was suddenly very possible. Bone conduction technology is a great fit for swimmers. Instead of using the ear canal to send music to your inner ear, it takes a shortcut through your cheek and jaw bones and also will sound even better underwater!

THE MOST DURABLE WATERPROOF HEADPHONES

Fully enclosed in our special soft silicone, the Waterfi Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones will go deeper underwater than any waterproof earbud. The material will also protect the components against drops, shocks, snow, salt water, hot water, dirt, mud, but probably not fire. Don’t take these in a fire.

ONE SIZE FITS IMMEDIATELY

There are no extra tips included because there are no tips needed. Right out of the package you can slip these Waterproof Headphones under your goggle strap and dive in. No experimentation with different sizes, or jostling around trying to get them to sit correctly. The soft silicone sits securely just in front of your ear so you can swim for hours without getting that painful ear cramp that comes with having your canal jammed full of earbuds.

 

 

CUTTING EDGE CONDUCTION TECHNOLOGY

While creating this new set of Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones for swimmers, our design and engineering team innovated in a lot of areas. They surrounded the speakers with a second material for added comfort and also to help pump up the volume.

 

PLAYS WELL WITH OTHERS

There are a few options for waterproof audio and we wanted our new Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones to work with all of them, so we built them with a gold plated 3.5mm headphone jack. You can use any waterproof MP3 player, waterproof iPod Shuffle, waterproof phone, though we would suggest you go ahead and pair it with the Waterfi Swimcast.

BATTERY LIFE FOR DAYS

When swimming with music and podcasts you may have found that that hour in the pool turns into 2 hours, 3 hours, maybe even 4 hours. We wanted to make sure these Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones will never be the reason you have to take your pruny fingers to the locker room and go home, so we included a rechargeable battery that will last over 25 hours before needing to be recharged. You can listen to every song in the Beatles catalog 3 times over before needing to grab your USB charging cord.

We're ready to begin making small batches of the Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones at our HQ in San Diego. To really begin getting these out to the pool will require some extra tooling and set up costs with a local manufacturer. With your help we can realize the dream of the most durable, hassle free waterproof headphones ever made.

Founded in sunny San Diego in 2010 by Engineer Royce Nicholas, Waterfi has always been passionate about achieving the impossible: making your favorite gadgets work underwater! Waterfi is a tight-knit, 10 person company in the trendy North Park neighborhood which has spent the last seven years designing and manufacturing the best waterproof products and processes.

Risks and challenges

At this stage of our project, we have:
• Built a working prototype
• Tested Bone Conduction Prototype while swimming laps and doing flip turns
• Designed the electronics & hardware
• Produced products in the past that will use the same in-house manufacturing equipment and suppliers (including the Waterfi Swimcast)
• Produced almost 200,000 waterproof devices over the last seven years, proving we can produce high-quality electronics for swimmers.

Due to the above, we see limited risks associated with our project,
however, we do think it’s worth noting the following:

1. Manufacturing challenges. We’ve created a lot of different waterproof devices here in our San Diego shop though these will be our first headphones. We learned a lot about sourcing components and in house manufacturing preparing the Swimcast for launch which we believe puts us in a good position to execute this plan to create these Waterproof Bone Conduction Headphones.

2. Unforeseen circumstances. We can’t predict the future, so it’s silly to think we know what all of the potential delays could be. Because we have a small team, illness, injury, and other “Acts of God,” could slow us down at any point. We hope we don’t run to any of these, and our years of experience overcoming unforeseen circumstances like these give us confidence we can stay on schedule and make these headphones a reality.

story:
MUZEN OTR Wood is made of natural wood. The handy retro style radio is sophisticatedly crafted capturing the essence of the classic radio designs. The exquisite sound and the smooth edges of the MUZEN OTR Wood will make you fall in love with it. Features FM, Bluetooth, three types of AUX audio input and 10-hour playtime thanks to its lithium battery. MUZEN OTR Wood is easy to operate with amazing sound quality, making it a perfect desktop radio. Embracing an extraordinary spirit and the integrity of its own belief, this special edition is designed as a tribute to Radio Caroline. 10% of the fund will be donated to Radio Caroline to help their broadcasts and keep the dream alive.

Wood is lightweight and can be shape it as you please. However, it requires expertise to do it and take advantage of its properties, fortunately, we are experts. Thanks to our designer five-time winner of CES Innovation Awards, Mr. Zeng, MUZEM OTR Wood has been designed to bring the best and pleasant quality sound to your senses.

 

Muzen OTR wood uses 1.57”(40mm) neodymium iron boron full frequency speaker which has a strong driving power, lower Q value and strong Bass. Thanks to Mr. Zeng’s half a lifetime of experience in audio production, MUZEN OTR Wood is designed aesthetically without compromising the sound quality.

Extracting the best elements of radio design from the early twentieth century, the MUZEN OTR Wood is the best combination of craftsmanship and modern technology. Wherever the MUZEN OTR Wood is placed, it gives a classier and elegant look to the surroundings.

 

Each MUZEN OTR is unique; Premium rosewood are carefully hand-selected, so each piece has a singular texture and color. Subjected trough 27 complex procedures, the quality, and individuality of the MUZEN OTR is guaranteed. Using the properties that rosewood provides to sound quality, rosewood is the best option to achieve the best quality sound,  better than any other plastic or metal speakers.

Up to 10 hours of playtime with a single charge, enjoy music with the best high quality sound without interruptions. With its miniature size and different AUX ports, plug in all your devices and take your music wherever you want.

Thanks to the latest Bluetooth 4.0 connection, you can easily connect your devices wireless. Connect with your phone, computer and music players, and dive into your music collection effortlessly.

Listen to your favorite FM radio stations nearby and remember the old days. With its vintage dial, take a step into the past, but without compromising the quality sound.

This campaign is not just a Crowdfunding for us to bring MUZEN OTR Wood overseas; this is an opportunity for us to pay tribute to Radio Caroline, a pirate radio station which has inspired numerous DJs and music lovers around the world. MUZEN and one of its founders, Mr. Zeng, has decided to share 10% of the harvest in the upcoming Crowdfunding to Radio Caroline to help their broadcasts. Every purchase of a MUZEN OTR Wood will also receive a Radio Caroline souvenir pack.

Radio Caroline was founded by the visionary Ronan O’Rahilly in 1964 to circumvent the mainstream radio stations' suppression of Rock 'n' Roll music in Europe; by broadcasting 24 hours a day, Radio Caroline inspired millions of music lovers, regardless its unauthorized operation.

Despite the hostility of the British government and violent storms, Radio Caroline never gave up its dream. Assisted by the generosity of music fans, Radio Caroline has been a non-profit station to operate almost without a break since the 60s, transmitting music to listeners around the world. Inspired by the radio culture, and in salute to the free spirit of Radio Caroline, Mr. Zeng, the designer of MUZEN will launch the MUZEN OTR Wood to promote the further development of Radio Caroline.

Click here to learn more about Radio Caroline and listen to it live

Dejun Zeng, five-time winner of CES Innovation Awards; the designer of China’s first tube amplifier for sale, he has spent his entire life in designing audio and radios. In the past 30 years, Mr. Zeng has been trying hard to create his favorite audio products, and a high-quality retro-style radio is something he has longed for. In 2004, Zeng designed his first radio, the R601. He has been developing a new model every year since as a gift for himself. Among these is the prototype MUZEN. Mr.Zeng hopes to recreate the classic way to connect human and sounds, to revive the sights and sound unique to radio culture through the MUZEN OTR Wood.

 

We will hold a product launch in February 6th at NY NOW; you are invited to participate in the lucky draw, and some of you may have the honor of meeting Mr. Zeng, the representatives from Radio Caroline, and experience other products of MUZEN onsite!

We have invited bands and guests to attend the event, lots of prizes and gifts will be given away to our supporters, you may have a chance to get your MUZEN OTR Wood on site. Come to join this party! Click below image to Sign up now!

 
 
 
 
 
 
MUZEN Audio located in HongKong China, founded in 2010 by a group of hippies and Mr. Zeng, the designer of China’s first tube amplifier for sale. “Stubborn and audacious,” an unconventional spirit and desire to innovate that makes the core values of MUZEN; In 2015, MUZEN launched the first retro-style radio in China, the reception was fervent, and a cult following soon formed. The MUZEN has become a darling of consumer product, a stylish and hip label for young people.
 
 
 
 
 
We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their MUZEN OTR Wood (Radio Caroline Edition) from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.
And we are able to ship worldwide. And free shipping for US. If you have any question regarding to the shipping, Please contact cs@muzenaudio.com.
Orders placed now will begin shipping in March 2018
*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.
We are offering the exclusive early birds discount on Indiegogo. And we will donate 10% of the total fund to Radio Caroline to help their career.
 
 
 
Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the MUZEN community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
 
 
 
 

1. What’s the product dimension of the MUZEN OTR Wood (Radio Caroline Edition)?
Product dimension: 94*72*56 mm / 3.7*2.84*2.21 inch


2. How long is the battery life?
Normal volume: Bluetooth 8-10 hours, radio 20 hours; at maximum volume: Bluetooth ≥ 4 hours, radio ≥ 10 hours (after full charge).


3. How to charge the product?
Insert the supplied charging cable into the USB port on the back of the device and charge the device with a certified 5V / 500mA-2A adapter. (the adapter is not included)


4. How long does it take full charge the product?
Normally it takes 3 to 4 hours to be fully charged. (please unplug all cables upon the completion of charging); The indicator on the left side of the charging port: the red light indicates charging, and the green light means fully charged.


5. Does MUZEN OTR Wood have water resistance?
This product does not feature the a waterproof design, please pay attention to this matter when using, and the placement and storage of this product.


6. How long is the warranty?

We provide 12-month limited warranty; we also ensure cautious handling to make sure our customers will receive a Bluetooth radio free from defects.


7. When do I receive the order?
The first batch of Bluetooth speakers will be sent from the United States in March 2018, and we will keep updating our progress and expected date of delivery of the course. For delivery inquiries, please contact cs@muzenaudio.com


8. When do you start shipping?
We will ship your order on Mar. 2018. The actual arrival date of your order depends on your country and geographic location. The team will keep updating the progress for you.


9. How can I make changes to the delivery address?
If you need to update your shipping address, please contact our international customer service team: cs@muzenaudio.com.


 10. Do I need pay import duties / VAT?
The buyer is responsible for ensuring that the product can be legally imported into the country of destination. Recipients, as importers, must comply with all laws and regulations of the country of destination. Some destination countries may impose import tax, customs duties or customs clearance and other additional costs, these costs will be borne by the recipients; we cannot control and are not responsible for the costs incurred by laws and regulations of your country.


11. Do you provide the return policy?
We do not offer return service. However, we will provide a 12-month limited warranty - a free replacement service will be provided if the product is defective in quality or with a manufacturing defect. Please contact our International Customer Service email at cs@muzenaudio.com for the relevant request.


12. How can I check the order status?
To view your order or delivery status, please contact the International Customer Service team.


13. Other notes and precautions
This product does not provide a wall charger; please use a certificated 5V / 500mA-2A adaptor or computer USB interface to recharge the speaker.
story_txt:
MUZEN OTR Wood is made of natural wood. The handy retro style radio is sophisticatedly crafted capturing the essence of the classic radio designs. The exquisite sound and the smooth edges of the MUZEN OTR Wood will make you fall in love with it. Features FM, Bluetooth, three types of AUX audio input and 10-hour playtime thanks to its lithium battery. MUZEN OTR Wood is easy to operate with amazing sound quality, making it a perfect desktop radio. Embracing an extraordinary spirit and the integrity of its own belief, this special edition is designed as a tribute to Radio Caroline. 10% of the fund will be donated to Radio Caroline to help their broadcasts and keep the dream alive.Wood is lightweight and can be shape it as you please. However, it requires expertise to do it and take advantage of its properties, fortunately, we are experts. Thanks to our designer five-time winner of CES Innovation Awards, Mr. Zeng, MUZEM OTR Wood has been designed to bring the best and pleasant quality sound to your senses. Muzen OTR wood uses 1.57”(40mm) neodymium iron boron full frequency speaker which has a strong driving power, lower Q value and strong Bass. Thanks to Mr. Zeng’s half a lifetime of experience in audio production, MUZEN OTR Wood is designed aesthetically without compromising the sound quality.Extracting the best elements of radio design from the early twentieth century, the MUZEN OTR Wood is the best combination of craftsmanship and modern technology. Wherever the MUZEN OTR Wood is placed, it gives a classier and elegant look to the surroundings. Each MUZEN OTR is unique; Premium rosewood are carefully hand-selected, so each piece has a singular texture and color. Subjected trough 27 complex procedures, the quality, and individuality of the MUZEN OTR is guaranteed. Using the properties that rosewood provides to sound quality, rosewood is the best option to achieve the best quality sound,  better than any other plastic or metal speakers.Up to 10 hours of playtime with a single charge, enjoy music with the best high quality sound without interruptions. With its miniature size and different AUX ports, plug in all your devices and take your music wherever you want.Thanks to the latest Bluetooth 4.0 connection, you can easily connect your devices wireless. Connect with your phone, computer and music players, and dive into your music collection effortlessly.Listen to your favorite FM radio stations nearby and remember the old days. With its vintage dial, take a step into the past, but without compromising the quality sound.This campaign is not just a Crowdfunding for us to bring MUZEN OTR Wood overseas; this is an opportunity for us to pay tribute to Radio Caroline, a pirate radio station which has inspired numerous DJs and music lovers around the world. MUZEN and one of its founders, Mr. Zeng, has decided to share 10% of the harvest in the upcoming Crowdfunding to Radio Caroline to help their broadcasts. Every purchase of a MUZEN OTR Wood will also receive a Radio Caroline souvenir pack.Radio Caroline was founded by the visionary Ronan O’Rahilly in 1964 to circumvent the mainstream radio stations' suppression of Rock 'n' Roll music in Europe; by broadcasting 24 hours a day, Radio Caroline inspired millions of music lovers, regardless its unauthorized operation.Despite the hostility of the British government and violent storms, Radio Caroline never gave up its dream. Assisted by the generosity of music fans, Radio Caroline has been a non-profit station to operate almost without a break since the 60s, transmitting music to listeners around the world. Inspired by the radio culture, and in salute to the free spirit of Radio Caroline, Mr. Zeng, the designer of MUZEN will launch the MUZEN OTR Wood to promote the further development of Radio Caroline.Click here to learn more about Radio Caroline and listen to it liveDejun Zeng, five-time winner of CES Innovation Awards; the designer of China’s first tube amplifier for sale, he has spent his entire life in designing audio and radios. In the past 30 years, Mr. Zeng has been trying hard to create his favorite audio products, and a high-quality retro-style radio is something he has longed for. In 2004, Zeng designed his first radio, the R601. He has been developing a new model every year since as a gift for himself. Among these is the prototype MUZEN. Mr.Zeng hopes to recreate the classic way to connect human and sounds, to revive the sights and sound unique to radio culture through the MUZEN OTR Wood. We will hold a product launch in February 6th at NY NOW; you are invited to participate in the lucky draw, and some of you may have the honor of meeting Mr. Zeng, the representatives from Radio Caroline, and experience other products of MUZEN onsite!We have invited bands and guests to attend the event, lots of prizes and gifts will be given away to our supporters, you may have a chance to get your MUZEN OTR Wood on site. Come to join this party! Click below image to Sign up now!
 


     
MUZEN Audio located in HongKong China, founded in 2010 by a group of hippies and Mr. Zeng, the designer of China’s first tube amplifier for sale. “Stubborn and audacious,” an unconventional spirit and desire to innovate that makes the core values of MUZEN; In 2015, MUZEN launched the first retro-style radio in China, the reception was fervent, and a cult following soon formed. The MUZEN has become a darling of consumer product, a stylish and hip label for young people.
 

 


   We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their MUZEN OTR Wood (Radio Caroline Edition) from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.And we are able to ship worldwide. And free shipping for US. If you have any question regarding to the shipping, Please contact cs@muzenaudio.com.Orders placed now will begin shipping in March 2018*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.We are offering the exclusive early birds discount on Indiegogo. And we will donate 10% of the total fund to Radio Caroline to help their career.   Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the MUZEN community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!    1. What’s the product dimension of the MUZEN OTR Wood (Radio Caroline Edition)?Product dimension: 94*72*56 mm / 3.7*2.84*2.21 inch2. How long is the battery life?Normal volume: Bluetooth 8-10 hours, radio 20 hours; at maximum volume: Bluetooth ≥ 4 hours, radio ≥ 10 hours (after full charge).3. How to charge the product?Insert the supplied charging cable into the USB port on the back of the device and charge the device with a certified 5V / 500mA-2A adapter. (the adapter is not included)4. How long does it take full charge the product?Normally it takes 3 to 4 hours to be fully charged. (please unplug all cables upon the completion of charging); The indicator on the left side of the charging port: the red light indicates charging, and the green light means fully charged.5. Does MUZEN OTR Wood have water resistance?This product does not feature the a waterproof design, please pay attention to this matter when using, and the placement and storage of this product.6. How long is the warranty?We provide 12-month limited warranty; we also ensure cautious handling to make sure our customers will receive a Bluetooth radio free from defects.7. When do I receive the order?The first batch of Bluetooth speakers will be sent from the United States in March 2018, and we will keep updating our progress and expected date of delivery of the course. For delivery inquiries, please contact cs@muzenaudio.com8. When do you start shipping?We will ship your order on Mar. 2018. The actual arrival date of your order depends on your country and geographic location. The team will keep updating the progress for you.9. How can I make changes to the delivery address?If you need to update your shipping address, please contact our international customer service team: cs@muzenaudio.com. 10. Do I need pay import duties / VAT?The buyer is responsible for ensuring that the product can be legally imported into the country of destination. Recipients, as importers, must comply with all laws and regulations of the country of destination. Some destination countries may impose import tax, customs duties or customs clearance and other additional costs, these costs will be borne by the recipients; we cannot control and are not responsible for the costs incurred by laws and regulations of your country.11. Do you provide the return policy?We do not offer return service. However, we will provide a 12-month limited warranty - a free replacement service will be provided if the product is defective in quality or with a manufacturing defect. Please contact our International Customer Service email at cs@muzenaudio.com for the relevant request.12. How can I check the order status?To view your order or delivery status, please contact the International Customer Service team.13. Other notes and precautionsThis product does not provide a wall charger; please use a certificated 5V / 500mA-2A adaptor or computer USB interface to recharge the speaker.

story:
ZuperDAC, The Portable HiFi USB-DAC by Zorloo. We just want to bring HiFi music enjoyment to everyone. ZuperDAC transforms your existing PC, Mac, Android, iPhone and Raspberry Pi into a HiFi music system. Plug in ZuperDAC to a USB port and it will faithfully reproduce the music with all the details. Connect to your headphone or speaker system for great music anytime, anywhere.


Less is More

ZuperDAC measures just 46mm(L) x 23mm(W) x 10mm(H) (excluding the USB connector) and weighs only 16g. It is housed in an Aluminum casing with 2 matte color options, Gold and Silver. The Aluminum casing provides solid protection to the inside electronics as well as interference shielding. Even in such a small size, we still manage to incorporate full USB Audio Class 2 functionality, HiFi AudioDAC and Headphone Amplifier.


Anytime & Anywhere

You can carry ZuperDAC around without even noticing it. It is the perfect companion for your PC & smartphone as it instantly upgrades your audio system to HiFi quality. No matter you are at work or having fun, you can enjoy HiFi music anytime and anywhere you want. 


4x Sampling Frequency


High Definition Audio standard record music at 192kHz versus CD at 44.1kHz, meaning 4x more samples are recorded and more details are revealed. ZuperDAC supports all different sampling frequencies up to 192kHz so you can play all versions of music recording. Be it CD or High-Definition grade, you are now fully equipped.


1.5x Bit-Depth Resolution

Regular CD recording uses only 16-bit representation for each channel but latest recording technology has been beefed up to High-Definition 24-bit. It is like measuring with a higher precision ruler. ZuperDAC supports up to 24-bit and you can now enjoy all the latest High Definition music without compromise.


World Class HiFi AudioDAC

The AudioDAC is the mastermind in the USB-DAC design. At ZuperDAC, we used the best HiFi grade ESS Sabre ES9018K2M AudioDAC. With its patented 32-bit Hyperstream DAC architecture and Time Domain Jitter Eliminator, it faithfully reconstructs the original music.  You will be surprised to find all the details you have missed before.


Integrated Headphone Amplifier

A USB-DAC won't be complete without a good headphone amplifier. ZuperDAC uses the latest ESS ES9601 headphone driver. It delivers unmatched performance for audio headphone or line-out output. With its pop-noise suppression design, you are free of any unwanted power-up and power-down noise. You can just plug in your headphone and immerse in HiFi music.


Multi-Platform Support



ZuperDAC is fully compatible with USB Audio Class 2 (192kHz, 24-bit) specification. That means it is plug and play compatible with Mac OS X and Ubuntu. Windows default only support USB Audio Class 1 (96kHz, 24-bit) and we provide USB Audio Class 2 driver for Windows to unleash ZuperDAC full potential. By using an OTG cable, you can connect ZuperDAC to Android mobile phone (if it supports OTG and USB Audio, see our compatibility list*). For iOS mobile phone, you can use the Apple Lightning to USB Camera adapter to connect ZuperDAC. ZuperDAC also works with Raspberry Pi 2 with Volumio Audiophile Music Player Distribution.

Cable and adapter not included.


Special Edition - RED

For the passionate ones, why not get the ZuperDAC in color red? It is a special edition that we created for this campaign. Use it to energize you with music and be different.


Perks Summary


Shipping Cost

Shipping to US, China and Hong Kong is free*. For shipment to Canada, there is a $5 shipping cost. For the rest of the world, there is a $10 shipping cost. You can add the extra $5 or $10 shipping as a contribution when you select the perk check out. In case you forgot to put in the shipping contribution, you can select the above $5 or $10 shipping perk and enter with the same email address as your original perk contribution.

* Free shipping to US and China only applies during the Indiegogo campaign period. Starting with the InDemand, the shipping fee is being adjusted.


The Birth of ZuperDAC

Computer and smartphone excel at computation, storage and connectivity. However, due to different design constraints like space, interference and cost, it is hard to build a good computer or smartphone audio system. 

USB-DAC (Digital to Analog Converter) is an elegant solution to solve this problem. By streaming raw digital audio data through USB to the USB-DAC, it bypass the internal audio system and reconstruct HiFi music externally. 

When we look at existing USB-DAC products, they are mostly bulky and expensive. We therefore decided to build one.

ZuperDAC is a truly portable USB-DAC at only 11 cm3 and 16 gram. It is based on ESS ES9018K2M HiFi grade AudioDAC and supports USB Audio Class 2 192kHz 24-bit resolution. It supports Windows 7/8, OS X Yosemite, Ubuntu, iOS and Android*. That means you can use it anytime and anywhere.

We would like to build HiFi audio product affordable by all music lovers. We hope that you can support our vision. ZuperDAC is now offered as a reward for the early bird adopter at $49. This is a truly portable HiFi USB-DAC that you can contribute to make it real.


Technical Specification


*Android Compatibility List

Due to segmentation of Android and the hardware design, we cannot guarantee the compatibility of ZuperDAC with every Android phone. We have tested ZuperDAC to work with the following phones:

  • Samsung Galaxy S3/S4/S5/S6/S6 Edge
  • Samsung Note 2/3/4/Edge
  • LG G2 Pro/G3/G4
  • Google Nexus 5/6
  • Sony Xperia Z1/Z2/Z3
Some phones like HTC M7/M8 and Oneplus One will disable volume control at USB audio operation (Volume key can only turn on or off USB audio output). If you use it with a headphone, there is no way to control output volume level (which is set at the maximum level and may be harmful to your ears). If you connect to an external powered speaker or amplifier with volume control, it should work well.

Frequently Asked Questions


Timeline


Risk

We already have working prototype tested on various platforms. PCBA design finished. Aluminum casing CNC sample done and going for production tooling soon. Windows USB Audio Class 2 driver tested. Embedded software development completed and undergoing more rigorous test. The remaining task is to align with our manufacturing partners to get it produced. The risk should be minimum and we expect to deliver in July time frame.
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
Harsaa is a compact wireless Bluetooth earbud packed with all of today’s biggest tech features. While most wireless earbuds will play music, we find they are generally designed around just one or two specific features. 

 

Harsaa was not satisfied with that. We have designed our earbuds to take advantage of all the latest technology trends. Whether you are at work or play, Harsaa  has a mode designed to make your life easier, and more enjoyable.

Harsaa’s ergonomic design is so comfortable you can wear it anywhere, and small enough to be nearly invisible. 

 

Harsaa’s Bluetooth technology allows lightning fast and crystal clear communication between your mobile device and your Harsaa earbuds, in a package so small, comfortable, and easy to use, that you’ll never want to take them out. Listen to the music you like, or maybe your favorite audio book, anywhere and any time. 

 

But Harsaa are more than just great earbuds for talking on the phone or listening to music. They are much, much more.

 

Just look at our long list of features:

Safety and Awareness

 

 

 

Yes, we live in a dangerous, crazy world, and as much as we would like to drown it all out, we know that is not always the safest thing to do. Whether you are driving your car through traffic or walking down the sidewalk, it is essential that you are aware of what is going on around you. Believe it or not, the number of people who have suffered injury or death while wearing headphones has nearly tripled in the last six years. Why? This is because other earphones block out too much external noise. Wearers are unable to hear approaching traffic, warning shouts, car horns, or even an approaching train, causing them to have been badly hurt or even killed. Many lives could have been saved if the victim had heard the warnings. With Harsaa you can enjoy your tunes and still be safe. Simply tap your earpiece once and you can safely listen to your music and still hear traffic, car horns, or other warning signals.

 

Fitness Tracking

 

 

If fitness is an important part of your lifestyle, the waterproof and sweat resistant Harsaa is your perfect workout partner.

No more sweaty fitness bands to deal with. Harsaa’s Fitness Mode will track your steps, distance, speed, and time, along with calories and heart rate, all while listening to your favorite tunes.  Who could ask for more?

 

 

 

 

If biking or jogging is your thing, not to worry, Workout Mode still allows you to hear the cars and traffic noise that other earphone may block out. And with its comfortable ergonomic fit, Harsaa will stay put during the most rigorous of activities.

 

 

 

Noise cancellation

 

 

Who doesn’t need a good night sleep. Are noisy neighbors, or their dogs keeping you up? Hoping to sleep through a long plane trip? How about a snoring partner in your own bed? 

 

 

Harsaa's noise cancellation function will block outside noises and give you a peaceful sleep.

 

Sleep mode will also track your breathing, helping detect hidden sleep disorders.

 

 

After your great night of sleep, it is important to start your day off on a high note.

 

 

Each of us is born with an internal alarm clock. Without an external alarm you would wake up at the best time for you.

But that is not always practical. Harsaa is designed to monitor your sleep cycles and gently wake you during your lightest sleep phase just before your external alarm. 

NFC

 

 

Harsaa offers Near-Field-Communication (NFC) tap-and-go sharing. Simply swipe the ear-bud over your smart phone to transfer any information you choose. Meet a new friend while out? Simply remove your Harsaa earbud and tap it over the other person's phone and their contact details will instantly be transferred to you. 

Any electronic lock can be programmed so that you can gain physical access to it, like at a gym or commercial office building. Members or employees need only tap Harsaa to the door to unlock and open it.
 
You can also tap your ear-bud to automatically change the settings of mobile devices such as volume or Wi-Fi network, open an app, pair multiple Bluetooth devices, and more. 

 

 

Panic function

 

 

Most women keep their phone in their purse while men tend to keep them in a pocket, not always the easiest to access in a stressful emergency situation.  For example; what if you found yourself alone in a dark parking lot or park late at night, and are approached or attacked by a stranger. Finding your phone and dialling for help takes time and composure, something you probably won’t have in a stressful situation like this. We have the answer, simply tap your Harsaa and signal your mobile phone to sound an alarm. This will send your surprised attacker running fast. 

 

What if you are in an accident, or you’ve fallen and you can’t get up. What do you do? Easy, you tap your Harsaa to send an emergency “I need help,” message to a pre-programmed relative or friend. 

Charging:

 

We know how busy you are so each set of wireless Harsaa earbuds comes complete with its own stylish mobile charging case so you can re-charge your Harsaa anywhere and any time.

 

 

And each case is small enough to fit into a pocket or key chain for your convenience. 

 
Technical Specs
Weight : Earbuds - 4.75 Grams , Case - 60 grams
Dimensions : Earbuds - 13.5 mm Dia and 19mm Length
Battery Time : 12 Hours combined (Earbuds and Battery case)
Charging Time : 20 minutes
Compatibility : Android, iOS and Windows devices with Bluetooth 3.0 and 4.0

We know how busy you are so each set of wireless Harsaa earbuds comes complete with its own stylish mobile charging case so you can re-charge your Harsaa anywhere and any time.
 

 

And each case is small enough to fit into a pocket or key chain for your convenience.  Technical Specs
Weight : Earbuds - 4.75 Grams , Case - 60 grams
Dimensions : Earbuds - 13.5 mm Dia and 19mm Length
Battery Time : 12 Hours combined (Earbuds and Battery case)
Charging Time : 20 minutes
Compatibility : Android, iOS and Windows devices with Bluetooth 3.0 and 4.0

story:
AI TWS Earbuds combine the features of a smart voice assistant with truly wireless earbuds to give you a seamless, hands-free lifestyle experience. 

 

AI true wireless earbuds are based on a break-through technological platform developed by Qualcomm, that leads the industry in voice control functionality, and allows for ultra-low power consumption with up to 7 hours of battery life on a single charge. Say “Hello Voice Q” to activate the smart assistant on your mobile device, and ask away!

 

Say “Hello Voice Q” to activate the smart assistant on your device. Control your music, volume, calls, directions, and more -- without lifting a finger. 

 

Now you can switch a song or answer the call without a single tap or swipe.

 

Quick command

Give direct voice commands for commonly used functions.

AI Voice Assistant TWS Earbuds integrates two kinds of voice commands for better user experience.

 

⭐Local Voice Commands: 

- Say the following local command phrases when using the music player APP:

"Next song" "Previous song"

-Say the following local command phrases when receiving a phone call: 

"Accept call" "Reject call"

 

⭐Smart Voice Assitant Commands:

- If you want the earbuds to conduct higher-level skills such as:

"Call ...."

"Set an alarm at...."  

"How's the weather today?"  

"Send a message to ...."

"Navigate to...." 

Just say the magic words "Hello Voice Q" to wake up the AI-Voice Assistant.

          

 

With advanced AI-based recognition technology, quickly learn an individual’s speech and voice patterns. Bone Voiceprint ID is not only helping to make devices more reliable and security-rich but also supporting digital personal assistants to be smarter and more responsive than ever.  

 

 

Compared to its predecessor, this new Bluetooth protocol increases data transmission speeds by 2.5x, data volume by 10x, and for the first time ever, connects over IPV6 to decrease energy consumption and provide you with a safer way to access the internet and protect your privacy.

 

Qualcomm TrueWireless Stereo technologies support a truly wire-free listening experience, with robust connectivity when making calls and listening to music, and easier pairing experience, balanced power distribution between earbuds for longer usage time.

 

 

 

Qualcomm® apt-X Audio ensures you receive the highest possible sound quality from your Bluetooth® audio device.

 

 

CVC Noise Isolation Technology, combined with Dual-mic ENC Noise Cancellation works cohesively together to optimize your call and sound quality by drowning out background noise.

 

 

 

With high-efficiency micro-battery,  AI True Wireless Earbuds will keep you immersed in your favorite tunes for up to 7 hours on a single charge.

*When you’re running low on power, a quick 15-minutes charging powers your earbuds with up to 2 hours of playback.

 

* Actual battery life and charging time may vary and depend on usage conditions.

 

 

For added convenience, AI True Wireless Earbuds comes with 2 methods of charging. Charge wirelessly with a QI enabled pad, or use a USB-C cable. So, your best companion is always ready to go.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Wearing ergonomic in-ear design with 3 pairs of replaceable ear tips ensures fit and comfortable wearing.

 

 

With the IPX5 water-resistant design, you don't need to worry about exposure to sweat and rain. capable of resisting high-pressure, heavy sprays of water making them sweat-proof and splash-proof.

story:
Did you know that any noise louder than 85 decibels can potentially cause permanent hearing damage? Every day people all over the world are putting their hearing at risk in ignorance as they expose their hearing to damaging noises. At ProSounds, our number one priority is to take care of your hearing for you so you can focus on doing what you love – no matter how loud it may be!

The H2P gives you the best of both worlds by combining high-quality hearing enhancement with simultaneous hearing protection. Made from the ground up with the latest and greatest hearing technology, you will never have to miss out on the sounds you want to hear in order to preserve your hearing.


These universal application devices are easy to operate and can be used in literally any situation where loud noise in a concern. 

The H2P lets you control your hearing experience by offering three unique styles of tips:

  • Foam Tip: This tip offers the most protection (30 dB)
  • Silicone Tip: The silicone tip gives you the comfort (24 dB)
  • Tulip Tip: This unique tip is small and doesn’t completely plug up the ear canal. This allows for natural sound to pass through the canal, letting the user experience a blend of enhanced as well as natural noise.

The state-of-the-art technology of the H2P has been fine-tuned through a long and meticulous developmental process.

Even though the H2P is not technically a hearing aid, it can be extremely beneficial to people who are hard of hearing or for those who want to use it for every day use. Most hearing aids on the market come with a very high price tag, but the H2P offers the most competitive hearing enhancement capabilities at a reasonable price. 

The H2P has a sleek and stylish design that allows you to wear them inconspicuously inside the ear canal for extended periods of time without sacrificing any comfort or performance. 

We have some amazing free extras in store for our backers if we hit these stretch goals! So far we have surpassed our first stretch goal of $100,000 and we have high hopes to meet all of them. The more funds raised in this campaign the more free stuff our backers will receive. It's a win-win!

For over 20 years ProSounds has been dedicated to educating the public on the dangers of hearing loss and how to prevent it. With your generous support, we'll be able to manufacture and release the H2Ps to market at a faster rate and better accomplish our purpose of helping improve the lives of millions of people through better hearing health. Thank you for your support!

What kind of batteries does the H2P use?

The H2P uses size 10 Zinc Air batteries – one for each ear. Please see our “Extra Batteries” perk if wanting to purchase extra batteries.

How long do the batteries last?
The batteries last up to 140 hours.

Does the H2P have an on/off switch?

Yes. Turning the volume dial clockwise turns the volume up; turning it counter-clockwise turns it down. Once turned all the way down, you feel the sticking point that turns it off.

When will the shipping process begin?

We will be shipping orders chronologically at the end of November.

Can the H2P be used as a hearing aid?

The H2P can enhance hearing up to 6x the normal hearing level, which can be very helpful for those who are hard of hearing. Even though the H2P is not technically a hearing aid, it can easily be used for hearing assistance.

story:
Finally, custom molded wireless earphones! DECIBULLZ WIRELESS are easily and quickly shaped by the user to their unique ears. This is the future of earphones: anatomically inspired wearable tech!

Decibullz Wireless Earphones just received a 2016 Consumer Electronics Innovation Award and our wired earphones were selected by USA Today's Reviewed.com as the BEST EARPHONES OF 2015!  
  • The FIRST custom molded wireless earphones!
  • Easily shaped in minutes.
  • $89 Indiegogo price.
  • Small and light. 
  • Award winning design. 
  • Unique custom-fit earpieces keep Decibullz Wireless secure and comfortable while providing superior noise isolation.
  • New Easy Fit system makes shaping and re-shaping simple and fast. Heat the earpieces in hot water and shape them to your ears. That's it!
  • The latest Bluetooth® technology for top audio quality and performance.
  • Perfect for music, video, and voice calls.
  • 7 great color options for extra customizations.
  • Fully compatible with most smartphones, tablets and computers.
  • In-line remote and microphone. 


Decibullz Wireless earphones combine easily formed custom-molded earpieces with the latest in wireless audio technology.


The Decibullz earpieces are unique in audio. These proprietary custom molds soften in hot water and lose temperature rapidly while maintaining their moldable properties. This allows the earpieces to be shaped comfortably to the ear. Once cooled the earpieces retain their shape until re-heated. Decibullz earpieces are the only earpieces that can be re-heated and re-shaped as many times as desired. 



Combining innovative Decibullz earpieces with state-of-the-art wireless technology gives Decibullz Wireless 'wired' audio quality. The all-new sound engine is specially tuned for use with the custom molds. These new earphones have a powerful, clear and balanced sound.


We believe in listening to what you love while doing what you love. We were tired of poor-fitting, uncomfortable earphones so we created an earphone that will stay in and stay comfortable no matter what you are doing. Decibullz Wireless are perfect for any activity from extreme sports to just relaxing to your favorite playlist.


The new Easy Fit system makes it even easier to shape and re-shape the custom earpieces. Simply heat the Decibullz mold and silicone tip in hot water, snap on the Decibullz earphone and shape them to your ears. If for any reason you're not happy with your fit just remove, re-heat and re-shape. The whole process takes less than 10 minutes!


Decibullz Wireless earphones feature the most advanced sound engine we have ever created. We worked with top audio specialists to create custom 9mm drivers. We then tuned the new drivers for use with our custom earpieces. The result is a powerful, clean and balanced sound. 


The Decibullz earpieces provide superior noise isolation. Our double seal system can provide up to 40 decibels of protection across the frequency range. Headphones in, world out.


These earphones are built to last. And they sound awesome! Each earphone is carefully machined out of a solid block of aluminum. The new premium cables and components are stronger than ever. Having a connecting wire allows for longer battery life, combined charging and around-the-neck wearability. It also acts as a lanyard so earphones don't get lost or separated. We have selected a larger driver that is powerful without compromising sound quality.


Customize your Decibullz Wireless even further with your choice of 7 great colors.


Take control of your smartphone with the Decibullz Wireless control unit. Decibullz Wireless are compatible with most smartphones, tablets and computers that support Bluetooth® audio streaming. 


  • New Easy Fit Earpieces
  • Small and Light Design
  • Machined Metal Earphones 
  • Remote and Microphone with Volume Control 
  • Voice Control Compatible
  • 5-hour Battery Life (approx.)
  • 150-hours Standby Time
  • Bluetooth® 4.1 (HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP)
  • 9mm Performance Drivers
  • 35 Foot Range
  • Frequency Range: 20 Hz to 20 kHz
  • Up to 40dB Noise Isolation
  • Sweat proof and water resistant
  • iOS Battery Status Monitor
  • Decibullz Wireless or Wired earphones (2)
  • Two Easy Fit Earpieces Left and Right (3) 
  • Micro USB Charging Cable (1)
  • Silicone Ear Canal Tips Small, Medium, Large (5)
  • Two Isolating Foam Ear Canal Tips (4)
  • Decibullz Insulated and Waterproof Hard Case (6)
  • Earplug Adapters (not pictured)


In 2014 with the help of  backers we were able to create the first DIY custom molded earphones. This first-generation earphone won a CES Innovation and Engineering Award, USA Today's Reviewed.com Editors Choice Award, and USA Today's Reviewed.com Best Earphone of 2015 Award!

We learned so much while creating this first-generation product. We have applied everything we learned to create this next generation of earphones. These products are higher quality, better sounding and more durable than the previous generation.



In 2014 we were able to produce the world's first heat-molded earphones! The crowdfunding community was so instrumental in helping us get off the ground that we couldn't imagine building our next product without them.


$49 Decibullz Wired 
  • Wired version of our new earphones (not wireless)
  • Machined metal earphones
  • Premium tangle-free cables
  • Remote and microphone
  • New Easy Fit custom mold system
  • 7 great color choices
  • Decibullz logo carrying case
  • Regular retail price $79
$89 Decibullz Wireless Earphones
  • Decibullz Wireless Earphones
  • New Easy Fit custom mold system
  • Remote and microphone
  • Micro USB charging cable
  • 7 great color choices 
  • Decibullz logo carrying case
  • Regular retail price $149
$129 Decibullz Wireless Superpack 
  • Decibullz Wireless Earphones
  • Includes 7 sets of molds (one set of every color)
  • New Easy Fit custom mold system 
  • Remote and microphone 
  • Micro USB charging cable
  • 7 great colors
  • Decibullz logo carrying case
$175 Decibullz Wireless Earphones 2-Pack 
  • Two sets of Decibullz Wireless Earphones
  • Machined metal earphones 
  • New Easy Fit custom mold system 
  • Remote and microphone
  • Micro USB charging cables
  • Decibullz logo carrying cases
  • 7 great color choices

$19 Decibullz Earplugs Special Edition

  • Noise blocking only for music and audio choose one of our Custom Molded Wireless Earphone rewards. 
  • One set of Decibullz Custom Molded Noise Blocking Earplugs
  • Top Rated NRR Rating 31dB
  • New Easy Fit custom mold system 
  • 7 great color choices 
  • Decibullz logo carrying pouch 
  • Regular retail price $26

Know anyone who might want to join you on Team Decibullz? Share our campaign with them through the "Share This Project" button at the top. Don't forget to follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for the latest Decibullz updates. 

Decibullz® products are Patented
