story:
Ember Blaze is the true innovation in wireless audio technology. Discover an incredible acoustic experience like no other in one pair of compact and wireless earbuds.

Ember Blaze is the ultimate freedom from wires without compromising the quality of sound. The Ember Audio team has carefully crafted Ember Blaze to make sure of its quality from inside out. Designed with custom dynamic drivers, each earbud delivers deep lows without overshadowing the clear, crisp highs. Ember Blaze is built with high performance materials – a combination of Silicone and ABS polycarbonate blend to make each earbud sweat-proof.

Ember Blaze gives top of the line sound quality at an affordable price because we believe that high quality does not equate to high cost. And customers deserve nothing but great value.

 

                                  GET 40% OFF OF THE $129 RETAIL PRICE

Video Testimonial 

 

 

 

Set of Earbuds  - One pair of Ember Blaze True Wireless Earbuds 

Charging Case - Charges your Ember Blaze Earbuds for 3 additional times

Foam and Silicone tips - The key to superior fit, designed to keep earbuds from falling off  

Travel Sack - The on-the-go companion to carry the earbuds along with the accessories

Micro-USB Cable - A cable to recharge the charging cradle

 

 Ember Blaze has been designed around hundreds of ears to come up with a suprisingly comfortable fit that you can wear all day long.

 

 

Each set of Ember Blaze Earbuds comes with 3 sets of silicone sleeves with various length bud locks to fit everyone's ears.

 

  Ember Blaze will be available intwo colors, black and white.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Eric Johnson

Co-Creator of Ember Blaze

With over 25 years experience in consumer electronics, Mr. Johnson has held various positions from senior executive experience from Advance Micro Devices and Digital Equipment Corporation, to starting several of his own successful startups which focused on electronic technology.

As a former US Navy Pilot, Mr. Johnson was the top rated officer in his squadron being presented several operational medals including the Navy Achievement Medal. He holds a Bachelor of Science from the U.S. Naval Academy in Engineering Management.                                                  

Eric Johnson leads a team with over 80 years of combined experience under their collective belts. His team has produced many products from concept to market such as Ouya, Lytrocam, and Fitbit. They take pride in all of their accomplishments, and with all their experience, they are here to bring high quality audio products to the world.

   Set of Earbuds  - One pair of Ember Blaze True Wireless Earbuds Charging Case - Charges your Ember Blaze Earbuds for 3 additional timesFoam and Silicone tips - The key to superior fit, designed to keep earbuds from falling off  Travel Sack - The on-the-go companion to carry the earbuds along with the accessoriesMicro-USB Cable - A cable to recharge the charging cradle  Ember Blaze has been designed around hundreds of ears to come up with a suprisingly comfortable fit that you can wear all day long.  Each set of Ember Blaze Earbuds comes with 3 sets of silicone sleeves with various length bud locks to fit everyone's ears.   Ember Blaze will be available intwo colors, black and white.       Eric JohnsonCo-Creator of Ember BlazeWith over 25 years experience in consumer electronics, Mr. Johnson has held various positions from senior executive experience from Advance Micro Devices and Digital Equipment Corporation, to starting several of his own successful startups which focused on electronic technology.As a former US Navy Pilot, Mr. Johnson was the top rated officer in his squadron being presented several operational medals including the Navy Achievement Medal. He holds a Bachelor of Science from the U.S. Naval Academy in Engineering Management.                                                  Eric Johnson leads a team with over 80 years of combined experience under their collective belts. His team has produced many products from concept to market such as Ouya, Lytrocam, and Fitbit. They take pride in all of their accomplishments, and with all their experience, they are here to bring high quality audio products to the world.

story:
Intro

Blending inspiration, power and ease of use, we created the perfect evolution of the concept of tactile controller. Built on the foundation of our first class touch interfaces (LS1lightstrip and LP1lightplane), found today on thousands of eurorack systems around the world, we designed a beautiful work of art and technology.

(arches) put a never seen before set of controllers at your fingertips. Sliders, lightstrips (with rec/loop capabilities), lightplanes/thumbpads with z-axis sensitivity and a row of pressure sensitive buttons. Behind those state of the art touch controllers lies a high-speed microcontroller that joins the elements to create keyboards, sequencers, arpeggiators and, finally, your perfect performance setup. The following video sows just the basics in controlling modular synth, drums and entire voices:

 

Soundmachines know-how in capacitive touch control surface is unparalleled in eurorack. With thousands of LS1lightstrips and LP1lightplanes in the market, is the name to consider when talking about reliable, simple and flawless touch CV generators/recorders. Following customer’s requests and nurturing interest for integrated, easy to use and alternative control interfaces, we came up with a series of ideas that adapted our robust technology to earlier concepts developed by the fathers of the modular synthesizers. The key target was the design and implementation of a carefully conceived product with the maximum attention to usability, highest possible degree of functionalities and an affordable pricing.

 

Functions

(arches) is a powerful user interface capable of interacting with many instruments and systems thanks to its 30+ CV/GATE outputs and full MIDI connectivity (DIN, USB and wireless MIDI over BLE):

Pressure sensitive buttons: Each of those buttons can be configured to ourput  GATE and CV signals or to be a part of an 8 buttons keyboard. Each buttons will output a pitch information and an overall 'pressure' information will be available to a separate CV out or midi #CC.

Sliders and Lightstrips: 12 slider-type elements can be configured either as indiviual elements (with configurable range, midi channel, quantization and CV standard) or grouped together in one of the many keyboard configurations (see below). You can assign each element to a couple of I/O jacks (CV and GATE)
 
 
Thumbpads/Lightplanes: Just under your thumbs lies a couple of sensitive three-dimensional surfaces (X-Y-Z) that are available as standard outputs all the time. They can also optionally generate gate information.
 

Virtual Keyboards:

(arches) can create up to three concurrent independent keyboards, each one with its own set of outputs and its own arpeggiator. For each of the keyboards you can define the standard (eurorack, buchla, v/hz), the note associated with every ‘element’ and the MIDI channel. With this powerful modularity you can control up to three voices for melodic and rhythmic stuff, having the free lightplanes as a mean of modulating other parameters of your setup/patch. On top of this you have the layered functionalities that can run in parallel (one 8 step sequencer and one 8step, 5 track drum sequencer).

monophonic full keyboard: 12 elements:

 
8 pressure sensitive buttons keyboard:
 
 left hand, six elements keyboard:
 
right hand, six elements keyboard:
 
central 8 elements keyboard:
 
12 keys polyphonic (three voices + expression) keybard:
 

 

Concept and prototypes:

 
The concept of (arches)  evolved during time and crystallized in the final design after moving through several phases. We  started with a rough sketch that served the purpose to understand better what can and cannot be improved with a control device like this:
 
 
 
And then some more visually enhanced designs came to the surface:
 
 
and:
 
We then decided the (arches) to be a single stand-alone unit, and so we included the configuration interface and the jack bay on the right part of the product, freezing the final design:
 
The first printed circuit board was designed and this is the picture of the result:
 
A few prototype (arches) were manufactured to start the firmware development and  the limited function (arches) was finally presented at the Berlin Superbooth in May!

story:
Bone conduction audio is a revolutionary new achievement in audio technology that allows you to hear crystal clear sound without putting anything into your ears. MusicLens’ custom-designed bone conduction speakers rest outside the ear and send audio signals through the skin and bone via vibrations. This means you experience your music in striking clarity while still being able to hear the world around you. Keeping your ear canals empty and your senses sharp is a safer, healthier, and more comfortable way to listen to music.

                                           

 

 

MusicLens’ location of the speaker is the best place of bone conduction transmission, and MusicLens is the only brand in the market who build speaker in this place with our unique patent. The sound quality of this spot will be four times better than any other place.

 

 

MusicLens are the only smart glasses with bone conduction audio that features enhanced bass. Experience truly dynamic sound whether you’re into hip hop, jazz, or pop with booming bass that gives you a front row seat to all your favorite bands.

Another benefit of MusicLens’ bone conduction speakers is that they are imperceptible to anyone around you. No one will know you’re listening to music even if you have the volume turned up to the max. This is because MusicLens speakers work by sending vibrations into your skin, not by blasting your eardrums with the sound that can easily disturb coworkers, passengers on public transport, or a partner who’s trying to sleep.

 

 

Another benefit of MusicLens’ bone conduction speakers is that they are imperceptible to anyone around you. No one will know you’re listening to music. This is because MusicLens speakers work by sending vibrations into your skin, not by blasting your eardrums with the sound that can easily disturb coworkers, passengers on public transport, or a partner who’s trying to sleep.

 

 

No more fumbling around with your phone when there is an incoming call. Keep your eyes on the road and hands on the steering wheel or the bike handlebar. Answer the call with MusicLens and stay safe while driving and cycling.

As MusicLens delivers music via vibration, it’s a perfect audio solution for the hard of hearing. Those who have suffered some hearing loss will be able to hear better and more clearly with MusicLens.

 

 

 

 

 

Our sunglasses use premium polarized lenses that block 98% percent of UV rays and inferred radiation. “Modern” and “Vogue” style both come with this polarized lens. The default lens of “Geek” style is a plain plastic lens that you need to replace to your prescription lens. Any style can have prescription lenses customized to your prescription. Get more information about the prescription lens here.

 

 

Upgrade your MusicLens to include a 4GB storage and start listening to music whenever, wherever. This allows you to store thousands of songs directly into the glasses. No WiFi issues, connection failures, or drained batteries will keep you from the music you love. You can purchase the “4GB Storage Perk” separately to upgrade your MusicLens!

An industry first, MusicLens features a state-of-the-art battery that lasts up to 80% longer than that of other smart glasses. Perfect for long trips, full work days, and all night study sessions, MusicLens won’t quit until you’re ready.

If you find yourself low on battery, don’t worry. MusicLens has a faster charge time than any of its competitors. Just a 30-minute charge will provide 6-9 hours of audio playback.

 

MusicLens has an IP54 water and dust resistance rating, so you never have to worry about breaking a sweat or exposure to the elements. Wear them to the gym, the beach, or in almost any kind of weather. MusicLens are built to accompany you anywhere and everywhere, and with their life-proof design, you’ll never have to think about taking them off.

Hold the “Switch” button for 5 seconds to activate Al voice assistants on your phone, such as Siri, Alexa, Bixby, Google Assistant, etc.

Micro-sensors are built into Musiclens‘s frame,allowing you to control all of its functions with a tap or a slide of the finger. Adjust the volume,answer calls,or play and pause your music with button-free simplicity.

 

MusicLens recognizes when you’re wearing them and when you’re not, so you don’t have to worry about pressing the “Pause” button every time you take them off. The second you remove them, MusicLens will automatically stop playing music, saving your battery life and giving you one less thing to do.

                                            

Choose from multiple trendy frames and coordinate MusicLens to your unique sense of style. Whether you’re into dreadlocks, black ties, beanies, or Prada bags, there’s a pair of MusicLens to accentuate your look. Choose from: Vogue, Modern, and Geek. Choose the one that fits your personality - stay fashionable when grooving with the music!

 

MusicLens smart glasses have their own unique look and feels better than any other pair of trendy sunglasses. Weighing as little as 37g (about the same weight as 2 AAA batteries), Music Lens are perfect to wear whether you are going on an adventure or going out for a quick walk. Made for daily use and comfortable wear, MusicLens will never weigh you down.

 

MusicLens provides a prescription or special lens service, so your eyes won’t get in the way of your ears. Simply add the prescription lens perk when placing an order and provide the requested Rx data. Our team of optometrists will then customize your lenses and send them directly to you.  Click here to get customized lens

                                           

 

 

 
 

MusicLens is already in the mass production phase, which means you won’t have to wait long to get yours. Orders are expected to ship within 1-4 weeks. Once orders ship, delivery time is estimated at 1 to 60 days depending on your location. With sunny spring just around the corner, now is the perfect time to upgrade your life with a new pair of smart shades or trendy glasses!

 

 

For more information about MusicLens，please visit

www.music-lens.com

For media and blogger cooperation, please email

business@music-lens.com

For wholesale and retail cooperation, please email

sales@music-lens.com

story:
AWESOME FEATURES

A2 AirBuds are the best TWS earphones on the market. We've spent the last 10 years designing and creating products for a variety of brands world wide.

We've taken what we consider to be the most useful functions across all earphones and integrated them into this tiny form, only 28mm x 1.6mm encased in metal for ultimate durability.

No other wireless buds give you as much

The A2 AirBuds magnetically pull into place in the charge/carry dock, which also has a USB out to double as a power booster for your smartphone or any other USB device.

Made to look no bigger than wired earphones!

 

Who is GoGoGadget?

We’d like to introduce ourselves: our small team has come together from the USA, UK, and Asia to create GoGoGadget.

Our focus is to bring to you the best gadgets for the best value.

We’ve worked closely with manufacturers across Europe and Asia delivering quality electronics for brands and retailers internationally for over 10 years, including many products you may have backed on Indiegogo and other crowdfunding platforms.

Our mission now is to cut out the middle man and bring them direct to you...

 

It sounds simple, because it is…

We consult with manufacturers on numerous products each month, and the ones we love the most we’re taking to crowdfunding to bring you the latest gadgets at the best possible price, AND with the quickest delivery!

The challenge for us is to reach the volumes or funding targets to allow us to do this, so spread the word, like our page and thank you for helping us bring the best to you for less :)

Welcome to GoGoGadget!

story:
Music makes everything better. Music has been found to improve your mood by reducing stress and anxiety, improves your creativity and motivation, and can even decrease pain and improve your physical health. We use headphones to fill our day with music, this helps make every day a little better. We wear them non-stop while traveling, exercising and working, so it is very important that headphones have all the features we need: optimal comfort, a long-lasting battery life, great sound quality, strong bluetooth compatibility, and durability at an affordable price. 

 

Headphones have been around for quite some time, which is why we were shocked by the features and quality of the consumer headphones on the market. We found that each had at least one major problem or a set of features missing. Many are only made out of rubber and plastic and therefore break easily, or only offer one way to connect. Most importantly, better headphones cost over $200 a pair and often still lack seemingly basic features such as a play/pause button. We couldn’t find a single pair with all the features we considered important at an affordable price.

With this in mind, we set out on a mission to create a pair of headphones with the best features at an affordable price. Rather than reinvent the wheel, we tried over 50 headphones and 100 components made by a diverse set of manufacturers. Each had some admirable features but not one of them got it right.  We treated the best features as modular options, and combined them piece by piece, while leveraging the scale of operations from all these different manufacturers.  This was how the Modular brand and Mod-1 Headphones were born.

 

Mod-1 Headphones are packed with a wide array of features that work together to provide you with a uniquely immersive sound experience. 

 

Left/Right Indicator

 

Low-Intensity Indicator Light

 
Noise Isolation

 

Listen 3 Different Ways

 

40mm Drivers = Rich Sound Profile

 

Modular - Easily Replace Ear Pads

 

Play, Pause, Skip, and Volume Buttons

 

Durable, All-Metal Band

 

Remote Call Notification

 

Works With Samsung Dual-Audio

 

Overall the Mod-1 boasts better bass and comfort than every other pair of headphones we tried, even when the volume isn’t turned up. Mod-1 has noise cancellation through isolation - meaning once music is playing, the shape of the ear cups isolate incoming sound to just the music. To keep the product lightweight, the battery life of Mod-1 is typically 8 hours, however they can be used indefinitely while connected with the auxiliary cable. With the ability to keep using them while they are charging, you can easily wear them 24/7.

Less than half of the headphones we tried had these features we added to the Mod-1:

  • L/R headphone indicator printed on earpads
  • Real announcer voice for informative alerts
  • Skip/Play/Pause buttons
  • Aux AND Bluetooth
  • NFC chip fast connection
  • Folding design

None of the headphones we tried had an SD card slot.

In short, you'd have to buy many headphones to get the same features you'll find in the Mod-1. 

 

 

Check out what everyone has been saying about these amazing headphones!

 

We made a few hundred pairs with our manufacturer as a sample run. Now, we need to commit to a larger order volume to make more. We'd love to have your support, and you'll get a great deal if you hurry! 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for your support, we are proud to welcome you to the Modular community! Hope you will enjoy your brand new headphones and the uniquely immersive sound experience they provide. We came here to contribute to the industry and give everyone a chance to appreciate their music to the max at an affordable price. Please don't be a stranger - drop us a line, review your purchase, and don't forget to share with your friends! Join the movement and subscribe to Modular updates here: Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and our website. 

A special THANK YOU goes out to: Nebojsa, Dan, Bach, Kevin, Allie, Nastia, Pauline, Andrey, Corey, Dominique, Galante, Marsha, the Mod-1 team, and Lacuna Records. 

Patents and Trademarks Pending.

Join the movement and subscribe to Modular updates here: Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and our website. A special THANK YOU goes out to: Nebojsa, Dan, Bach, Kevin, Allie, Nastia, Pauline, Andrey, Corey, Dominique, Galante, Marsha, the Mod-1 team, and Lacuna Records. Patents and Trademarks Pending.

story:
Origem HS-3 is the world's first HDR audio earbuds with intuitive voice control. It's your smart assistant with comfortable and secure all-day wearing.

What Reviewers Are Saying About HS-3 

 

 

 

 

Origem HS-3 on CES

 

 

 

Typical earbuds with Siri or Google Assistant integration require a double tap to activate. But sometimes, your hands are busy or your situation makes that motion hard to do. That’s why we designed a built-in voice recognition system in Origem HS-3 that helps you to easily activate and control your phone assistant with just a few words…

 

HS-3 Voice Control Demo by @Just Doin' Life 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The beauty of sound is the result of vibrations from a multitude of frequencies. Some people enjoy listening to loud music, while others may prefer songs played at low volumes. So, audio engineers are tasked with creating hardware that can deliver accurate sound at a range of volumes. In this case, traditional earbuds fail to optimize the audio from different frequency ranges to achieve perfect audio fidelity. 

 

HDR (“High Dynamic Range”) audio is a technique which draws its inspiration from HDR imaging, which attempts to reproduce a greater dynamic range of luminosity , In HDR audio contrast refers to loudness instead of brightness.

Origem HS-3 deploys the HDR Algorithm which automatically maps, culls, mixes and optimizes sound across all frequency levels to create a more accurate, expansive and enjoyable listening experience at any volume.

HDR algorithm achieves dynamic optimization of audio resolution

The HDR algorithm detects the sound pressure of the listening environment and volume of the sound to dynamically adjust for all different frequency levels based on ISO226 Equal Loudness. All of this means that Origem HS-3 delivers detailed highs, crystal clear mids, and powerful bass, like a perfect combination of subwoofer, mid-range and high-frequency speaker.

 

After 10 months of testing and hundreds of audio refinements, a more accurate perceived loudness is delivered from the combination of HDR audio algorithm and Origem HS-3’s 10mm graphene speaker, increasing the standard acoustic field by 25%. Enjoy an ultimate audio experience like never before.

 

Enhanced Sound powered by high fidelity audio technology

HS-3 features a customized driver made with graphene. Due to its low mass density, the driver is able to produce excellent frequency response across the whole audible region. Not only that but also it delivers louder sound with no distortion. 

In addition, HS-3 is equipped with aptX technology which reliably improves sound transmission quality via Bluetooth. So the sound doesn’t suffer or degrade from wireless transmission.

 

It’s so annoying when earbuds fall out from time to time when we exercise or play sports. Origem HS-3’s +-70-degree rotatable earhooks allow you to find the perfect fit for your own unique ear shape. You never have to worry about your earbuds escaping from your ears no matter what activity you’re doing.

The Origem earhooks are constructed using a base layer of stainless wire-steel that can be infinitely adjusted over and over. On top, a high quality, skin-friendly PVD coating covers the earhooks for all-day, every day, comfort.

After thousands of hours of testing on differently shaped ear canals, the Origem HS-3s have been fine-tuned with an ear tip angle of 120 degrees to provide a more comfortable wear, secure fit and better audio delivery. 4 sets of ear canal tips are made using high quality silicone that ergonomically seals seamlessly in every ear. Select the best ear tips for your ears and immersive yourself in a better audio experience.

 

 

How long does it take to fully charge up your current earbuds? 1 hour or more? Wireless earbuds are only as good as the power they have at the ready. Origem makes charging a breeze with an on-board 3.7V rechargeable lithium polymer battery specially designed for fast charging. Origem HS-3 can be fully charged and ready to rock in only 30 minutes.

 

We know that having the right tunes makes any workout better, but not all earbuds are up to the challenge. Origem HS-3 meet the IPX5 waterproof standard and are perfect for a run in the weather or a trip to the gym. HS-3 is your best new, reliable, workout companion. Run wild and enjoy your outdoor workout with awesome audio.

 

Origem HS-3 features Bluetooth 5.0 that transmits sound with low latency, connects automatically, and uses low power. Enjoy the super stability and up to 10 meters of hassle-free connectivity with the most reliable Bluetooth transmission protocol.

Share And Get One Free

Get free HS-3 by sharing with your friends and families!  Every 5 friends you bring, you will get a free pair of HS-3!

How to Join:

  1. First, back HS-3
  2. Once you are a backer, log in your Indiegogo account
  3. Copy HS-3’s campaign link
  4. Share your unique link with your friends!

Check Your Referrals:

Log into your Indiegogo account

  1. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
  2. Select the “Profile” option
  3. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
  4. Email us via cf@origem.com after the campaign ends with your referral screenshot

 

 

 

We love music in every part of our lives. So we are driven to create audio devices that can deliver the best listening experience, with the power of technology.

Origem was established in 2014 by a group of passionate people. We are acoustic engineers, industrial designers, supply chain veterans, and more importantly, adventurers. We never settle for the status quo. Making wireless earbuds with great sound quality is not enough… our goal is to transform earbuds into fully realized, multi-functional acoustic gear.

Our DNS is deeply rooted in the philosophy of “Breaking the rules, leading the trend”. To do so, we are developing our own patented technology and innovative algorithms for audio equipment integration that keeps us at the vanguard of the industry. We go farther because we are building the ultimate personal audio experience and we want to take you with us.

We have spent the past few years dedicated to integrating the latest technology into earbud hardware, refining our product design, and partnering with the most experienced manufacturers in the business. Now it’s time for us to bring our first multi-functional acoustic gear, Origem HS-3 to life.

story:
"Buoy is the waterproof speaker you want around when things get wet and wild" Digital Trends

“Amazing. Incredible. It’s so crisp. I want it! A big sound in a little box.” 
My Mac

“ Nothing sounds better than BUOY in this price class. The soul shaking bass and room filling sound is simply nothing short of amazing. This Buoy is Loud! If you are in the market for a wireless speaker that delivers across the board, the Buoy is for you.”  Dragon Blogger 

Take crisp, deep, room-filling HiFi sound with you anywhere on the go with Buoy. This is a multi-dimensional waterproof speaker that comes with so many amazing features. Once fully charged, this speaker is capable of delivering sound for up to 24 hours at a stretch. 

Buoy produces multi-dimensional, precise sound by replicating the techniques used on $1,000+ audio systems that control distortion of the music through hardware instead of software. This is exactly the opposite of the typically muffled and tiny tones most smartphone speakers emit. 

The fact that it is waterproof and portable makes this speaker a perfect must have for your beach parties. Buoy can play your favorite tunes as an MP3 from a micro SD card and there is never a need for an SD card reader so you can always leave your phone behind but never leaving your music behind.

Please see the Waterproof test:

Please see Buoy Float and play under water: Soul Shaking Bass

Please see the Sound/Loudness Test: These Buoys are Very Loud!



Buoy produces multi-dimensional, precise sound by replicating the techniques used on $1,000+ audio systems that control distortion of the music through hardware instead of software. – exactly the opposite of the typically muffled and tiny tones most smartphone speakers emit. Don’t let the size fool you.


This small, timeless speaker will pump up the volume without distorting the sound quality. It’s less than two inches deep but packs a massive musical punch, connecting via Bluetooth, Auxiliary Audio Cable or from a Micro SD card.
On a full charge, it’ll play for 24 hours anywhere you take it. 

But like your smartphone, Buoy travels well: in the park, on the road, the beach, the pool even the shower – the Buoy goes where you do. And if you want to leave your smartphone behind, Buoy can play your favourite tunes as an MP3 from a micro SD card and there is never a need for an SD card reader. Manage media on micro SD card when speaker is powered OFF and connected to your computer via Micro USB cable. Buoy will play from all files and folders on the SD card in an alphabetical order.

Often times backers are concerned when and if they would ever get their products that they pledged for but we can assure you that we have taken the time to develop this right. This is our Second project and second campaign on Indiegogo. 

While we have acquired the cabinet mould for BigBuoy, which was designed by others and pretty much controls the exterior look of the speaker, the rest has all been redone including the cabinet material functionalities, electronics, software, PCB, Battery, certification, software, etc. Our speaker is APTX, FCC Certified, IPX 7 and comes with a Leather Strap, Auto shutoff, Charging capabilities while off, etc. In summary while the use of the mould is to save thousands of dollars, the rest & certification that meets certain strict criteria is all different. We then replicated our technology in a smaller Buoy creating a twin. 

Using an existing mould on certain fabricated items can cut cost by $40,000 or more and allows new products to be manufactured and offered at higher quality by allocating funds to features and quality components and technology vs structural fabrication. 

Portable • Compact • Loud

Using two (2) 45mm-7Watt Drivers and a stiff passive radiator for extra deep bass, Buoy produces stunning cinematic sound, with smooth highs, crystal clear mid-range and bone-shaking bass and is equipped with a long lasting rechargeable lithium ion battery that when fully charged, will give you an amazing 24 hours of playtime.

Soul Shaking Bass

This video was captured on iPhone 6S Plus with speaker volume at 45%

Nothing sounds as good as these two bad buoys!

Raise the standard of sound quality and keep the tunes pumping rain or shine with Buoy. Compatible with any and every Bluetooth enabled device, this speaker is loaded with technology to provide true 360-degree sound. 
Powerful True Audio Stereo Speaker with amazing detail and outstanding bass! You are going to love Buoy and we guarantee it!

Buoy uses two 40mm full range drivers for an incredible output coupled with a passive subwoofer to maximise the base response. This allowed us to pump out incredible 360º sound in true stereo for precise multi-dimensional sound reproduction all in a beautiful package that fits in your hand and budget.

The most memorable beachside gatherings and camping trips are the ones where the music never stops.  With IPX 7, Buoy rugged exterior defends against water, sand and drops. It has the ability to float in water so don't be afraid to take it to the water just be sure the interface door is sealed.

Up to 24 hours of continuous play on a single charge

Buoy is the only portable Bluetooth speaker we know that is truly waterproof, sand proof and shock proof that delivers crisp, deep room-filling sound and is equipped with a long lasting rechargeable lithium ion battery that when fully charged, will give you an amazing 24 hours of playtime.

Raise the standard of sound quality and keep the tunes pumping rain or shine with Buoy. Compatible with any and every Bluetooth enabled device, this speaker is loaded with technology to provide true 360-degree sound. Inside the Buoy Speaker are two full range high quality drivers with neodymium magnets and a passive subwoofer to produce powerful bass and natural audio to fill the room. Buoy produces deep base at a remarkable volume.

As it’s wireless, you can bring this crisp and pristine sound wherever you want. The iconic Buoy shape is sleek and bold yet inconspicuous, enhancing any environment. Its modern look is only outdone with the its amazing sound.

Buoy offers convenience, portability, Big Volume and outstanding bass with no distortion in a compact, grab and go convenience and all neatly in this beautiful package that fits in your hand and budget.

Buoy is not just about flexibility; it was built to deliver superior sound. 
Two speaker drivers and a passive radiator come together to deliver a new dimension to your audio and music.

Regular portable speakers have average sound power, but poor bass, and regular home speaker systems have good sound power, but are not portable.

Most speakers also tend to have big, obtrusive, in-your-face logos and branding. It is like you paid them then they advertise on your purchase. Enough, we said and so Buoy and Big Buoy will show the brand and certification on the bottom of the speaker and not anywhere else where it distracts from the speaker great looks.

Mixing water and electronics usually doesn't end well. Until Now. Buoy is the perfect device to accompany you on all of your travels and adventures. Best of all, the speaker is rugged and waterproof so it can withstand whatever you throw its way.

Mixing water and electronics usually doesn't end well. Until Now. Buoy is the perfect device to accompany you on all of your travels and adventures. Best of all, the speaker is rugged and waterproof so it can withstand whatever you throw its way. 



Buoy is fully waterproof (iPX7 -- immersion up to 1 m for 30 minutes), as well as drop-resistant to five feet or 1.5 meters.

Pump the tunes no matter where you are with the Buoy Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker.

Don’t let water stand in the way of great tunes.


Buoy Delivers a new dimension to your audio and music experiences

When your phone is paired with Buoy for music, it is also automatically paired for hands-free calling. Should your phone ring, you can take the call and use Buoy as your hands-free microphone and speaker. When your phone is paired with Buoy for music, it is also automatically paired for hands-free calling. Should your phone ring, you can take the call and use Buoy as your hands-free microphone and speaker. 


Quick and simple connectivity
Buoy remembers your mobile media device after the first pairing so they automatically connect every time they are in range of each other. The first pairing can be made using the simple Bluetooth NFC touch and pair feature, by effortlessly touching your NFC device and Buoy together, they connect and pair automatically.

The Buoy is equipped with a 3.5mm audio port to connect to devices without Bluetooth as well as a built in USB port to top up your device as the music plays and an Micro SD Slot so you can play all your tunes without needing your phone or table near by.
Consider using Buoy as a power bank for your devices too as there’s even a built power supply port to charge any USB device on the go. 

Added Convenience: Buoy as a Power Bank
3 Battery charge indicator lights are located just above the power button and they blink when the speaker is being charged. The lights denote to 30, 60 and 100% charge respectively. It would take 4½ hours to fully charge the speaker from 0-100%.
Behind the thick silicone door, which seals the speaker for waterproofing. you will find the micro USB port to charge the speaker; a standard USB port to charge external USB devices from the speaker on the go; An Auxiliary 3.5mm stereo cable port to connect devices without Bluetooth and a Micro SD slot so you can play your music without needing a phone.
Provided with the speaker is everything you need. A Micro USB cable to charge the speaker from any powered USB source; A 3.5mm Audio Cable & a Leather Strap and User Manual/Warranty Booklet.
Who we are




Magtunes is a small company based out of Sydney and was founded by a 3 passionate individuals from the worlds of business and technology. We are passionate about using technology to create experiences that leave an impression. Out of our own frustrations over poorly made products or good products that are overpriced, we created Magtunes.  At Magtunes, we are on a mission to make premium audio products accessible to everyone. Premium audio products at affordable prices and achieve a perfect balance between size, price and acoustics. 
We are small but fearless trio that think outside the square and love challenging the status quo. Our first project, Lumiére is a success and awed to the amazing 271 backers that helped us make it a reality. They invested their time, feedback and money and together, we made it happen. What produced and delivered on time as promised and we are now on a mission with our second project to repeat the success and exploit our experience and relationship for Buoy and make it a reality. This is an amazing speaker and we know you are going to love it and we ask for your kind support.
Risks and challenges
We are ex Apple and Microsoft Engineers and we’ve worked hard over the last year to get Buoy to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones and confidently consider the risks very minimal.
Our application for FCC certification has been submitted and should be done by the time this campaign is over and we will then start tooling and manufacturing to meet our promise of superior quality and delivery.

We are confident that we will be able to produce and Buoy in July for several reasons:
1. We have experts on our team who have over 18 years of experience in hardware manufacturing. 
2. Buoy has a factory and production facilities secured in Shenzhen, China. 
3. We’ve already produced working models of Buoy using our current facilities and are prepared to scale our operation to meet the backer demand. 
Our team deeply understands this campaign is an opportunity to establish a passionate customer base. It is our mission to leave our backers completely satisfied with our product and service!
Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen and hope to have you as a Proud Backer and please Share this campaign with everyone you know.

story:
We developed Fireflies so everyone can have truly wire-free earbuds with high sound quality and superior comfort in a sleek and convenient design. Get a huge discount off the $149.99 retail price by backing this project!

 

 

Set of Earbuds - two tiny earbuds that can play stereo Bluetooth audio for hours

Charging Pod - Place the earbuds into the charging pod to recharge them on the go!  The Charging pod can recharge the earbuds up to 3 additional times.

Silicone Tips - Small, Medium, and Large sizes to fit all ears

Locking Wings - FireFlies patent pending design fits securely and comfortably and won't fall out of your ear even under the most extreme conditions. However, for those that like extra security, we include a set of small, medium, and large locking wings that secure the earbuds in the inner curve of your ear.

Micro-USB Cable - for recharging the Charging Pod 

 

 

 

FireFlies can be paired to devices capable of playing Bluetooth audio such as phones, computers, TV, and more.  FireFlies use a Bluetooth 4.0 chip which means it is also compatible with Bluetooth 3.0.

 

 

 

 

 

Our Charging Pod is incredibly small and convenient.  It fits comfortably in any pocket and charges your FireFlies on the go! After listening, the earbuds can be placed in the Charging Pod to recharge in your pocket!

 

 

     

 

 

FireFlies are designed to fit a wide variety of ears comfortably and securely.  Our patent pending design was meticulously refined through over 50 prototypes and contoured to both look great and feel great!  

 The earbuds will stay securely in your ear no matter what activity you are performing.

To ensure a secure fit during even the most extreme activities, we included 3 different sized locking wings.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We just finished our Kickstarter campaign where we raised over $1M Dollars. The first batch from Kickstarter is currently in production.  Once both batches are complete we will move on to the the units for our IndieGoGo backers.  All IndieGoGo Backers should expect to receive their FireFlies in November 2016.

We are a team of consumer products and electronics entrepreneurs with over 30 years of product development, manufacturing, and retail experience. Our past products include KTTape, FiberFix, PulsePak, and many others. We are passionate about bringing new products to market in a way they have never been done before.
story_txt:
Click Here to Order Now!
  We developed Fireflies so everyone can have truly wire-free earbuds with high sound quality and superior comfort in a sleek and convenient design. Get a huge discount off the $149.99 retail price by backing this project! 

 

Set of Earbuds - two tiny earbuds that can play stereo Bluetooth audio for hours
Charging Pod - Place the earbuds into the charging pod to recharge them on the go!  The Charging pod can recharge the earbuds up to 3 additional times.
Silicone Tips - Small, Medium, and Large sizes to fit all ears
Locking Wings - FireFlies patent pending design fits securely and comfortably and won't fall out of your ear even under the most extreme conditions. However, for those that like extra security, we include a set of small, medium, and large locking wings that secure the earbuds in the inner curve of your ear.
Micro-USB Cable - for recharging the Charging Pod 

 
 

 
FireFlies can be paired to devices capable of playing Bluetooth audio such as phones, computers, TV, and more.  FireFlies use a Bluetooth 4.0 chip which means it is also compatible with Bluetooth 3.0.
 

 

 
 

 
Our Charging Pod is incredibly small and convenient.  It fits comfortably in any pocket and charges your FireFlies on the go! After listening, the earbuds can be placed in the Charging Pod to recharge in your pocket!
The Charging Pod next to a US quarter
 

      
 
Charging Case Specs
 

FireFlies are designed to fit a wide variety of ears comfortably and securely.  Our patent pending design was meticulously refined through over 50 prototypes and contoured to both look great and feel great!  

 The earbuds will stay securely in your ear no matter what activity you are performing.

To ensure a secure fit during even the most extreme activities, we included 3 different sized locking wings.

 

 
samples from our completed injection molds
Early 3D printed prototypes to the final molded plastic

 

 
 
 
 We just finished our Kickstarter campaign where we raised over $1M Dollars. The first batch from Kickstarter is currently in production.  Once both batches are complete we will move on to the the units for our IndieGoGo backers.  All IndieGoGo Backers should expect to receive their FireFlies in November 2016.We are a team of consumer products and electronics entrepreneurs with over 30 years of product development, manufacturing, and retail experience. Our past products include KTTape, FiberFix, PulsePak, and many others. We are passionate about bringing new products to market in a way they have never been done before.
 
Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
Digital music is transforming our lives! The advent of smart devices, music streaming services and digital music files has made it more convenient to access limitless library of music everywhere we go.

Left behind in this transformation are the traditional Hi-Fi sound systems, legacy stereo receivers and music docks that can be found in virtually every home.

Even though the traditional audio systems deliver far superior sound quality, they don’t allow access to the full range of music streaming options. 

Well…not anymore!!!




auris bluMe has been designed to transform your audio experience, seamlessly blending your current digital music technology with your classic audio equipment.

It's a true high fidelity Bluetooth music receiver that streams high quality audio wirelessly from any Bluetooth enabled smartphone, computer or tablet to any music system or powered speakers. bluMe allows you to enjoy all of your high definition digital music with all the clarity, crispness and full emotional impact your legacy Hi-Fi audio system can deliver.

It's a super high fidelity component that brings out the full sound quality potential that is hidden inside the Bluetooth protocol.








With a reputation for poor sound quality and limited operating range, why would we chose Bluetooth over various other wireless audio options such as Airplay, Sonos, etc.? The answer is access and compatibility.

Every modern smartphone, tablet and laptop comes Bluetooth equipped, providing instant compatibility for all. It doesn’t need additional drivers, software, apps, or to be within the range of a wireless router. Bluetooth is a familiar technology to everyone and its ease of use and convenience is proven by the surging popularity of portable Bluetooth speakers today.



bluMe is more than a Bluetooth music receiver; it’s also a Digital to Analog Converter (DAC). Digital tracks are simple sequences of code. To turn this code into a signal that speakers can recognize, you need digital-to-analogue converters (DACs for short).

Poor quality DACs can lose detail in the conversion process. We tested countless DACs over many months and in the end decided to work with the world-renowned 'Miracle DAC' AK4396 by AKM, a top of the line high fidelity DAC usually found only in top shelf audiophile home audio and home theater systems.

It’s a true 192kHz 24-bit upsampling DAC sporting a high SNR of 120dB and is well regarded for its impressive low noise and low distortion characteristics. in short, this means that the sound you hear is crystal clear, rich and retains a wonderfully full dynamic range.



bluMe applies the latest in Bluetooth technology, the Bluetooth 4.1 to stream any format of music from your smart device, laptop or PC.

Most devices use the basic SBC Bluetooth music codec. While this may be okay for some, but if you want great quality, it's simply not good enough.

bluMe uses Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) and aptX®, a superior performance digital audio codec. This combination of advanced hardware and firmware preserves all the musical detail, dynamic range and full bandwidth response, bringing out the best possible sound from your digital sources, for a sound that is far superior to standard Bluetooth streamed music.



The delay between your TV and speakers is a common problem within many wireless audio solutions. With bluMe, enjoy great movies knowing that picture and sound will always sync perfectly.

bluMe features the latest aptX® Low Latency technology that reduces this latency down to less than 40 ms, eliminating lip-sync issues to give you the smoothest audio/visual experience available.




Limited range and signal dropouts have traditionally plagued Bluetooth audio systems.

To combat this issue, bluMe employs special circuitry and a precision-tuned external high gain antenna to extend the wireless range, ensuring consistent, stable, strong, and glitch-free performance for 30 meters (100 feet), providing much more versatility than other Bluetooth receivers.


bluMe's cutting edge technology maintains a robust and balanced wireless sound experience that is unaffected by interference from surrounding wireless networks.

This results in superior 24-bit, upsampled audio that will completely redefine your perception of wireless sound.



bluMe has two high quality gold-plated RCA jacks that operate as analog outputs. Any audio system with a standard analog audio input can connect to bluMe with the supplied RCA-RCA signal cable.

For systems that have 3.5mm “mini” jack input, use the supplied RCA-mini cable.

bluMe also features a Digital Optical (SPIDF) Out so that you can connect to an outboard DAC or the digital input of a surround receiver, giving you a 100% pure high-res digital signal through to your sound system.



Pairing any smart device to bluMe is a breeze. Simply push the control button on the front of the unit briefly and it automatically goes into pairing mode. Activate Bluetooth in your smart device, select "auris bluMe" from the list of available devices and you’re ready to rock!

bluMe can connect to one smart device at a time, but is capable of remembering up to 8 devices. When more than one device needs to stream through bluMe, just turn Bluetooth off in the first device, turn Bluetooth on in the second, and select "auris bluMe" as the device. There is no need to reset bluMe and press its control button a second time once the device is stored.

Even powering bluMe is easy. Draw power from a wall socket, or from the included USB cable, which means you can power it directly from your PC, Laptop, and more recent TVs and sound systems.


Result of an elaborate manufacturing process, the chassis is extruded out of aerospace grade aluminum and high quality anodizing provides optimum protection and finish. 

bluMe is a premium product in every sense which completely blends while sitting next to even the costliest and most attractive home audio components.


Vast majority of us tend to hard wire our smart devices to an audio system by either using a dock that pulls analog out of the device or by hooking up to the headphone output jack. In both cases the digital signal is processed by cheap low fidelity DAC used in all smart devices.

With bluMe the digital signal is processed by its high-end DAC and audio decoders. No wonder bluMe sounds better than wired hookups!



bluMe can play any audio source a Bluetooth enabled device can access, opening up a virtually unlimited universe of music to enjoy through your Hi-Fi audio system.

So you’re always in control not just of the music that’s stored on your device but also access music streaming services such as Pandora and Spotify, internet radio stations, podcasts and even music libraries connected to a wireless home network...all instantly, wirelessly in Hi-Fi quality.






With a choice of either Black, Gold or Silver you’re sure to find a bluMe that matches your stereo system.


bluMe ships with a specially designed drawstring microfiber bag. You can now put bluMe in it's little microfiber bag, stick it in your coat pocket and take it with you anywhere there is power, a stereo amp or powered speakers and a Bluetooth device to provide the music.

Made out of high quality microfiber, this pouch will protect bluMe from dust, scratches and is the perfect fabric for eliminating pesky fingerprints.





With every Auris product, you receive our 1-year Limited Warranty. For more details, see the warranty section of our website.






At Auris, our philosophy is about empowering our innovative creative streak to enhance user experience. Team Auris wouldn’t be here today if it weren’t for backers like you who kickstarted our first product auris freeDa: Bluetooth for your Dock in 2012 and later auris skye: WiFi for your Dock in 2013.

We are a team of friends, designers, engineers, audio geeks, and operations experts bound together with one sole purpose in mind: creating audio solutions that simplify and enhance modern lifestyle.

Creation is our mantra – we use your valued input to form a foundation for our technique and master each design using a number a factors and key elements of the music lifestyle. Our creations are a part of our commitment to our consumers and we strive and work on to diligently improve upon their experiences and much more.

story:
SoundMolds are the new generation of custom-fit earbuds that deliver exceptional sound. Created by doctors, each pair of SoundMolds are made specifically to fit the exact shape of your ear. With earbuds that fit, you’ll finally have a pair that won't fall out.

SoundMolds are powered by our partners at NuForce (named top ten ear bud by consumer reports!) to deliver crisp, clear, sound, so you can enjoy top of the line earbuds without the custom price. And to top it off, they are available in both wired and wireless versions.

 



SoundMolds are innovative, custom-made earbuds that merge comfort, clarity, and longevity to create a product you’ll wish you met years ago.

Whether you choose the wired or wireless option, you’ll get a complete set of flexible, hypoallergenic, silicone earbuds that are specially tailored for your ears. So instead of the old “square peg in a round hole” route most earbuds go, with SoundMolds it’s more like placing a puzzle piece to its perfect fit.

Using a pair of earbuds that actually fit your ear has the added luxury of blocking unnecessary background noise. 

 

 

Much like your eye doctor has to take measurements to create a custom prescription for glasses, we need to do something similar for your ear.

When you order your SoundMolds, we'll ship you your EarPrint Impression Kit straight to your door, you'll take 8 minutes to create an impression using the kit, and mail it back! 

It’s that easy!

And in about 2 weeks after we receive your EarPrint impressions, you’ll have your snug-as-a-bug earbuds. And trust me - they’re worth the minimal wait. Once you spoil your ears with these snuggly ear wonders, you won’t be able to live without them!

And yes - shipping is prepaid so you don't need to worry about that! 
 


 

It isn’t hard to understand why run-of-the-mill earbuds fall out. They’re usually slippery, very generically shaped, and have no real grip. So if you start to work up a sweat or move too much, it’s enough to cause them to bail from your ears.
 


With SoundMolds, a custom fit means that they’re staying put no matter how sweaty you are or how extreme your movements. These earbuds will stay put.


 

* Always ensure that you are safe when wearing earbuds. The SoundMolds noise-reduction feature is adjustable so that you can still hear what's around you!

 

 
 

 


 

In line with the generic shape and rigid plastic, most earbuds are painfully inflexible and definitely don’t take your individual ear shape into account. This crummy design means there’s bound to be aching pressure points and discomfort.
 


Poor fit means that when you take them out, it’s like changing from your tight, starched pants after Thanksgiving dinner into super-soft oversized sweats. Removing your earbuds shouldn’t bring such relief, and no ears deserve that tight-pants fit.

The customized shape of your SoundMolds earbuds will be so welcome and cuddly to your ears that they might cry a little when you remove them, so don’t be alarmed. (Ears have feelings, too.)
 


 

The fact of the matter is, no matter HOW great your acoustics are, if you don’t have a perfect seal between the ear and the outside environment, your sound experience will suffer.
 


 

Background noise can not only distort your listening experience, it can actually end up seriously damaging your ear health. When we feel the need to up the volume to drown out the background noise, we’re often unaware of the dangerous decibel levels we’re inflicting on our poor ears.

But if you have a fit so precise that it creates a secure seal that gently hugs every curve of your ear while thoroughly eliminating background noise, you can happily listen to your audio at lower levels without needing to punish your ears with high volume.
 

SoundMolds are more than a custom solution

 

Just imagine how much better you’ll be able to focus and concentrate without the distraction of your earbuds diving from your ears or incessant background noise...

That annoying meathead shout-grunting with every lift at the gym? Silence him with quiet workout tunes.

The screaming toddler on the airplane? You can’t hear a thing as you listen to your podcast.

Your snoring partner who’s giving the plane a run for its money? Quiet as a lamb while you drift off to ambient sleep sounds…

And all thanks to the perfect seal created by your cushy, hypoallergenic earbuds.
 

Available in Wired and Wireless Versions

 

 

HEM Wired Earbud:

  • Latest Hi-Resolution Knowles™ Balanced Armature Driver for an immersive performance.
  • Acoustically calculated and vibration free Lexan™ earpiece for comfortable and fatigue free fit.
  • Linear-Phase crossover for seamless driver integration . Two replaceable cables included: microphone cable when listening music on-the-go and high-end cable made of OFC and silver for the best performance.

BE Sport Wireless earbud:

  • 13 grams lightweight metal body design.
  • Supports aptX and AAC codecs.
  • 10-hour continuos playback.
  • DuPont Kevlar ballistic material wire coating.
  • Ingress Protection Rating of level 5 dust and level 5 water jet protection.
  • Magnetic back side of earphones to help secure in place around the neck when not in use

 

 

See his first impression wearing SoundMolds
 


Testimonials

"Amy, the earbuds are AMAZING. You and your office team were wonderful. I'm so grateful to be able to have the ear bud. They fit comfortably and I don't hear much. " -Elaine Rosenthal​


"Wearing headphones is a pretty big part of my life. In the gym, traveling, or working, I spend a significant amount of time with headphones in. SoundMolds sound great, don't fall out, and fit perfectly in my ears. I believe you should invest in things you enjoy and spend a lot of time with. For me, SoundMolds is my investment in the music I enjoy every day."  - [real estate dev.]


“If you have standards or care about yourself, sound molds are the only way to wear headphones. Whether it be that they stay in my ear no matter what (especially if I'm working out), or providing a comfortable isolation of outside sounds, SoundMolds are like no other. If I'm in the library studying late at night, they block out any distraction.”  -  [college student]


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

“I am a50 year old very active man who has always had an issue with my earbuds falling out.  I must have small ears, because the standard buds that come with my headphones never seemed to fit me correctly.  Whenever I would be running, mountain biking or just working out at the gym, when I started to sweat at all they would fall out.  A friend told me about Soundmolds so I gave it a try.  I couldn’t be happier.  No matter what activity I am engaged in, they just stay in place and feel totally comfortable.  I’m never going back to off the shelf buds.“  - Scott K., Cincinnati, OH

 

"I have tiny ears so I stopped wearing earbuds because they never fit me well. Most earbuds would either hurt my ears or fall out. My SoundMolds have changed that for me and let me listen to my music again!"  - Melanie V.

 

“I started using Sound Molds three months ago and I haven’t put them down since. I found the product online while searching for an earbud that fit properly. I have a pair of Plantronics, three pairs of beats and two pairs of Bose earbuds and none of them stay in my ear. Nor do they feel comfortable. Every time I purchase a pair of earbuds my ears hurt for at least the first week- they are all sold with small, medium, and large fittings but none of them properly sit in my ear.Then I found Sound Molds. A kit was shipped to me with very easy instructions on how to create the molds. It took me less than 10 min from unpackaging to repackaging and shipping them back to the company. Within a few weeks I received my Sound Molds and I literally haven’t taken them out of my head since! The fit is flawless. The sound is profound! If you’re looking for a headset that you will last you for years, one than you can actually hear and one that will stay in ear, buy this product.“ - Ryan R.

 

 

Thinking SoundMolds might be a good fit for you? Let’s see what would make you a good match:

* Your current or previous earbuds have repeatedly fallen out

* You dig comfort and quality

* You don’t want to slowly go deaf

* You think snuggling your ears in cushy, customized silicone sounds great

* You want earbuds that will last

* You appreciate a great sound experience

* You’re not averse to making your friends jealous


 

We’re committed to not only providing an innovative product we feel will change your life, but we’re also committed to working hard to ensure you have a great experience from start to finish.

A lot of work went into this campaign, and we’ve made sure our ducks are in a row in order to fulfill our backers’ orders as soon as the campaign closes.

You can feel confident backing SoundMolds because we’ve got a great relationship with a well-known manufacturer whose quality we stand behind.  Plus, the materials we’re using are so good that we’re happy to offer a full, 1-year  warranty against defects.

 

Founders

Jerry Altman (left) is board certified Ear, Nose and Throat Doctor. As an avid exerciser, he loves to listen to music, podcasts, and audiobooks. He's been deaf in his left ear since childhood, so he is vigilant about protecting the hearing in his right ear from excess noise exposure.

Amy Shah (right) is a double board certified MD in allergy/immunology and internal medicine. She is a big proponent of nutrition, and wellness integrated into western medicine -- she loves the intersection of wellness and productivity -- which is why she loves SoundMolds.

Product Launch Team


 

Like everyone else, we’re no strangers to the sound and fit issues most earbuds present, and that’s exactly why we created SoundMolds.

And because we’re doctors, we want earbuds that not only prevent hearing loss by reducing the need for damaging volume levels, but offer a comfortable, hypoallergenic fit that’s actually good for your health.

While researching solutions, we discovered that professional musicians and elite consumers had access to custom-fit earbuds, but only after visiting an audiologist and then paying a ridiculous sum to get the earbuds of their dreams several weeks later.

We loved the concept, but not the wait, need to visit an audiologist, or insanely high price!

And that’s what led to this campaign.

We feel EVERYONE (not just celebrities or the ridiculously rich) should have access to great earbuds that are comfortable, stay put, and last year after year.
 


 

Your SoundMolds will be ready to ship as soon as our Indiegogo campaign closes. Once the campaign closes, we'll send our backers a survey to collect your color preference. As soon as we receive yours, we'll ship you your Custom Earprint Impression Kit. 

When you mail your custom impression back to us (we cover the cost of return shipping), you'll receive your finished, custom SoundMolds within two weeks.

 


How soon will I get my kit?

As soon as the campaign closes, we'll send all of our backers a survey to get your color preference. As soon as we receive your color preference, we'll ship our Custom Earprint Impression Kit to your door!

What if I can’t get a good impression?

To try and make this as easy as possible, we’re sending you written instructions, video instructions, and two sets of the moulding material (so you can totally mess up one and still try again). But if you’re still having issues, we’ll have support staff on hand to answer your questions via telephone. We’re here for you!

How long will it be before I get my finished, customized earbuds?

There’s only a two-week period from the time we receive your impressions to the time we send out your custom earbuds. (We’ve mastered this quick turnaround thing!)

What will this cost?

We’re offering a wired set of SoundMolds for just $189, and a wireless set for $199 - a significantly discounted price from what they will retail for.

What if I get them and they don’t fit right?

If you’re not completely happy with the fit, we’ll be happy to troubleshoot. And if we need to send you another impression kit and create another pair, we’ll do it.

Are they waterproof?

SoundMolds are not waterproof, but they are sweat resistant.

How do I clean them?

You can clean your SoundMolds between uses with a clean, damp cloth to keep them in tip-top shape.

Since they give such a great seal, can I use them as earplugs?

We do not recommend using your SoundMolds for earplugs at this time. However, we *do* have plans to produce SoundMold earplugs in the near future, so if you’d like to be one of the first to know when they’re available, you can visit our website here and sign up for the mailing list right at the top of the page!

Can I return them?

As you will undoubtedly understand, because this is a fully custom product, we’re unable to offer refunds. But we fully guarantee the manufacturing quality of the earbuds and will do all we can to make sure you’re as thrilled as we expect you to be!

What does the guarantee cover?

We paired with a well-known manufacturer, and because we know they’re made of quality materials, we’re able to offer a full, 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

A few things not covered under the manufacturer's warranty are cord damage, failure or improper function due to wax in the earpiece, abusive damage to the earpiece, and earpiece modifications by non-SoundMolds personnel.

For more information, please contact us at support@soundmolds.com
