Il est open source et hacker friendly, prêt à s’adapter à tout selon un large éventail de cas d'utilisation…  8knobs peut être utilisé comme un contrôleur MIDI via usb en tant que dispositif plug-n-play; cela signifie pas d'installations, pas de convertisseurs supplémentaires, pas de maux de tête. Le 8knobs DIY-kit se compose d'un PCB, Arduino Atmega 32u4, ses barrettes mâles, potentiomètres, tous les composants électroniques nécessaires, le matériel de montage, un boîtier en bois découpé au laser, ainsi qu’une housse de protection en jute cousu main et coton brut écru. 8knobs dispose d’une sortie audio, un MIDI vers USB ou MIDI vers 3.5mm pour pouvoir se connecter à d'autres synthétiseurs traditionnels. L’alimentation se fait via USB, adaptateur mural DC 9-12v ou une batterie 9v. DIY// Électronique // Synthèse sonore // Codage informatique En assemblant 8knobs de vos propres mains, vous apprendrez tout l’essentiel: De la soudure aux fondamentaux du son, de la synthèse sonore à l'électronique jusqu’au  codage… en comprenant, en concevant et en expérimentant le flux des signaux. Apprenez l'art du flux des signaux en construisant votre propre synthétiseur et contrôleur personnalisé pour plus d'expériences! Une expérience// Apprentissage créatif et nouvelles approches Se familiariser avec le flux des signaux ouvre un large éventail de nouvelles possibilités pour expérimenter et produire des applications techniques et créatives dans divers médias — tant analogiques que numériques. Tout comme les flux de signaux dans le cerveau sont interconnectés et s'influencent mutuellement — par exemple, des neurones qui communiquent des informations sous forme chimique et électrique peuvent donner lieu à des combinaisons infinies de pensées, de mots et d'actions. De même, jouer avec le flux des signaux du matériel (électronique), des logiciels (codage) et de l'espace (acoustique) peut donner lieu à des expressions créatives infinies.   L'art du flux de signaux offre des possibilités infinies, mais c'est à vous de choisir si vous l'utilisez comme un passe-temps ou pour poursuivre une idée folle qui changera votre vie. Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est un très bon sentiment de se salir les mains dans le flux énergétique des signaux et de la culture du bricolage !   8knobs box and Package for shipmentAbout me:I am Akash Sharma, an experimental artist exploring electro-acoustic improvisation, data manipulation and algorithmic composition. I am dealing with sound from a very global perspective – from an aesthetic, physical, electronic and computational point of view.Thanks to the simultaneous use of several artistic languages my work shows a large diversity, ranging from software, to hardware over human-machine relations, art installations and interfaces.I founded Sound.Codes as a Sound Research Lab in an effort to streamline the data gathering process of Acoustic Signatures as Acoustic Conservation and along the way started designing customised immersive experiences and customised solutions for artists and businesses. As Sound.Codes I am developing hardware, software, multimedia installations and performances.

story:
Shipping Status

Over 98% Indiegogo orders were shipped. For the rest 2%, we have not received your completed survey. Please contact marketing@knztech.com if you have not received your survey invitation email. We resent a few orders which have been in transit for very long time. Sorry about some delay in email reply during the holiday season.

The Rose Gold version is currently out of stock.

Here is what some music professionals mentioned about SoundFlux™:

 

Another masterpiece from our industrial design team who have won several awards over the years, to name a few: the iF Award, Red Dot Award and IDEA Award. SoundFlux will not disappoint you with its high-end look and finish, which separate itself from a numbers of plastic toy-alike competitors.

Our Dual-Driver True Wireless Stereo Headphones provide a much wider dynamic range than most single driver headphones currently available on the market. The two professional quality 6mm dynamic drivers work in unison with noise cancellation technology to cover a wide range while offering a clear and pure sound experience.

 

  • Dual Driver
    • One focuses on creating a solid foundation - bass
    • The other focuses on keeping the high end accurate and clear, mid and highs - treble
  • Professional Audio DSP
  • Lossless Codec
  • Dual-Driver Ambient Noise Cancellation
  • Software Optimization

Regular headphones have a limited range of frequency response since their single driver can only cover part of a human's hearing range. They either perform average in both bass range and treble range, or are tuned to cover one and leave the other poorly compromised. 

Powered by a dual driver audio system, SoundFlux™ covers both bass range and treble range naturally with the two professional grade drivers.

 

Adjust EQ from headphone

Three preset EQ settings to choose from:

  • Naturally Balanced
  • Vocal
  • Enhanced Bass

SoundPass™ Mode, when enabled, allows you to be aware of your surroundings and engage with the environment without pausing your music.

A simple triple-press of the multi-function button will activate SoundPass™ mode, and you can talk to people without pausing music.

And yield traffic while jogging.

And, if permitted, notice traffic while driving.

Check out Chris Patterson's reaction when he was testing the impressive SoundPass™ Mode!

 

SoundPass™ Mode in action

Have conversations while listening to your music and be aware of your surroundings.

 

Unlike most true wireless earbuds in the market which only support mono talk, using the latest Bluetooth chipset, SoundFlux™ supports stereo phone use.

Crystal clear sound quality and stereo phone calls make SoundFlux™ not only pleasant for music, but also for voice chatting.

SoundFlux™ offers its users full control on music and phone calls. From the headphone, you can pause/resume music play, tune up or tune down the volume, skip to the last song or the next song.

The ultimate in-ear comfort, silicone ear tips mold to the unique contours of any ear to provide a better fit and seal.

  • 3 Different Sizes - S, M, L
  • Included are three different sized earhooks for additional security if needed

 

Thanks for the ergonomic design, even without any ear hook, SoundFlux™ provides a more secure fit than most sports headphones.

Not feeling comfortable wearing ear hooks? No problem - You don't need any!

 

So light that you barely feel them in your ear

Seamless One Time Setup!

Quick one time initial setup for automatic pairing when taken out of case and automatic disconnect when you're done.

  • Pair SoundFlux™ to your device once and it will automatically pair every time you take them out of the charging case
  • SoundFlux™ will automatically disconnect from your device and turn off when placed back in the charging case

SoundFlux™ is equipped with a high-sensitivity antenna which guarantees stable Bluetooth Connectivity when on the move!

Stay focused and in the zone without having to worry about interruptions with your music!

Perfect for any outdoor activity and movement on the go!

SoundFlux™ headphones have a nanotech coating that offers protection from accidental damages as well as sweat or rain - perfect for outdoor activities!

  • Offers protection from a powerful water jet (12.5mm spray of water at 100 liters per minute) in any direction for at least 3 minutes
  • Also offers a dust free protection

Powered by Bluetooth 5 Low Energy Technology, SoundFlux™ provides

  • Up to 4.5 hours* of music play and phone use without case charging
  • Over 24 hours of use with charging case

*Battery Life can vary widely depending on settings, environment, usage and other factors which include but are not limited to use of volume, type of music, distance, mobile device's Bluetooth version, temperature. The 4.5 hours maximum listen time was tested in our development stage. The final product battery life may vary.

*Update notes: the lab tested music hours of the latest version SoundFlux in stereo mode is 2 hour 40 minutes to 3 hours based on handsets. Please notice this update before you back this project. Our Team is seeking a software solution for updating software over the air in order to improve battery life and optimize other features.

   Take full advantage of the high res microphone with your voice assistant.

Besides the superior sound quality, the unique and useful SoundPass™ Mode, when comparing the most important aspects of in-ear headphones: Comfort, Fit, Portability, Battery Life, and Price. SoundFlux™ surpasses not only the average, but also the elite products in the market.

 

  • SoundFlux™ headphones
  • Charging case
  • 6 ergonomic earbuds
  • USB cable
  • User Manual

Bonus

The out-of-box gifts for our Indiegogo backers are:

  • 6 ergonomic earbuds
  • 6 earhooks for a more secure fit

For our Indiegogo campaign, we offer four color options:

GoDuo Colors in Music Combo

We want to make sure the portable music combo perk valued at $129 is clear and easy to understand. The GoDuo speakers are clear and the carrying case color is for the following three options: Black, Gray and Red. We also offer a special Smoke speaker color and the carrying case that comes with it is black.

We are back! The last couple of years been exciting for us at KNZ® Technology. Back in 2017 we funded successfully between Kickstarter and Indiegogo for our GoDuo Wireless Speakers with a pledge of $163,853 and over 1,600 backers. 

The GoDuo Wireless Speakers also won an iF DESIGN AWARD 2018.

We are professionals

Starting from World's first stereo Bluetooth headphone - Motorola S9, in the past 10 years, our engineering and manufacturing team members have developed numerous great products in the market for many renowned brands. Now along with our award-winning design team, KNZ® is becoming a popular brand in the North American market.

As we continue to grow and establish ourselves as a premium-quality audio and mobile electronics company, our products are now available to consumer in stores and online at metroPCS, Cricket Wireless, Best Buy, Walmart, the Home Depot, and many other marketplaces.

More pictures of the colors

story:
As simple as taking them out of their charging box.

In terms of software, we opted for simplicity. It should be easy and painless to use your TWS earbuds. Pairing can be done with 3 simple steps, and once connected, the S2 will automatically reconnect to your device whenever you pick it up. And with our intuitive controls, you won’t have to think twice about whether to play the next track or answer the call.

 

 

KZ Acoustics started as a brand by enthusiasts for enthusiasts and has 10 years of experience in the development and production of HiFi In-Ear Monitors. Our products have been featured, reviewed and recommended in popular websites and have been recognized by experts in the audio field. 

 
 

Our acoustic engineering team has developed a new 7mm double magnetic dynamic driver that utilizes an additional magnet to exponentially increase the responsiveness and output power of the diaphragm. 

This new breakthrough takes the notion of dynamic drivers to a whole new level. An all-new powerful dynamic driver housed in the form factor of a TWS. It’s mobile music like never before. 

 

Dual Coil Dynamic Driver. Designed for Power

With an enhanced voice-coil design and a new polymer-polymer diaphragm membrane, our new dynamic driver is able to focus on delivering a more impactful sound with lower total harmonic distortion - ultimately, meaning a more high-resolution sound. Our new dynamic driver has been meticulously crossed over with our custom proprietary KZ 30095 ultra-high frequency balanced armature driver. Balanced armature drivers are renowned in the field of profession in-ear monitors due to their amazing speed and accuracy.

 

Customized 30095 ultra-high frequency balanced armature driver.

The 30095 is especially prized due to its ability to effectively extend the treble and its low total harmonic distortion output. Our team has utilized this driver to create a detailed, smooth, and airy high-frequency response that is crystal clear and transparent. In combination, this hybrid dual-driver configuration makes for a musical sound that features hard-hitting bass, full bodied and rich mids, and detailed and engaging trebles. The KZ S2 is ready to unleash the full potential of your music.

 

AAC Support for HQ Audio

Built-in with the Realtek chip, the S2 true wireless earbuds support AAC to achieve HQ sound quality and seamless transmission. Not only has your music never sounded this good before, but now you can enjoy your movies and games with sync rivaling even wired earphones.

 

Why AAC over APTX?

The AAC codec is currently more widely implemented throughout online streaming sources, as it's the codec of choice when encoding videos for Youtube, Twitch, and many other online platforms including music apps like Spotify, Apple Music, Youtube Music, Pandora, and Tidal. AAC is also the default Bluetooth codec for many popular mobile devices, including the entire line-up of Apple products, which do not offer APTX support.

By using AAC we aimed to improve compatibility, sound quality, and most importantly, reduction in latency. With AAC you will enjoy some of the fastest Bluetooth experience with some of the lowest latency rates. It will be like you are using wired earphones.

 

CVC Noise Isolating Microphone

The CVC Noise Cancellation Technology, combined with the S2 silicon microphone work cohesively together to optimize your calls by drowning out background noise. You shouldn’t be the only one who gets to enjoy crystal clear audio!

 

Modern Bluetooth 5.0 Technology and High Performance Mode

With Bluetooth 5.0, pairing with any of your devices is quick and easy! Bluetooth 5.0 also allows connectivity distances of close to 1000ft (that’s 4x the range of previous generation!) and incredibly fast ISM band range. 

The combination of Bluetooth 5.0 and the special gaming mode - High Performance mode, offers a faster transmission speed of the sound signal. From now on, you can enjoy an ultra-low latency gaming experience with your best gaming partner KZ S2!

 

Ultra-stable Connectivity… Never Miss a Beat!

Embedded with the new Realtek 8763 Chipset and Bluetooth 5.0, the S2 offers increased bandwidth performance and an enhanced signal reception that results in an ultra-stable connection. Compared to other leading Bluetooth products on the market, our integration of the 8763 chip into the S2 results in significantly more stable sync even at further distances.

 

Designed for Both Fashion and Comfort

While other products on the market may achieve one or two of these aspects, accomplishing all three has rarely been seen - until now. Our team wanted to design a set of in ear monitors that you will never want to take out - simply because you won’t even notice that they’re there. The resin housing of the S2 has been moulded to perfectly match the shape of your ear, and our wide selection of high quality ear tips ensures everyone will have a perfect seal. 

 

 

 

How To Use KZ S2?

Using KZ S2 is simple and easy! Check the quick-guide video below! **As sophicated components are embedded, please don't use fast charger or fast charging port on a power bank. 

 

 

 

Stay Home... Stay Safe

 

Project Timeline

 

KZ was founded in 2013 to integrate high quality audio into the fashionable style of the modern listener. KZ is the world's leading HiFi earphone manufacturer and provides professional audio services in more than 100 countries and regions. KZ is a professional audio brand that offers excellent quality products ranging from personalized monitors to headphones. Shenzhen Yuanze Electronics Co., Ltd specializes in creating new technologies for audio transmission. With modern hybrid technological advancements, we have managed to offer high-end in ear monitors and hearing aids to the world.

 

Why crowdfunding?

Shenzhen Yuanze Electronics Co., Ltd specializes in creating new technologies for audio transmission. With modern hybrid technological advancements, we have managed to offer high-end in ear monitors and hearing aids to the world. Why crowdfunding?

story:
Short Summary

The mini-TS is a pocket sized (165x65mm) fully open-sourced synthesizer with a 2-Octave capacitive touch keyboard.

 

 

It uses a rotary encoder and a 128x32 graphic OLED for parameter editing.

Specifications
2 Phase Distortion DCO's with Detune
1 DCF Peak with ENV Modulation
1 DCA with AR-Envelope
CV/Gate 1volt/Octave output.
2 CV Inputs
1 Stereo Audio Output

The same PCB can be built in 3 configurations:

The CV keyboard config
The simplest config is for using it just as a CV/Gate keyboard for modular gear. This mode is selected by shorting Pin17 and Pin18 on the chip.

The WASP config
This config uses CV/Gate/MIDI-IO and 6 external potentiometers for a WASP style synthesizer. This mode is selected by shorting Pin18 and Pin19 on the chip. This is the same config the Tiny-TS uses.

The full config
This uses a rotary encoder and a 128×32 OLED for synth parameter entry. It also has 2 CV inputs on the TRS jack rings and MIDI-IO.

What We Need & What You Get

This is Open-Source and DIY and both circuit-diagram and code will be available to do your will.
But to build it a PCB is still needed so the funding will go to PCB manufacturing and part ordering for the kits.

story:
About Malektronic

Malektronic ® is committed to designing portable sound systems for music lovers with the highest standards of production. We love music and our goal is to offer products with excellent quality that can compete with the most popular devices, but at an affordable price. A few quick facts about us:

  • Malektronic has been actively making and marketing wireless audio solutions for over 5 years.
  • Malektronic is based out of Tampa, Florida USA.
  • We are family owned and operated. 
  • Malektronic wants to enable the power of the social world to grow our brand and products with the pride and power of you.

You may recognize our name from the news coverage of our spokesperson The Malektronic Rocketman who gained popularity by cheering on the home hockey team here in Tampa Florida.

Malektronic wants to be the go-to brand of wireless audio based on quality and sound. We want to be the brand that is not over charging you for a "name" or to pay celebrities to use us. Malektronic wants to continue to develop our brand based on loyalty to the product and not the celebrity advertising campaigns. 

 

Why Interstellar Funding

We have been super excited about these new headphones. The prototypes have performed excellently. However we need  your help to complete the process and rocket these headphones into the spotlight. 

Emerging brands and small business like Malektronic need your help, and we believe we have come up with a product that performs amazing and will grow in popularity with your support.   

  • Interstellar headphones will be something you can brag about because of your support.
  • Your support will allow us to complete the prototype stage and start manufacturing.
  • You can help us with funding, or by spreading the word on Malektronic.

Additionally we are working to review possible upgraded features and might need to incorporate them into the final prototype before manufacturing commences. Some items being reviewed for possible inclusion into the final headphone design include but not limited to the following: 

  • Hybrid feed forward and feedback Digital Noise Cancelling solution to further enhance the ANC (Active Noise Cancelling) capability to meet similar abilities of other popular advanced brands / products on the market. 
  • High Definition drivers to enhance sound reproduction and sound perception. 

 

About Interstellar Headphones

In the interest of keeping things short and to the point. Here is the quick 411 on these awesome new headphones we will make with your support.

We have planned for the completion of the prototype phase before years end with production commencing early 2019 and a shipping date in June 2019.

Current prototype version consists of...

  • active noise cancelling with or without music playback
  • wireless range up to 32 feet (10m) 
  • comfortable over the ear design with padded ears
  • padded headband
  • foldable headband
  • swivel ear cups
  • up to 18 hours battery life with active noise cancelling enabled
  • up to 30 hours battery life without active noise cancelling enabled
  • built in mic to take calls
  • easy to use controls for volume, track selection, and phone call operations
  • controls located in ear pads to keep outer ear cup clean looking
  • micro usb port for charging
  • AUX-In for optional wired use
  • One Tap Access to Siri and Google Assistant 

 

Current Prototype Video Update

 

Easy Controls

We have "hidden" the Interstellar buttons away on the outer edge of the ear pads. 

 

 

Materials Detail

Interstellar's headband and ear pads will be made of top quality protein leather that is sweatproof, comfortable and cool to touch, with  memory foam for maximum comfort and fit.

The ear pads surface can withstand our rigorous button tests of 50000 times.

Interstellar's outer shell is constructed of PC with a UV finish and an aluminum decorative plate with anodized paint finish, offering extra hardness, durability and impact resistance.

 

 

Current Interstellar Specifications 

Below are the current specifications we are working with on our current prototype. These items may change with the final prototype before manufacturing. 

Li-Ion battery

500 mAh

Charging Current

5 V DC, 350 mA

Charging Time

approx. 3 hours

Battery Life

 

   without ANC (Active Noise Cancelling)

   up to 30 hours

   with ANC (Active Noise Cancelling)

   up to 18 hours

Bluetooth (Wireless)

 

  Version

  5.0

  Range

  32 feet (10m) 

Active Noise Reduction (ANC)

24 dB

Audio Output Power

17 mW

Impedance

32 Ω

Effective Frequency Range

20-20,000 MHz

Distortion Range

<0.2%

Signal-to-noise ratio

100 dB @0.1 mW 1 kHz

Connection Ports Connections

 

  AUX input

  Micro-USB connector

Dimensions

15.4 x 18.9  x 7.4 cm

Weight

249.5 g

 

 

Retail Price Goal

Malektronic's goal has always been to provide high quality wireless audio solutions at realistic and affordable prices.  We believe the bulk of the amount you pay should not be to "buy / pay for a name" however it should be to pay for quality sound and a solid product.

Our current MSRP pricing goal for Interstellar Wireless Headphones is $200.00 

This may change as we get ready to complete the final prototype.  Additional features being looked at may increase the MSRP or completion of securing better deals on materials may enable us to lower the price as well. 

 

Timeline and Milestones 

Below is a quick high level overview of the timeline we are currently working with.

 

Our Social Friends Love Us 

Malektronic has created many speakers and headphones and often appear in the social limelight. We like to think it's because our dedication to our products and our relationships with our friends (customers). Check out some of these pics from past social posts of past products!
(Note: Images do not imply endorsement.)

Testimonials about Malektronic Products and Service

Malektronic is an established brand with years of experience. Below are some reviews from our past items and our dedication to our product line and customers. 

 

 

Share Interstellar Project and Win!

By sharing this page with your family, friends, and followers you can get free gifts when they back us.  If people back Malektronic Interstellar using your referral link you can collect those referrals for free gifts from Malektronic. Get free items like a Rocketman Plush Toy, Malektronic Hat Trick 2.0 Waterproof Speaker, and even a pair of Interstellar Headphones. 
Just follow the below instructions or visit Indiegogo's page on "How to Participate in a Referral Contest". All tracking is done by Indiegogo so you know it's legit! 

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
2. Visit this Malektronic Interstellar Project Page
3. Copy the page URL or use sharing options on top.
4. Share that unique referral link with your family, friends, and followers!

Note: Referral backers must back at a $50 level or more for it to count in the Referral Contest.

 

Share Us

Show support of our vision and goal by sharing us. It is supper easy and would mean the world to us. So give it a shot and share us. We often award giveaway items to our followers who share our story and progress.

    

 

Follow and Like Us

Malektronic believes in the power of friends and the relationships we build with them. We think strengthening our brand in the social community will help us bring better ideas to market, and keep us focused on our quality commitment to you. So give us a shot and follow us at the standard places!
story_txt:
About Malektronic
Malektronic ® is committed to designing portable sound systems for music lovers with the highest standards of production. We love music and our goal is to offer products with excellent quality that can compete with the most popular devices, but at an affordable price. A few quick facts about us:

Malektronic has been actively making and marketing wireless audio solutions for over 5 years.
Malektronic is based out of Tampa, Florida USA.
We are family owned and operated. 
Malektronic wants to enable the power of the social world to grow our brand and products with the pride and power of you.

You may recognize our name from the news coverage of our spokesperson The Malektronic Rocketman who gained popularity by cheering on the home hockey team here in Tampa Florida.
Malektronic wants to be the go-to brand of wireless audio based on quality and sound. We want to be the brand that is not over charging you for a "name" or to pay celebrities to use us. Malektronic wants to continue to develop our brand based on loyalty to the product and not the celebrity advertising campaigns. 
 

Why Interstellar Funding
We have been super excited about these new headphones. The prototypes have performed excellently. However we need  your help to complete the process and rocket these headphones into the spotlight. 
Emerging brands and small business like Malektronic need your help, and we believe we have come up with a product that performs amazing and will grow in popularity with your support.   

Interstellar headphones will be something you can brag about because of your support.
Your support will allow us to complete the prototype stage and start manufacturing.
You can help us with funding, or by spreading the word on Malektronic.

Additionally we are working to review possible upgraded features and might need to incorporate them into the final prototype before manufacturing commences. Some items being reviewed for possible inclusion into the final headphone design include but not limited to the following: 

Hybrid feed forward and feedback Digital Noise Cancelling solution to further enhance the ANC (Active Noise Cancelling) capability to meet similar abilities of other popular advanced brands / products on the market. 
High Definition drivers to enhance sound reproduction and sound perception. 

 
About Interstellar Headphones
In the interest of keeping things short and to the point. Here is the quick 411 on these awesome new headphones we will make with your support.
We have planned for the completion of the prototype phase before years end with production commencing early 2019 and a shipping date in June 2019.

story:
Risks and Challenges:

While there are many risks and challenges typically associated with this kind of product, we are in an exceptional position to succeed. Most importantly, we just ended a successful Kickstarter campaign and are in the process of shipping the rewards to our backers. We have also completed all prototyping, conducted extensive testing, and possess final products. Our mass manufacturing factory in China and our final assembly line in South Korea are both ready to start producing units and we are just waiting on the initial funding required to purchase raw materials.

Although Mini-O is the first product in the U.S. to be made with Flat Magnetic Speaker Technology, the technology has already been certified and debuted in several Asian countries. Regardless, the technology is still new in the U.S. market and the public may be wary of the power and quality of Mini-O. However, given all the tests we have conducted, we do not believe this will be a concern.

Furthermore, while we can facilitate this entire process to a certain extent, there are various factors that we cannot control such as international shipping delays. Although we keep extra inventory in our U.S. warehouse, we run the risk of possible delays in shipping when encountered with unforeseen events.

story:
Thank you for landing on our page!

Have you ever faced a situation where you need to buy many items and devices separately: soundbar for TV, wireless speaker, stereos, charger, home decoration, ice bucket.... 

...and that you'll have to pay a lot of money to acquire all those things?

The problem has been solved!

ZONE combines all those and even a lot more in a simple, compact and decorative item.

Zone is easy to take with you, just fill it with your belongings and throw it on your backpack.

 
 
 

 

ZONE is High-end Luxury product, first wireless and versatile Bluetooth speaker in the world made from Durable Certified Eco-friendly materials.

ZONE generates a true 360-degree Super Powerful High-Fidelity sound. ZONE also contains RGB sound reactive lights with different light modes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

ZONE speaker has three balanced sound allocation method.
 
1.   Omnidirectional sound
2. Direct sound
3. Structure makes the sound extremely deep and clear.
 
ZONE speaker structure is modular, that is one of the reason why ZONE is long lasting and durable HiFi speaker. Every function is independent high quality system and easy to replace if necessary.
 

Sound

ZONE speaker has 3 X more power than other wireless speakers on the markets in this category!
 
ZONE is much more than a HiFi speaker, it's offering to you relaxing moment when you need it.
 
 

ZONE is perfect companion for the Hot Yoga.

ZONE is even an Ice Bucket. Find your own way to use ZONE.
​ZONE has even a rather exceptional design - and a wide range of connection possibilities. You can easily carry it everywhere. The battery will last at least 10 hours, so you can listen to the music and keep your drinks cold all night long. You can use ZONE speaker also when it's charging.
 
ZONE provides you not only with HiFi sound
but also RGB Sound Reactive Lights with various modes!
You can control lights as you desire.
 

You can create your preferred mood for any occasion with the RGB sound reactive lights.

ZONE is also a flashlight with a motion sensor:

If lifting ZONE a bright LED light starts to glow the area beneath it. You can find your way even in the dark with the help of the ZONE by just lifting it.

ZONE is even an USB Power Bank!

You'll never run out of battery on your mobile device when ZONE is around. It charges any device with the USB plug.

 

MEDIA COVERAGE

Iltalehti newspaper: "All functions in one compact package."

Savon Sanomat newspaper: "Perfection."

Kim Vaisanen of Finnish Shark Tank: "Very very very interesting product!"

An engineer of the speaker manufacturer: "This is a perfect speaker due to its shape."

People comments:
 
" This can be used on the outside parties,  I'm really surprised! " - Robert Helenius
 
" The sound world is particularly accurate " - Henna Mykkanen
 
" Listening to music with ZONE feels like a band is playing next to you!"  - Arttu Karkio
 
" You need to be hear and feel it buy yourself!" - Tuija Ihalainen
 

" Sound quality just can't be any better! I'm really surprised "  - Niko Issakainen

 

ZONE has the Design From Finland brand recognition.

The right to use the "Design from Finland " mark is awarded upon application by an independent Design from Finland Committee with expertise in the field.

https://sinivalkoinenvalinta.suomalainentyo.fi/...

 

ZONE is manufactured in a high-quality factory in Shenzhen concentrating in the wireless speakers, and ZONE is one of their top products!

ZONE is IPR-protected worldwide and heavily tested. The funding from this campaign will be used to fulfil the minimum order required by the factory.

The upcoming process we will include:

1. Starting the production

2. Quality control

3. Shipping

STORY BEHIND ZONE

Here you can see two friends from Finland – from a country of hundreds of thousands of lakes and saunas, and skill for high technology like Nokia and Angry Birds.

The guys like to barbecue together with their families and friends. They like music and building things with their own hands.

Jarno renovated his sauna at his home a couple of years ago. He wanted his sauna to be an extraordinary place for relaxing. He was quite pleased with the result of the renovation but something important was still missing. He got an idea: Could this sauna pail be a HiFi speaker?

The guys created ZONE – a waterproof and a heatproof speaker. Even the sound engineers have now been surprised by the quality of the sound of ZONE!Jarno and Jari-Matti not only developed ZONE, but they also got it tested and patented. They even negotiated a good deal with a factory specialized in similar products. Now they just need your help to get enough pre-orders to start the production.

       

We are donating one euro of each sold ZONE to the Ocean Cleanup project. All the materials used in ZONE are certificated and safe to the environment.

 

Supported by the European Boxing Heavyweight champion Robert Helenius!

Robert Helenius, also known as the Nordic Nightmare, is a professional boxer and former two-time European heavyweight champion. He's also a fan of ZONE, as it gets him in the mood and keeps his water bottles cold during training.

 

Please note! If a buyer does not pay for the VAT (if applicable), Northern Pails is not obligated to send the rewards or return their money.

 

------------------------------------

Risks & Challenges

The process has now lasted over 24 months and we are happy to announce that WE ARE READY TO START PRODUCTION.

Kickstarter and all you Indiegogo awesome backers can help us start the production, and we are ready to get started as soon the campaign ends. All the testing has been completed - we can now say for sure the ZONE is safe to use. We directly control the manufacturing process on a daily basis with the factory. We promise to keep our backers updated about any issues that may occur. After the Indiegogo campaign we'll be able to ship you this awesome and TOTALLY new kind of product. Currently our only challenge has to do with getting the word out. So, help us spread the word and get the ZONE the attention it deserves!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to make ZONE to come true.

You'll get a ZONE of your own and you'll get a chance to enjoy this magnificiant and revolutionary Bluetooth speaker and beside that you'll SAVE a lot of money!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you might not able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

Please, also use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your support, we appreciate it highly!

story:
THE WORLD'S MOST ADVANCED 3D AUDIO PLATFORM

Perfect for gaming, music, & home cinema!

YARRA 3DX is the world's first 3D audio sound bar that delivers the same immersive entertainment experience as multiple speaker home theaters and 3D audio headphones. This small "smart" sound bar makes you feel like you're sitting in a high-end theater by delivering discrete left and right "beams" of binaural 3D audio to up to three individual areas in your room!

Hear every detail as if you were immersed what you are watching!

"Today I've had the opportunity to experience the demo of the product we are all eagerly waiting for. I was speechless. The sound coming out of this bar is mind blowing!

I am not associated with the company, but frankly speaking, for this amount of money (and yes, even the shipping cost outside US) you cannot, and let me repeat, you cannot get anything better on the market. 

I was literally blown away, smiled like an idiot for more than an hour. The sound was coming from everywhere! When you close your eyes, you don't have the feeling that you are in a room anymore. You think you are in the middle of a movie, a game or in a perfect concert hall.Absolutely stunning! IMAX quality sound system in your apartment and I am not kidding! 

I cannot praise the team enough for their communication. This project should serve as a pilot project for a Kickstarter for all the future creators out there. Peter, thank you so much for today's presentation. I could write another few lines about my excitement, but you will all experience it next year. This is just crazy!" Grega Petek

“Met Mark and Peter and they were gracious enough to let my two friends and me sit in the studio while they did the live stream. I’m already a backer, and now the two friends I brought are backers as well. We were able, after the live stream, to sit down and listen to a near field example of beam forming. Absolute magic. 

The ability to create a wrap around sound stage is absolutely stunning. I signed up because I thought this would be a nice upgrade to my TV sound bar. I left thinking this may well replace my high end audio speakers as well. 

I walked away comfortable in the knowledge that these guys are exactly who they say they are, and the product does everything they say it will do. I’m very excited to take delivery early next year.” Pierre

 

Engadget: "I had a brief experience with some demo material before the Showstoppers event became too crowded, and came away impressed. Comhear's claim is that it can deliver a headphone-like localized sound experience and it truly delivered, even in a room not suited to high-quality audio." Richard Lawler

TNW: “It sounded really good, and more importantly, the surround effect worked really well. I could hear bullets whizzing past my head in a gaming demo, or pinpoint exactly where sounds were coming form in a popular audio clip.”

The Absolute Sound: “I was impressed and intrigued by the ambient and immersive environment this little bar created.”

Audioholics: “The YARRA 3DX sound bar was able to focus three discrete audio programs to three specific areas of the room. There was no "crosstalk" or bleed. I was amazed.”

 

 

Each YARRA 3DX comes with a powerful subwoofer to support bass frequencies present in movies soundtracks, hi-fi music, games, and VR experiences. The wired YARRA 3DX subwoofer has a 5.25" driver and 30 Watt amplifier that outputs deep bass from 50 - 100 Hz.

Experience the full effect of surround soundtracks in 5.1, 7.1, or 11.2 without the expense of a home theater setup.

  • Digitally model the finest speaker systems in the world
  • Put a complete surround sound system in any room
  • Enjoy surround sound without a home theater setup
  • Includes a powered subwoofer for deep bass effects

 

 

YARRA 3DX AND MUSIC

Music is transformed from traditional stereo to a multidimensional envelope of warm, natural sound. YARRA 3DX uses sophisticated sound field modeling techniques and transaural beamforming to increase perceptibility of low level details, dramatically expand the soundstage, and enhance presence. 

Yarra 3DX will make you feel like you are watching your favorite music live!

We've demoed the YARRA 3DX for professionals, audiophiles, gamers, music lovers, and the general public. The response — as you can see from the following videos — has been universally positive. We can't wait for you to experience immersive, 3D Audio without multiple speakers or headphones from the YARRA 3DX system.

 

 
 

 

 

The YARRA 3DX sound projector is controlled by an app that runs under iOS and Android operating systems. It allows users tremendous control of all  aspects of the system including: Surround vs Stereo Mode, EQ Controls, User Presets Settings Load & Save, Input Selection, Surround Setup and More!
story_txt:
THE WORLD'S MOST ADVANCED 3D AUDIO PLATFORMPerfect for gaming, music, & home cinema!YARRA 3DX is the world's first 3D audio sound bar that delivers the same immersive entertainment experience as multiple speaker home theaters and 3D audio headphones. This small "smart" sound bar makes you feel like you're sitting in a high-end theater by delivering discrete left and right "beams" of binaural 3D audio to up to three individual areas in your room!Hear every detail as if you were immersed what you are watching!"Today I've had the opportunity to experience the demo of the product we are all eagerly waiting for. I was speechless. The sound coming out of this bar is mind blowing!I am not associated with the company, but frankly speaking, for this amount of money (and yes, even the shipping cost outside US) you cannot, and let me repeat, you cannot get anything better on the market. I was literally blown away, smiled like an idiot for more than an hour. The sound was coming from everywhere! When you close your eyes, you don't have the feeling that you are in a room anymore. You think you are in the middle of a movie, a game or in a perfect concert hall.Absolutely stunning! IMAX quality sound system in your apartment and I am not kidding! I cannot praise the team enough for their communication. This project should serve as a pilot project for a Kickstarter for all the future creators out there. Peter, thank you so much for today's presentation. I could write another few lines about my excitement, but you will all experience it next year. This is just crazy!" Grega Petek“Met Mark and Peter and they were gracious enough to let my two friends and me sit in the studio while they did the live stream. I’m already a backer, and now the two friends I brought are backers as well. We were able, after the live stream, to sit down and listen to a near field example of beam forming. Absolute magic. The ability to create a wrap around sound stage is absolutely stunning. I signed up because I thought this would be a nice upgrade to my TV sound bar. I left thinking this may well replace my high end audio speakers as well. I walked away comfortable in the knowledge that these guys are exactly who they say they are, and the product does everything they say it will do. I’m very excited to take delivery early next year.” Pierre 

Men's Journal: "This soundbar uses an ingenious, uncanny, and game-changing digital sound field modeling technique it calls MyBeam to pinpointedly blast everything from stereo to 7.1 surround sound directly to your ear, as well as the same optimized effect to up to two other listeners in other parts of the room." Tom Samiljan of Men's Journal included the YARRA 3DX in his list of Top Ten cool gadgets and electronics at the show. He wrote,Engadget: "I had a brief experience with some demo material before the Showstoppers event became too crowded, and came away impressed. Comhear's claim is that it can deliver a headphone-like localized sound experience and it truly delivered, even in a room not suited to high-quality audio." Richard LawlerTNW: “It sounded really good, and more importantly, the surround effect worked really well. I could hear bullets whizzing past my head in a gaming demo, or pinpoint exactly where sounds were coming form in a popular audio clip.”The Absolute Sound: “I was impressed and intrigued by the ambient and immersive environment this little bar created.”Audioholics: “The YARRA 3DX sound bar was able to focus three discrete audio programs to three specific areas of the room. There was no "crosstalk" or bleed. I was amazed.”  Each YARRA 3DX comes with a powerful subwoofer to support bass frequencies present in movies soundtracks, hi-fi music, games, and VR experiences. The wired YARRA 3DX subwoofer has a 5.25" driver and 30 Watt amplifier that outputs deep bass from 50 - 100 Hz. 

Yarra 3DX uses state of the art audio technology to enhance user experiences in the following areas:

YARRA 3DX AND GAMING
Gamers realize the importance of highly accurate, immersive sound fields delivered in environments seen and unseen! This gives you the ultimate gaming experience without the need for bulky headphones, taking gameplay to a new level.

Localize friends or foes in highly accurate sound fields
Lose the weight and intrusion of headphones
Increase social engagement with other players
Gain strategic advantages through heightened sound cueing

Hardcore Gamer:
“The sound of him talking and using the razor moved where I was sitting, as if an actual person was circling me”
Xbox Addict:
“Compact sound bar designed to improve the experience for music, video and gaming"
 

 YARRA 3DX AND MOVIESExperience the full effect of surround soundtracks in 5.1, 7.1, or 11.2 without the expense of a home theater setup.
Digitally model the finest speaker systems in the world
Put a complete surround sound system in any room
Enjoy surround sound without a home theater setup
Includes a powered subwoofer for deep bass effects
 YARRA 3DX AND VIRTUAL/AUGMENTED REALITY
Transaural 3D audio provides two critical elements that have been missing in traditional headphone delivery: accurate sound field modeling and "outside your head" localized sounds.

Dramatically enhanced sound spatialization
Highly accurate sound field modeling
Situational awareness using 3D [X,Y,Z] audio worlds
Natural immersive listening without headphones
 YARRA 3DX AND MUSICMusic is transformed from traditional stereo to a multidimensional envelope of warm, natural sound. YARRA 3DX uses sophisticated sound field modeling techniques and transaural beamforming to increase perceptibility of low level details, dramatically expand the soundstage, and enhance presence. Yarra 3DX will make you feel like you are watching your favorite music live!We've demoed the YARRA 3DX for professionals, audiophiles, gamers, music lovers, and the general public. The response — as you can see from the following videos — has been universally positive. We can't wait for you to experience immersive, 3D Audio without multiple speakers or headphones from the YARRA 3DX system.

 

 


 


 

 

The YARRA 3DX sound projector is controlled by an app that runs under iOS and Android operating systems. It allows users tremendous control of all  aspects of the system including: Surround vs Stereo Mode, EQ Controls, User Presets Settings Load & Save, Input Selection, Surround Setup and More!

YARRA 3DX is easy to setup and use, simply supply power, plug in your source, and connect the subwoofer. However, we want to make sure that your first YARRA 3DX listening experience meets your expectations. so we've included a custom DVD disc [NOTE:  also available for downloading] full of great demonstration content and  instructions on how to maximize your listening pleasure.

The disc includes binaural demonstrations, 5.1 surround music, movie trailers, and game soundtracks — everything you'll need to wow your family, friends, and yourself right out of the box.

The YARRA 3DX system is comprised of three components. The sound bar contains 12- 33m drivers and directs the beams of sound, the subwoofer reproduces all of the non-directional low frequencies, and the app, which is used to configure, control, and customize the system.


Drivers

Diameter 33 mm 
Driver spacing 38 mm 
Frequency Response 50 – 20,000 Hz (with supplied subwoofer) 
Mean SPL 80 dB ± 3 dB 
98.2 dBA broad band steady state @ 1 Meter 
99.8 dBA peak…call it 100dBA @ 1 Meter 
Max SPL deviation -1 dB Impedance 8 ohms 
Nominal input power per driver 2W, 4V 
Max input power per driver 3W, 4.9V

Internal Amplification
Class D 4W x 12
DSP and Beamforming

Quad Core 500 MIPS 
Internal EQ processing: 8 x 4 Band Parametric 
Internal Beam Forming Modalities: Center, Stereo 3D Beam-forming; variable throw up to ~30 ft. 
160° V x 20° H max coverage per beam; up to 5 x 20° beams possible 
Side lobe attenuations of at least 20dBA

Input/Output Connections

Line in analog 1/8” (3.5 mm) stereo 
HDMI Digital Input (ARC)
1 - USB  B Digital Input (Also Firmware Upgrades) 
Line Out subwoofer 1/8” mono
1 - 3.5 mm Heapdhone output

Decoding
Dolby Digital
AC power

Condor Switch-Mode 
Model: FJ-SW1203300 
Input 100-240V~, 50-60Hz, 1.5A max 
Output: 12V 3300mA

Sensitivity
Self-amplified, line level analog input or USB digital input
Max power before distortion 
On axis, binaural mode:

SPL white noise @ 1 meter – 104.8 dBA before distortion 
SPL 1K sine @ 1 meter – 97 dBA before distortion

On axis, in center beam mode:

SPL white noise @ 1 meter – 107.3 dBA before distortion 
 SPL 1K sine @ 1 meter – 94.5 dB before distortion

Firmware

V 1.0, upgradable in field via USB 
GUI: PC based in-field programmable control of beam width, level, EQ, etc. via USB




YARRA 3DX as a consumer project was initiated in late summer of 2014. The research done at the Spatial Audio Lab at UC San Diego under the direction of CSO and faculty member Peter Otto, resulted in our first sound bar — the ProAV model.
Research

 

Industrial Design


Prototype Testing


 

The industrial design of the YARRA 3DX system was developed over many months after extensive research and market surveys. Tandem Design — a Santa Monica-based design firm with years of experience with sound bars — provided the YARRA 3DX team dozens of potential designs, revised countless details, and produced working prototypes in both black and silver. 


 
Multicoloured Lights
The YARRA 3DX has a  row of LED lights along the bottom edge that can be switched on or off. Gamers will undoubtedly appreciate the ability to customize the look and feel of their YARRA 3DX system.

End Stands
Another detail desktop users will appreciate are the adjustable "end stands". These can be used to elevate the main YARRA 3DX unit above the base of a computer monitor or display.

Wall Mountable
The YARRA 3DX main array has standard mounting holes located on the rear of the unit, which can be used to easily and safely attach the sound bar to a wall.




The founders of Comhear Inc. envision a future where immersive, 3D audio can be delivered without multiple speakers or headphones. They reached out to a Peter Otto, Director of Sonic Arts R&D at the Qualcomm Institute at UCSD, and initiated a series of research projects into beam forming and spatial audio realization. The results of those projects resulted in several patents and products — AND Peter leaving his directorship after 25 years to join Comhear in July of 2016 as the company's Chief Science Officer.



 
The YARRA 3DX sound projector product & campaign was conceived and developed in 2016 with the assistance of Peter's college friend Mark Waldrep, PhD,  award-winning audio engineer, audiophile, record producer, and founder of AIX Records, under the guidance of Comhear senior management.


 


 

Our goal is to reimagine immersive, 3D audio using innovative cutting edge technologies. We've made incredible progress towards this ambitious goal but we need your help in bringing our patented technology to you.
TOOLING AND MANUFACTURING COSTS
The research has been done, concepts validated, working prototypes assembled and  tested, and now we simply need to ramp up manufacturing. We've secured strong relationships and know the costs needed to produce tooling, purchase materials, manufacture units, and distribute the YARRA 3DX smart bar to consumers.
BRINGING INNOVATION TO THE FUTURE OF IMMERSIVE SOUND
We know that building a state-of-the-art audio product is worthwhile and potentially disruptive to an industry anxious for change, but we want our efforts to inform and alter the consumer audio marketplace.











Why are the shipping costs to international destinations so high?
The YARRA 3DX sound bars and subwoofers are being manufactured in China. The current plans include shipping several containers to our fulfillment center in Poway, California. All units will be then shipped to backers around the world.
As a small startup company, we haven't yet established regional hubs in different countries to help reduce shipping costs and taxation of imported goods. We're researching alternatives but the present plan uses USPS International Mail to deliver units around the world.
The initial costs estimates from FEDEX, DHL, and UPS were almost double the costs included on the current rewards. We had hoped that the "lower" costs would be acceptable.
The alternative would be to restrict the YARRA 3DX product to domestic sales only. We decided to offer this amazing technology knowing that the costs for shipping would be higher than preferred.
Can the YARRA 3DX unit be wall mounted and easily removed, if necessary?
The rear of the YARRA 3DX enclosure has standard mounting holes for a wall mounting bracket. However, given the necessity to connect power, sources (HDMI), and the subwoofer to the back, moving it to another room would be less than convenient. We suggest that you secure a second unit for the additional space.
Does the YARRA 3DX come with a dedicated physical remote control?
Yes. It is possible to turn the unit on and off, adjust the volume, and configure the sound field to near or far using the remote.
Are import taxes or VAT included in the price of the unit or shipping costs?
No. Taxes and VAT are the responsibility of each individual backer.
Are there physical control buttoms on the YARRA 3DX unit?
Yes. The industrial design incorporates the volume, power, and mode adjustment controls in the 4-part end panels.
Does the YARRA 3DX support APT X HD?
Yes.
Can I use my own subwoofer with the YARRA 3DX?
Yes, you can. The speaker array includes a 3.5 mono jack, which supplies, unbalanced, line level audio for the sub. As long as you have the right connections and configuration, you can upgrade to a bigger sub.
However, we've found that the included sub does a very reasonable job and extends down to 40 Hz. It includes a 30 watt amplifier.
What are the dimensions of the subwoofer?
The YARRA 3DX subwoofer contains a 5.25" driver in a ported box measuring 8" x 8" x 10 inches.
Are there plans to support additional codecs like DTS:X or Dolby Atmos?
We're looking into the cost of licensing and including additional codecs in future releases.
Which version of Bluetooth will the YARRA 3DX support?
Currently, we're using 4.2 but plan to support the latest version.
Does the YARRA 3DX has a TOSLink optical input?
Yes.
Will the appropriate power connectors and voltage be supported for international orders?
Yes, the YARRA 3DX system works with 120/240 volts and will come with the correct connector type.
What happens if I have more than 3 people listening to the immersive surround projections? What do the others hear?
The 3 primary listeners will hear immersive surround and any other will hear enhanced stereo.

story:
You can’t carry your entertainment center with you when you’re on the go, but you should never compromise sound quality for your favorite movies, music, or apps. Introducing AMP by OIO, the ultra-portable iPad™ speaker case that introduces a home theater quality entertainment experience wherever you are.

See How People Are Reacting to Amp

 

Bring the Inside Out


Quality home theater entertainment is more portable than ever with Amp, thanks to its compact, foldable and lightweight frame. Gather friends and family, pop the popcorn and enjoy an outdoors movie night at the cottage or at home - no driving or drive-in required.

Travel Better, Not Bored

Save your sanity during lengthy trips. Amp’s bluetooth connectivity means it can go where you go, while 7 hours of battery life provides lasting entertainment.

Go the Distance


Bridge the gap with friends and family by using Amp to share stories and updates through video calls.

Amplify the Classroom


Take interactive learning to greater heights with Amp. Gather around Amp with classmates and stream video lessons, music, and podcasts with pristine sound.


Amp is different than your average bluetooth speaker. We believe our product will stand alongside your other bluetooth devices as a wholly unique experience. Before Amp, iPad stands haven’t had the perfect balance of quality sound, versatility, and portability to compare with competitor bluetooth speakers on the market. They miss out on creating something revolutionary for cord cutters and heavy iPad users who use it to do… well, everything.

The OIO Team hopes to change this.  Amp has been brought to life by an innovative team of product designers, business strategists and engineering masterminds, all of whom have developed products for brands such as Samsung, LG, and Hoover.

I’m interested in purchasing this product. What iPads does Amp support?
We’re glad to hear it! Amp supports iPad Air, iPad Air 2, and the 9.7” iPad Pro.  

Would you ever support functionality for different tablet sizes/brands?
Amp lets any smaller-sized tablet or smartphone rest on Amp’s ledge and play through Bluetooth. It just won’t snap into place. We don’t have plans to launch other sizes at this time.

Do I have to remove my case for my iPad in order to click it into place with the Amp?
Yes.

How durable/damage resistant is the Amp - if i drop it, is it still going to work?
Amp can help protect your iPad, but we don’t recommend dropping it, as it may get damaged or stop working. As with any electronic product, good care is important!

What kind of warranty comes with my Amp?
Amp comes with a 1 year warranty.

What is the connectivity range of Bluetooth with Amp?
Amp can remain connected to Bluetooth within a 10 meter, or 30 foot range.

Can Amp’s speakers still play when closed? Can the stand or speakers flip backward?
When the speakers are closed over iPad’s screen, Amp stops playing. Amp plays in any other position, including off to the sides or rotated to the back.

If I pop my iPad out of Amp, can it still play?
Yes!

When Amp’s speaker panels are folded back, can media still play through Bluetooth?
Yes, but sound quality is better when front facing.

Does AMP have an AUX in?
No.

Can I change Amp’s speaker grill colors myself?
Unfortunately they are not interchangeable. You must choose your desired Amp color upon purchase.
