story:
INTRODUCING ISOLATE® MiNi and ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Ear Protectors!

Over 70,000 people are now using ISOLATE® and ISOLATE® PRO to turn the world down like never before and they are loving the experience. From reading the hundreds of emails, messages and reviews we get every day users are reporting that ISOLATE® has changed their lives, improved their music experience and are totally in love with the product.

Following feedback from our backers we have now developed a new ISOLATE® MiNi version which will be available in two amazing new colours SILVER PINK and DENIM BLUE anodised aluminium as well as natural and black anodised aluminium. There are also two new PRO versions, ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Titanium and ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Mirror Polished Titanium.

All the new ISOLATE® MiNi versions are now available to pre-order in the perks.

The ISOLATE® MiNi version has been developed for maximised comfort for all day/night use, it is truly tiny and really comfortable to wear. People with the smallest ear canals now have an ideal solution with ISOLATE® MiNi whilst still achieving the same sound attenuation and experience as the larger ISOLATE® version.

ISOLATE® MiNi comes with its own range of 3 sizes of EARFOAMS® which are extra small, small and medium.

ISOLATE® features 4mm solid metal inside the ISOLATE® EARFOAMS®

ISOLATE® MiNi features 2.5mm solid metal inside the ISOLATE® MiNi EARFOAMS®

The graph below shows the sizes of the EARFOAMS® that are included with both the standard ISOLATE® EARFOAMS® and ISOLATE® MiNi EARFOAMS®

 

The majority of people will be able to use both ISOLATE® and ISOLATE® MiNi as the small and medium sized EARFOAMS® of both versions have exactly the same external size. This will allow people to select either version of ISOLATE® to suit their needs and comfort requirements.

Delivery times

ISOLATE® - ORDER BY 3PM EACH DAY FOR NEXT DAY DESPATCH! (Mon-Fri) - (Please note shipping means the day we send your item, delivery times will depend on your local postal services).

ISOLATE® MiNi - Perks will be despatched in February and March.

 

Now you can have perfect sound isolation for...

  • Sleeping (Undisturbed nights with perfect isolation from snoring and other noises)
  • Travelling (On planes, trains and automobiles, enjoy silence when travelling)
  • Concerts and Clubs (Enjoy the most incredible sonic details at very safe levels)
  • Motorsports (Total protection from very loud and painful noises)
  • Motorbikes (Micro in size and hidden inside your ear, they won't interfere with your helmet)
  • Working (Protect your ears against permanent hearing damage)
  • Construction (High level noise protection)
  • CE Certified  to BSEN 352-2-2002 - SNR35 (Aluminium) SNR36 (PRO Titanium)
 

ISOLATE® is not like any other ear plug; it blocks all sound from entering your ears including bass frequencies for the first time ever without any batteries or annoying re-charging. ISOLATE® is micro in size and so can be used anywhere to isolate your ears from unwanted noise.

We have developed the patent-pending technology, produced various prototypes and tested ISOLATE® in many ears (including gaining independent reviews and endorsements which are shown below). We have tested ISOLATE® out with dozens of users and on in-house test equipment which has shown staggering attenuation results.

We now need the support of crowd funding to ramp up into mass production and attract major retailers to stock ISOLATE®. By backing our crowdfunding campaign you will receive your ISOLATE® reward before online retailers commence selling the product.

Flare's patent-pending ISOLATE® Technology

Flare's founder and inventor, Davies Roberts, could not understand why traditional ear plugs were so bad at doing their job. When he looked into it, he realised that ear protection was taking the wrong path in using plastic, silicone and foam to absorb sound.

“Imagine wearing a helmet all the way over your head made of plastic or foam. What would you hear? The sound level would be reduced but the effect of the plastic resonating and foam muffling the sound would not be so nice to listen to. Both these materials do stop some sound but, frankly, are not that great at it, especially at lower frequencies. When low frequencies get past traditional ear protection, details get lost and you're left in a world of booming bass and sub-sonic pressure which you can't wait to escape from. No noise cancelling electronics can deal with this muffled sound that comes from the plastic and foam parts of such devices.

But imagine putting your head all the way into an inch-thick, solid titanium helmet encased in foam. Now what would you hear?

... Exactly!  That’s just what I thought."

Solid metal is a good conductor and so had been discounted as unsuitable for use in ear protectors. Until now. What Davies has discovered is that, in order to conduct sound, metals need a direct connection. Without a direct connection solid metals block sound perfectly!

"When you isolate a small piece of metal or dense material in soft foam inside your ear, sound waves can't penetrate from the flexible medium of air and it becomes the perfect isolator. Understanding this principle is what inspired us to develop the perfect ear plug. We want to revolutionise hearing protection!"

 

 

Block Low Frequencies

Traditional ear plugs and defenders cannot block low frequencies from entering your ears very well. As well as being unpleasant to listen to, they make sound muffled, leaving you feeling disconnected, or as if you are underwater. Low frequencies produce the most energy, and this is not absorbed properly by the plastic or foam used in traditional ear plugs.

ISOLATE® has been tested in-house against a typical foam earplug using a direct sound source, this measured the attenuation level achieved by the different materials.

 

The red trace below is the source signal which was a headphone unit, the pink trace is a standard foam earplug, the green trace is ISOLATE® (aluminium) and the blue trace is ISOLATE® PRO (titanium). Each vertical division on the chart represents -10dB of sound attenuation.

As you can see by the data below both ISOLATE® versions totally out-perform the traditional foam earplug. ISOLATE® Pro Titanium has an additional 8-9dB (more than four times the attenuation) with the lowest frequencies, which is crucial for blocking out the most irritating snoring, high impact sounds and enabling you to hear more detail in music.

 

 

ISOLATE® MiNi for a perfect night's sleep

 

ISOLATE® technology works by a revolutionary approach in the materials used. Noise is blocked by a dense material suspended in soft memory foam to isolate it from the effects of conduction. The result is total direct noise isolation for your ears for the first time ever without any electronics!

 

3D DRAWING

 

ISOLATE® 3D Drawing cross section

 

Independent Reviews

Headfonics review of ISOLATE Pro
 

HiFi Pig review of ISOLATE Pro

RideApart review and road test

 

Cool Design

 

A good design will stand the test of time.

Good design is not just about achieving a good technical result, it's also about great visual identity. Modern industrial design is Davies's passion; clean lines and symmetrical shapes which never date. This is demonstrated in the design of ISOLATE® with perfect form and optimal functionality to create a pleasing visual simplicity.

ISOLATE® has also been designed to last forever. The tips, which can be size-selected for best fit, are replaceable when they get damaged or wear out, but you will never need to replace the ISOLATE® metal component.

ISOLATE® has ridges on the tip connector that allows the tip to lock into place. To remove a tip, squeeze the tip and twist and pull the body. To put on a new one, simply push it into place with a satisfying click.

The tips used with ISOLATE® are called EARFOAMS®. They are very easy to fit and come in small, medium and large sizes to ensure ISOLATE® will fit the majority of people. A set of each size is included with each ISOLATE® pair.

 

 

ISOLATE® on planes to block jet and other noise

 

Ears ringing? That's the sound of damage.

If you enjoy concerts, gigs and music as much as we do, then you’ll know exactly what we’re talking about. Ringing in the ears and cotton wool hearing in the morning are the result of hearing damage. 

Conventional plastic or foam earplugs don't work very well. They are fiddly, uncool and no fun to wear, especially at concerts and gigs because they make music sound muffled and you feel disconnected, or like you are underwater.

Using ISOLATE® ear protectors, you still hear the music, but only through bone conduction which is safer and a much nicer experience than the muffled rumble you get with traditional ear plugs.

 

ISOLATE® PRO - Solid Titanium

 

Sonic Forcefield

To use ISOLATE® is to feel like you are inside a sonic force field of protection. You hear more detail in music as the peaks of sound that normally stress your hearing have been brought down to a calm, enjoyable and balanced level. Even whistles and screams around you blend into the music rather than ripping into your ears. You are in your own safe world, but as you can still hear every detail from bone-conducted sound, and feel all the bass in your body, you get all of the pleasure and none of the pain of the experience.

This sonic forcefield can protect you anywhere you want to block out irritating sounds such as...

 

  • Snoring
  • Sleeping
  • Plane, train, bus, car or bike noise
  • Noisy work environments
  • Motorcycling
  • Motorsport
  • Any high impact noise
  • Anywhere else you need isolation from unwanted noise

 

How it all began

For as long as he can remember, Flare’s founder Davies Roberts has been fascinated by all things sound and noise related. 

Whether it’s working on ways to improve sound quality in loudspeakers and earphones or developing ideas in noise cancelling products, one thing has remained constant: his drive to address existing issues and to create revolutionary products that improve our experience of sound.

 

Block Sound... Don't try to absorb it!

 

Traditional earplugs, particularly the standard foam ones, rely on absorption principles to attenuate sound. Trying to absorb sound in this way requires a large amount of material to work well: examining anechoic chambers demonstrates this with their foot-long spikes of foam.

When restricted to less than an inch of material in an ear plug, absorption is not the way to do it. Absorption on this small scale will result in muffled sound in the high and mid frequencies and little to no reduction in bass frequencies. This imbalance is stressful and tiring.

ISOLATE® blocks noise from entering the ears and attenuates all frequencies. Noise is not able to conduct into the patent-pending technology that ISOLATE® uses which means that users are effectively able to turn off their ears to direct noise. The solid metal core of ISOLATE® is almost all the way through the tip which creates a sonic barrier deep inside your ear to block noise. The only sound you hear while using ISOLATE® is from bone conduction which results in an enjoyable and balanced experience with safe sound detail.

 

EARFOAMS®

 

EARFOAMS® come in extra small, small, medium and large sizes.

 

There is a wide variety of memory foam mixes that form ear tips. Getting the formulation just right is the key to a great tip! Flare has developed a special blend of memory foam to be ultra-comfortable and mould perfectly into every ear using the body's own heat. The formulation we use also has as high a resistance as possible to ripping or breaking down.

If our campaign is successful, EARFOAMS® replacement tip packs will be available before reward deliveries commence.

EARFOAMS® main features:

  • Incredibly soft with maximised 'bounce-back' memory retention
  • Increased resistance to ripping and breaking down
  • Very comfortable to use

 

The Metals

Aluminium is a great metal that is strong, lightweight and cost effective for use in ISOLATE®. It can be anodised into various colours to match your look and image. Ear protection just got cool!

Titanium is an exceptional metal and is therefore used in ISOLATE® PRO. Being harder than aluminium it maximises isolation and can stand serious abuse without breaking. Titanium inside your ear, how cool is that?

 

Aerospace Manufacturing

Flare uses a British aerospace certified supplier to manufacture the metal component of the ISOLATE® family. Milled on a robotic precision lathe, the quality, look and feel is far superior to most other mass manufacture techniques. Seeing the capabilities of our supplier along with the incredible quality of the components they produce, convinced us to use this highest standard of aerospace manufacturing.

 

Fitting Instructions - Fitting ISOLATE® is a breeze!

First select the size of tip that suits your ears. Then simply squeeze and roll the tip with your fingers to squash the memory foam down and push deep inside your ear. The end of the ISOLATE® body should sit fully within the Concha of the ear. Fitted correctly you should not hear any direct sound through your ears, you will just hear bone conducted sound!

 

 
Here is our video on how to fit ISOLATE®

 

 

A message from the inventor

“Hearing is an incredibly important sense that should be cherished and respected.

I have spent the last decade on a journey to understand why audio devices were not delivering sound properly to our hearing. I have managed to unlock the issues surrounding sound generation and have discovered solutions which Flare is now using to develop various audio products.

I also became aware that being able to switch off noise was equally important to everyone. I have had many conversations over the last couple of years with people across the world about the failure of traditional ear plugs. I realised that something was clearly going wrong with traditional products and in some cases people were suffering from hearing problems as they either did not get on with using traditional devices and abandoned them, or the products failed to protect people properly when they did use them.

I am very proud of ISOLATE®; I believe that it will enable a quality of life improvement for many people who sleep, work or socialise in noisy environments. I believe that it will keep people’s hearing safe and protected so that ears retain good hearing ability for as long as possible throughout life.

We have a truly exciting new earphone product on the way that we are currently working on. This new earphone delivers all music live in your head, every track sounds like nothing you have ever experienced before and how it was intended to be heard. It is a truly exciting and ear opening sound experience. There has been a lot of work over the last year developing it to ensure that everything is perfect before we launch it soon.

I believe that music should be amazing to experience & safe to listen to and you should be able to isolate yourself from noise that is dangerous or annoying… LONG LIVE EARS” 

Davies Roberts - Flare Audio

 

Risks and Challenges

 

Current production stage:

ISOLATE® is in production, ISOLATE® MiNi is at Beta test stage.

 

Our aerospace supplier:

Our British aerospace supplier is certified to EN 9100:2009 (aerospace standard) which ensures the highest possible standard of quality and consistency.

 

Deliveries:

Delivery times will vary depending on your location in the world.

 

Quality Control:

Every product will be packed and checked by the Flare team before it is shipped to backers.

 

Customer Service:

Coming from pro-audio, we know how important customer service is. The Flare team is expanding our customer services team due to the success of this campaign. If you have any questions please email info@flareaudio.com. Due to the amount of work we have to do response times are currently 2-3 working days and everyone is being responded too in the order an email is received. Thanks for your understanding during this very busy time.

Click here for our Refund and Returns Policy
story_txt:
INTRODUCING ISOLATE® MiNi and ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Ear Protectors!Over 70,000 people are now using ISOLATE® and ISOLATE® PRO to turn the world down like never before and they are loving the experience. From reading the hundreds of emails, messages and reviews we get every day users are reporting that ISOLATE® has changed their lives, improved their music experience and are totally in love with the product.Following feedback from our backers we have now developed a new ISOLATE® MiNi version which will be available in two amazing new colours SILVER PINK and DENIM BLUE anodised aluminium as well as natural and black anodised aluminium. There are also two new PRO versions, ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Titanium and ISOLATE® MiNi PRO Mirror Polished Titanium.All the new ISOLATE® MiNi versions are now available to pre-order in the perks.The ISOLATE® MiNi version has been developed for maximised comfort for all day/night use, it is truly tiny and really comfortable to wear. People with the smallest ear canals now have an ideal solution with ISOLATE® MiNi whilst still achieving the same sound attenuation and experience as the larger ISOLATE® version.ISOLATE® MiNi comes with its own range of 3 sizes of EARFOAMS® which are extra small, small and medium.ISOLATE® features 4mm solid metal inside the ISOLATE® EARFOAMS®ISOLATE® MiNi features 2.5mm solid metal inside the ISOLATE® MiNi EARFOAMS®The graph below shows the sizes of the EARFOAMS® that are included with both the standard ISOLATE® EARFOAMS® and ISOLATE® MiNi EARFOAMS® The majority of people will be able to use both ISOLATE® and ISOLATE® MiNi as the small and medium sized EARFOAMS® of both versions have exactly the same external size. This will allow people to select either version of ISOLATE® to suit their needs and comfort requirements.Delivery timesISOLATE® - ORDER BY 3PM EACH DAY FOR NEXT DAY DESPATCH! (Mon-Fri) - (Please note shipping means the day we send your item, delivery times will depend on your local postal services).ISOLATE® MiNi - Perks will be despatched in February and March. Now you can have perfect sound isolation for...

Sleeping (Undisturbed nights with perfect isolation from snoring and other noises)


Travelling (On planes, trains and automobiles, enjoy silence when travelling)


Concerts and Clubs (Enjoy the most incredible sonic details at very safe levels)


Motorsports (Total protection from very loud and painful noises)


Motorbikes (Micro in size and hidden inside your ear, they won't interfere with your helmet)


Working (Protect your ears against permanent hearing damage)


Construction (High level noise protection)

CE Certified  to BSEN 352-2-2002 - SNR35 (Aluminium) SNR36 (PRO Titanium)
 ISOLATE® is not like any other ear plug; it blocks all sound from entering your ears including bass frequencies for the first time ever without any batteries or annoying re-charging. ISOLATE® is micro in size and so can be used anywhere to isolate your ears from unwanted noise.We have developed the patent-pending technology, produced various prototypes and tested ISOLATE® in many ears (including gaining independent reviews and endorsements which are shown below). We have tested ISOLATE® out with dozens of users and on in-house test equipment which has shown staggering attenuation results.
We now need the support of crowd funding to ramp up into mass production and attract major retailers to stock ISOLATE®. By backing our crowdfunding campaign you will receive your ISOLATE® reward before online retailers commence selling the product.


Flare's patent-pending ISOLATE® Technology
Flare's founder and inventor, Davies Roberts, could not understand why traditional ear plugs were so bad at doing their job. When he looked into it, he realised that ear protection was taking the wrong path in using plastic, silicone and foam to absorb sound.
“Imagine wearing a helmet all the way over your head made of plastic or foam. What would you hear? The sound level would be reduced but the effect of the plastic resonating and foam muffling the sound would not be so nice to listen to. Both these materials do stop some sound but, frankly, are not that great at it, especially at lower frequencies. When low frequencies get past traditional ear protection, details get lost and you're left in a world of booming bass and sub-sonic pressure which you can't wait to escape from. No noise cancelling electronics can deal with this muffled sound that comes from the plastic and foam parts of such devices.
But imagine putting your head all the way into an inch-thick, solid titanium helmet encased in foam. Now what would you hear?
... Exactly!  That’s just what I thought."
Solid metal is a good conductor and so had been discounted as unsuitable for use in ear protectors. Until now. What Davies has discovered is that, in order to conduct sound, metals need a direct connection. Without a direct connection solid metals block sound perfectly!
"When you isolate a small piece of metal or dense material in soft foam inside your ear, sound waves can't penetrate from the flexible medium of air and it becomes the perfect isolator. Understanding this principle is what inspired us to develop the perfect ear plug. We want to revolutionise hearing protection!"
 

 

Block Low Frequencies
Traditional ear plugs and defenders cannot block low frequencies from entering your ears very well. As well as being unpleasant to listen to, they make sound muffled, leaving you feeling disconnected, or as if you are underwater. Low frequencies produce the most energy, and this is not absorbed properly by the plastic or foam used in traditional ear plugs.

ISOLATE® has been tested in-house against a typical foam earplug using a direct sound source, this measured the attenuation level achieved by the different materials. 
The red trace below is the source signal which was a headphone unit, the pink trace is a standard foam earplug, the green trace is ISOLATE® (aluminium) and the blue trace is ISOLATE® PRO (titanium). Each vertical division on the chart represents -10dB of sound attenuation.

As you can see by the data below both ISOLATE® versions totally out-perform the traditional foam earplug. ISOLATE® Pro Titanium has an additional 8-9dB (more than four times the attenuation) with the lowest frequencies, which is crucial for blocking out the most irritating snoring, high impact sounds and enabling you to hear more detail in music.
 

 

ISOLATE® MiNi for a perfect night's sleep
 
ISOLATE® technology works by a revolutionary approach in the materials used. Noise is blocked by a dense material suspended in soft memory foam to isolate it from the effects of conduction. The result is total direct noise isolation for your ears for the first time ever without any electronics!
 

3D DRAWING
 

ISOLATE® 3D Drawing cross section
 

Independent Reviews
Headfonics review of ISOLATE Pro
 HiFi Pig review of ISOLATE Pro
RideApart review and road test

 

Cool Design
 

A good design will stand the test of time.
Good design is not just about achieving a good technical result, it's also about great visual identity. Modern industrial design is Davies's passion; clean lines and symmetrical shapes which never date. This is demonstrated in the design of ISOLATE® with perfect form and optimal functionality to create a pleasing visual simplicity.
ISOLATE® has also been designed to last forever. The tips, which can be size-selected for best fit, are replaceable when they get damaged or wear out, but you will never need to replace the ISOLATE® metal component.
ISOLATE® has ridges on the tip connector that allows the tip to lock into place. To remove a tip, squeeze the tip and twist and pull the body. To put on a new one, simply push it into place with a satisfying click.
The tips used with ISOLATE® are called EARFOAMS®. They are very easy to fit and come in small, medium and large sizes to ensure ISOLATE® will fit the majority of people. A set of each size is included with each ISOLATE® pair.
 
 

ISOLATE® on planes to block jet and other noise 

Ears ringing? That's the sound of damage.
If you enjoy concerts, gigs and music as much as we do, then you’ll know exactly what we’re talking about. Ringing in the ears and cotton wool hearing in the morning are the result of hearing damage. 
Conventional plastic or foam earplugs don't work very well. They are fiddly, uncool and no fun to wear, especially at concerts and gigs because they make music sound muffled and you feel disconnected, or like you are underwater.
Using ISOLATE® ear protectors, you still hear the music, but only through bone conduction which is safer and a much nicer experience than the muffled rumble you get with traditional ear plugs.
 

ISOLATE® PRO - Solid Titanium
 

Sonic Forcefield
To use ISOLATE® is to feel like you are inside a sonic force field of protection. You hear more detail in music as the peaks of sound that normally stress your hearing have been brought down to a calm, enjoyable and balanced level. Even whistles and screams around you blend into the music rather than ripping into your ears. You are in your own safe world, but as you can still hear every detail from bone-conducted sound, and feel all the bass in your body, you get all of the pleasure and none of the pain of the experience.
This sonic forcefield can protect you anywhere you want to block out irritating sounds such as...
 

Snoring
Sleeping
Plane, train, bus, car or bike noise
Noisy work environments
Motorcycling
Motorsport
Any high impact noise
Anywhere else you need isolation from unwanted noise

 

How it all began
For as long as he can remember, Flare’s founder Davies Roberts has been fascinated by all things sound and noise related. 
Whether it’s working on ways to improve sound quality in loudspeakers and earphones or developing ideas in noise cancelling products, one thing has remained constant: his drive to address existing issues and to create revolutionary products that improve our experience of sound.
 

Block Sound... Don't try to absorb it! Traditional earplugs, particularly the standard foam ones, rely on absorption principles to attenuate sound. Trying to absorb sound in this way requires a large amount of material to work well: examining anechoic chambers demonstrates this with their foot-long spikes of foam.
When restricted to less than an inch of material in an ear plug, absorption is not the way to do it. Absorption on this small scale will result in muffled sound in the high and mid frequencies and little to no reduction in bass frequencies. This imbalance is stressful and tiring.
ISOLATE® blocks noise from entering the ears and attenuates all frequencies. Noise is not able to conduct into the patent-pending technology that ISOLATE® uses which means that users are effectively able to turn off their ears to direct noise. The solid metal core of ISOLATE® is almost all the way through the tip which creates a sonic barrier deep inside your ear to block noise. The only sound you hear while using ISOLATE® is from bone conduction which results in an enjoyable and balanced experience with safe sound detail.
 

EARFOAMS®
 

EARFOAMS® come in extra small, small, medium and large sizes.

 
There is a wide variety of memory foam mixes that form ear tips. Getting the formulation just right is the key to a great tip! Flare has developed a special blend of memory foam to be ultra-comfortable and mould perfectly into every ear using the body's own heat. The formulation we use also has as high a resistance as possible to ripping or breaking down.
If our campaign is successful, EARFOAMS® replacement tip packs will be available before reward deliveries commence.
EARFOAMS® main features:

Incredibly soft with maximised 'bounce-back' memory retention
Increased resistance to ripping and breaking down
Very comfortable to use


 

The Metals
Aluminium is a great metal that is strong, lightweight and cost effective for use in ISOLATE®. It can be anodised into various colours to match your look and image. Ear protection just got cool!
Titanium is an exceptional metal and is therefore used in ISOLATE® PRO. Being harder than aluminium it maximises isolation and can stand serious abuse without breaking. Titanium inside your ear, how cool is that?
 

Aerospace Manufacturing
Flare uses a British aerospace certified supplier to manufacture the metal component of the ISOLATE® family. Milled on a robotic precision lathe, the quality, look and feel is far superior to most other mass manufacture techniques. Seeing the capabilities of our supplier along with the incredible quality of the components they produce, convinced us to use this highest standard of aerospace manufacturing.
 

Fitting Instructions - Fitting ISOLATE® is a breeze!
First select the size of tip that suits your ears. Then simply squeeze and roll the tip with your fingers to squash the memory foam down and push deep inside your ear. The end of the ISOLATE® body should sit fully within the Concha of the ear. Fitted correctly you should not hear any direct sound through your ears, you will just hear bone conducted sound!
 

 
Here is our video on how to fit ISOLATE®


 
 

A message from the inventor
“Hearing is an incredibly important sense that should be cherished and respected.
I have spent the last decade on a journey to understand why audio devices were not delivering sound properly to our hearing. I have managed to unlock the issues surrounding sound generation and have discovered solutions which Flare is now using to develop various audio products.
I also became aware that being able to switch off noise was equally important to everyone. I have had many conversations over the last couple of years with people across the world about the failure of traditional ear plugs. I realised that something was clearly going wrong with traditional products and in some cases people were suffering from hearing problems as they either did not get on with using traditional devices and abandoned them, or the products failed to protect people properly when they did use them.
I am very proud of ISOLATE®; I believe that it will enable a quality of life improvement for many people who sleep, work or socialise in noisy environments. I believe that it will keep people’s hearing safe and protected so that ears retain good hearing ability for as long as possible throughout life.
We have a truly exciting new earphone product on the way that we are currently working on. This new earphone delivers all music live in your head, every track sounds like nothing you have ever experienced before and how it was intended to be heard. It is a truly exciting and ear opening sound experience. There has been a lot of work over the last year developing it to ensure that everything is perfect before we launch it soon.
I believe that music should be amazing to experience & safe to listen to and you should be able to isolate yourself from noise that is dangerous or annoying… LONG LIVE EARS” 
Davies Roberts - Flare Audio
 

Risks and Challenges
 
Current production stage:
ISOLATE® is in production, ISOLATE® MiNi is at Beta test stage.
 
Our aerospace supplier:
Our British aerospace supplier is certified to EN 9100:2009 (aerospace standard) which ensures the highest possible standard of quality and consistency.
 
Deliveries:
Delivery times will vary depending on your location in the world.
 
Quality Control:
Every product will be packed and checked by the Flare team before it is shipped to backers.
 
Customer Service:
Coming from pro-audio, we know how important customer service is. The Flare team is expanding our customer services team due to the success of this campaign. If you have any questions please email info@flareaudio.com. Due to the amount of work we have to do response times are currently 2-3 working days and everyone is being responded too in the order an email is received. Thanks for your understanding during this very busy time.

story:
AUVIO has created and sold over 15 million pieces of the best wired and wireless earbuds in the past decade, and now we have gone completely wireless into the future. With our engineering and design expertise and testing data, AUVIO brings you the ultimate AUVIO MOTION+, designed with your freedom in mind. This true wireless PLUS earbuds is carefully engineered with the best ergonomic fit for active individuals to enjoy the freedom to experience accurate yet dynamic sound while on the move.

YOU'VE GOT THE POWER

Stay in MOTION with 48 hours play time. From work to workout, AUVIO MOTION+ is all you will need to carry with you. With the latest Bluetooth chipset and specially designed firmware, power consumption is at its optimal. AUVIO MOTION+ uses carefully selected and tested high quality lithium polymer battery in both ear pieces and in the charging case. The 500 mAH battery capacity in the charging case gives AUVIO MOTION+ up to 5 full charges and 40 hours extra play time.

 

A PERFECT FIT TO YOUR ACTIVE LIFESTYLE 

Lightweight, slip proof fit, sweat proof protection.  We have tested AUVIO MOTION+ with over 100 users  participating in different activities of various intensity and duration to engineer its structure for the best ergonomic fit. 

We have selected the strongest and lightest material in the industry. It's 4-layer printed board design reduces the overall size and weight of AUVIO MOTION+.

The wing tips, ear tips and earbud structures are carefully designed so these lightweight earbuds fit snug and comfortable in your ears. Never worry about losing your earbuds during your work outs or runs. 

AUVIO MOTION+'s IPX5 water resistant structure and nano coating provide double sweat and splash proof protection to the earbuds and it's internal electronic components. Regardless of whether you are running a marathon in the rain or working out a sweat in an intensive weight training session, they are there to stay.  

 

 

COMPLETELY WIRE FREE

Listen wireless, charge wireless. We’ve cut all wires from these lightweight earbuds so they will never get in your way again. Be free, be comfortable to do whatever you want for hours and hours, forgetting they are even there.   

 

THE LATEST AND THE GREATEST 

Connect and stay connected. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chipset and True Wireless PLUS technology to secure simultaneous stereo connectivity to both earbuds for the most accurate sound and uninterrupted connection.  The dynamically configured antenna is specially turned to the best angle for the greatest reception. AUVIO MOTION+ has gone through different use cases to verify the best reception (such as pocket test, backpack test) in different environments (bus, train, street, office, etc.). You can be 45ft away from your device and still stay connected for hours!  AUVIO MOTION+ also has smart pairing technology that only requires you to just pair once and they will take care of the rest to pair automatically.  

 

AMAZING SOUND 

Stereo Phone Calls. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest true wireless PLUS technology delivering audio to both earbuds at the same time. When on a call, it suppresses background noise such as traffic or nearby conversations so the person on the other end hears your clearly. Together with it's snug, slip proof fit, AUVIO MOTION+ gives that perfect barrier for noise isolation so you can have the best quality conversations. 

Engineered to take sound to the next level inside and out. On the inside, AUVIO MOTION+ uses extremely light and thin graphene speaker drivers to reproduce strong bass, crystal clear vocals and deliver wider range of sound frequency (20-40kHz). It can capture extremely small variations in music signal so you can enjoy endless hours of unbelievable dynamic yet accurate sound.  On the outside, its lightweight snug fit reduces ambient noise to the ears so you can enjoy music at lower volume making it much safer to your hearing. You will be able to hear every detail without distortion.

For a preview of MOTION+'s amazing sound, use any headphones to hear how it improves your music experience with stronger bass and clearer vocals.

*For better experience, listen to these on your smartphone.

 

GO FUTHER WITH THE AUVIO MOTION+ APP 

We understand everyone is different so we have created the AUVO MOTION+ app so you have the power in your hands to customize the earbuds as you like them.  

Create your own sound curve. Customize and save EQ settings depending on the kind of music you are listening to. 

Lost and found. Just in case you forgot where you put your earbuds, the app will help you find its last detected location. 

Control the controls.  AUVIO MOTION+ app lets you customize each button and each press the way you like it.  

 

 QUALITY GUARANTEED 

AUVIO is serious about quality. Our Engineering and Quality Experts have developed testing methodologies designed to put each of our products through extreme conditions, life and user tests.  

Here is a few of the testing and manufacturing equipment that we are using to ensure MOTION+ delivers according to specifications.

 

Graphene Speaker Drivers Test is done on each and everyone of the graphene drivers to check that they meet specifications before assembly into the unit. 

100% Bluetooth Test by #8852 Bluetooth tester to check each earbud to ensure Bluetooth transmit and receive performance 

Extreme Temperature Test Chamber puts MOTION+ under extremely high and low temperature and humidity conditions. Functional tests are done after to check reliability. 

Lithium Battery Reliability Test charges and discharges the battery in many cycles testing their lifecycle performance, capacity retention, etc. 

Semi-automatic production improves manufacturing accuracy and efficiency.

IPX5 Testing

 

 

WHATS IN THE BOX

AUVIO MOTION+ 

Charging case

USB charging cable

Wing tips (S/M/L)

Eartips (S/M/L)

 

SEE WHY AUVIO MOTION+ IS ALL YOU NEED

 

WHERE ARE WE NOW 

 After many stages of testing and retesting, our designers and engineers have come to the final design stage. We have confirmed the material that gives AUVIO MOTION+ its light and durable body, the structure with the perfect ergonomic fit and electrical components that will give it it's overall reliability and user experience. 

Here is a first look at the AUVIO MOTION+ appearance and functional prototypes.  

 

HOW IT WORKS

Wireless Charge Earbuds

Simply place AUVIO MOTION+ in the charging case to start charging. The LEDs lights turn red during charging. 

 

Wireless Charge Charging Case

Place AUVIO MOTION+ charging case on a wireless charging pad to start charging wire-free.

 

Easy Pairing

Pair AUVIO MOTION+ in just a few quick steps.

  1. Remove the earbuds from the charging case. Wait a few seconds and the LED will flash red and blue alternatively in pairing mode.
  2. Turn on Bluetooth function on your device to begin searching for AUVIO MOTION+.
  3. Select AUVIO MOTION+ from the list of devices to pair. LED on the earbuds flash blue every 4 seconds when pairing is successful.
 

Auto Pairing

If AUVIO MOTION+ was already paired with your device before, simply remove the earbuds from the charging case and they will pair automatically with your device. 

 

Magnetic

 Controls

 

PERKS

 

About AUVIO

AUVIO has been creating quality audio devices for more than 10 years and is one of the top brands for audio in the United States.  AUVIO has sold more than 15 million units in more than 6,000 stores across the U.S. 

AUVIO is dedicated to creating and innovating experiences that fits seamlessly into everyday lives. Every aspect of product experience is considered in AUVIO designs – from hardware to software and everything in between – ensuring products are stylish, easy to use and meets our customers’ needs and desires.

Risks and challenges

We fully expect to deliver AUVIO Motion+ true wireless plus earbuds with exceptional quality according to our project timeline. However, even the most well-planned process can meet unpredictable events. We will make sure you are updated on our progress so you know exactly where we are and what we are doing.

International backers: We will ship AUVIO Motion+ worldwide, except of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please be aware that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different shipment dates. We will provide updates if the shipment date changes. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at support@auviosound.com.

Music courtesy of Nicolai Heidlas.

You can be 45ft away from your device and still stay connected for hours!  AUVIO MOTION+ also has smart pairing technology that only requires you to just pair once and they will take care of the rest to pair automatically.   AMAZING SOUND Stereo Phone Calls. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest true wireless PLUS technology delivering audio to both earbuds at the same time. When on a call, it suppresses background noise such as traffic or nearby conversations so the person on the other end hears your clearly. Together with it's snug, slip proof fit, AUVIO MOTION+ gives that perfect barrier for noise isolation so you can have the best quality conversations. Engineered to take sound to the next level inside and out. On the inside, AUVIO MOTION+ uses extremely light and thin graphene speaker drivers to reproduce strong bass, crystal clear vocals and deliver wider range of sound frequency (20-40kHz). It can capture extremely small variations in music signal so you can enjoy endless hours of unbelievable dynamic yet accurate sound.  On the outside, its lightweight snug fit reduces ambient noise to the ears so you can enjoy music at lower volume making it much safer to your hearing. You will be able to hear every detail without distortion.For a preview of MOTION+'s amazing sound, use any headphones to hear how it improves your music experience with stronger bass and clearer vocals.*For better experience, listen to these on your smartphone. GO FUTHER WITH THE AUVIO MOTION+ APP We understand everyone is different so we have created the AUVO MOTION+ app so you have the power in your hands to customize the earbuds as you like them.  Create your own sound curve. Customize and save EQ settings depending on the kind of music you are listening to. Lost and found. Just in case you forgot where you put your earbuds, the app will help you find its last detected location. Control the controls.  AUVIO MOTION+ app lets you customize each button and each press the way you like it.    QUALITY GUARANTEED AUVIO is serious about quality. Our Engineering and Quality Experts have developed testing methodologies designed to put each of our products through extreme conditions, life and user tests.  Here is a few of the testing and manufacturing equipment that we are using to ensure MOTION+ delivers according to specifications. Graphene Speaker Drivers Test is done on each and everyone of the graphene drivers to check that they meet specifications before assembly into the unit. 100% Bluetooth Test by #8852 Bluetooth tester to check each earbud to ensure Bluetooth transmit and receive performance Extreme Temperature Test Chamber puts MOTION+ under extremely high and low temperature and humidity conditions. Functional tests are done after to check reliability. Lithium Battery Reliability Test charges and discharges the battery in many cycles testing their lifecycle performance, capacity retention, etc. Semi-automatic production improves manufacturing accuracy and efficiency.IPX5 Testing  WHATS IN THE BOXAUVIO MOTION+ Charging caseUSB charging cableWing tips (S/M/L)Eartips (S/M/L) SEE WHY AUVIO MOTION+ IS ALL YOU NEED WHERE ARE WE NOW  After many stages of testing and retesting, our designers and engineers have come to the final design stage. We have confirmed the material that gives AUVIO MOTION+ its light and durable body, the structure with the perfect ergonomic fit and electrical components that will give it it's overall reliability and user experience. Here is a first look at the AUVIO MOTION+ appearance and functional prototypes.   HOW IT WORKSWireless Charge EarbudsSimply place AUVIO MOTION+ in the charging case to start charging. The LEDs lights turn red during charging. 

 
Wireless Charge Charging CasePlace AUVIO MOTION+ charging case on a wireless charging pad to start charging wire-free.

 
Easy Pairing
Pair AUVIO MOTION+ in just a few quick steps.


Remove the earbuds from the charging case. Wait a few seconds and the LED will flash red and blue alternatively in pairing mode.
Turn on Bluetooth function on your device to begin searching for AUVIO MOTION+.
Select AUVIO MOTION+ from the list of devices to pair. LED on the earbuds flash blue every 4 seconds when pairing is successful.

 
Auto Pairing
If AUVIO MOTION+ was already paired with your device before, simply remove the earbuds from the charging case and they will pair automatically with your device. 

 

Magnetic
 Controls


 
PERKS

 
About AUVIO
AUVIO has been creating quality audio devices for more than 10 years and is one of the top brands for audio in the United States.  AUVIO has sold more than 15 million units in more than 6,000 stores across the U.S. 
AUVIO is dedicated to creating and innovating experiences that fits seamlessly into everyday lives. Every aspect of product experience is considered in AUVIO designs – from hardware to software and everything in between – ensuring products are stylish, easy to use and meets our customers’ needs and desires.

Risks and challenges
We fully expect to deliver AUVIO Motion+ true wireless plus earbuds with exceptional quality according to our project timeline. However, even the most well-planned process can meet unpredictable events. We will make sure you are updated on our progress so you know exactly where we are and what we are doing.
International backers: We will ship AUVIO Motion+ worldwide, except of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please be aware that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.
Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different shipment dates. We will provide updates if the shipment date changes. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at support@auviosound.com.
Music courtesy of Nicolai Heidlas.

story:
• Sound4d stand for 'Sound for Devil' or '4Dimension'.
  • Sound4d is a back-cushion type speaker.
  • Sond4d can play HIFI sound and woofer based vibration.
  • You don't need any extra home theater or big woofer to enjoy movie theater-like sound. Sound4d is good enough.
  • The newest sound4d speaker is FX-1200 which is being develop now.
  • Perks include all charges. (VAT and international delivery)
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty will apply.
  • Is there any case not to get Perks? No way. whether the project reach its goal or not, all of you can get your perks.
  • Is there any place I can buy a Sound4d FX-1200 except here? No.
  • Do you have website?  Yes. we have e-shoppingmall. but, we haven't build english site yet. www.sound4d.com
    •  

     

    Simply, Sound4d is a speaker that gives you a sound and 4D vibration effect.

    Why do i need sound4d speaker?

    In general, a powerful home theater or woofer speaker is hard to enjoy their best performance at home. because of its loudness. The person who enjoy it might be appreciated but the neighbor or his family will not be happy about it.

    Sound4D is different.

    You can enjoy a big movie theater-like sound at your home without disturbing anyone. Game, Music, Movie. what ever you like, just enjoy it with Sound4D.

    No need to worry about other people. You can enjoy the fully maximized sound like movie theater.

    It feels like bring a strong vibration and acoustics from a movie theater or night club to only 1 meter radius of your body.

     

     

    Sound4D speaker separate the lower frequency sound like explosion or gun shot.

    And the vibration unit is produced a strong vibration by playing it. And this vibration shakes user’s body and chair at the same time.

    when vibration generates, the entire cushion becomes a giant springs. Furthermore, the vibration is formed a very big sound pressure and woofer base. it gives you a real surround sound and deep feeling about the space.

    So, when you watch a war movie, you will be able to feel the bullets fly around you.

    Also,the Sound4D gives you an ability to enjoy its grandeur sound by only yourself.

    The secret is in the position of the speaker.

    The nearer sound from ear can transmit a strong sound even with a low volume. Just like a headphone or earphone.

    I means compared to general home theater, Sound4d can transmit same amount of sound with extremely low decibel.

     

     

    Hello.

    My name is Jungdoo Yun.  I am a Producer of the Sound4D speaker.

     

    I graduated from the 'Academy of Art University' San Francisco in the United States. And then I worked as VFX artist in the Game company. My job was making a visual effect such as magic, fire, water, etc.

    That's why I was so interested in this field. I love Movies and Games. Especially, i like all kind of special effects.

    First time when i saw the 4D movie, it shocked me. And i thought if i can play a video games in 4D, that will shock me again. But, it wasn't happened. In fact, their was no 4D device i can use for game at home.

    Then, I decided to make it.

    The start was a 4D helmet.  Developing special effects like a 4D Theater, that can even enjoy at home was a goal.

    Imagine.  If you can enjoy movies or games with 4D effects at your home. Just like a 4D theater, isn’t it really nice?

     

     

    The 4D helmet has been designed to realize wind effect, water effect, vibration effect and light effect. Just like same functions as the exclusive 4D Theater.

    The project was successfully done.  And the functions were nicely embodied. However there was an unexpected problem.

    It was too heavy to wear it for long hour use, even though it was lighter than your smartphone.Also, compatibility with other games or device was a problem too.

    What I need was a machine that is simply compatible with the existing games or movies. And also, comfortable and convenient for long hours use.

    The thing that was born by it is the Sound 4d speaker.

     

     

     

    Sound4D is so simple and easy to use. Just plug it to the audio output of your Game machine, TV or MP3. And Enjoy its extreme sound and vibration.

    That's all.The beauty of sound4d is its compatibility. Playstation, Xbox360, Nintendo, computer, TV, smart phone, everything work fine.

    And, if you have bluetooth reciever, bluetooth connect is possible. Means wireless audio connetion.

     

     

     

    We made approx. 1,000 pieces of Sound4D speaker(FX-500 model).
    And tested a response, selling to Korean market.
    We got tons of feedbak and obtained marvelous outcome that the commodity satisfaction reached 100%.

     

    Although many customers has loved and satisfied, but the early version of Sound4D speaker was too thick. The vibration was not spread enough to whole your body. And the sound were too loud.

    So, We decided to make more Thin and more powerful sound4d speaker that has better sound definition with even low decibel. (code naeme:FX-1200).

    Of course the product in use of acoustic vibration is not totally new concept.

    But we dare to speak with confidence. Let us say, any product can hardly be compared to FX-1200.

     

    My challenge for the personal 4D equipment is from now on.

    I think all the functions that have been used for the 4D helmet can be mounted on Sound4D speaker.

    Several major company are trying to make 3D device. They will give you visually virtual reality. Then we will give you another way of virtual reality.

    If these two equipments are harmonized, you will be able to meet real virtual reality. that can see, hear and feel.

     

     

    DLIKOREA is an autoparts company who makes rubber products for automobile.
    DLI established at 1978 in Korea.
    The major automobile companies such like Hyundai, Kia, TOYOTA, GM, and VW use our products.

     
    Sound4D is a new business of our company. Although our team is tiny yet. but we believe, Sound4d will be a Mega hit brand soon in the future.

     

     

     

     

    Rated voltage : 12V 2A

    Full range drive unit : 3 inch x 2,   2.5 inch x 2

    Vibration unit : aprox. 5 inch

    Volume control : Main Volume, Super bass, Bass, Treble

    Frequency Response : 20Hz - 20Khz

    Peack power of Output(AMP) : Main channel / 300W x2

                                                       Surper bass / 150w

     

     

     

    - Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my perks?

    Whether you lived in any other country, shipping is free. Local import taxes may apply.

    - When can I get my perks?

    Our launching plan for the sound4d FX-1200 will be end of April. You probably will get your perks on May.

    - I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

    Email the Sound4d Customer Happiness Team at Sound4d@hotmail.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

    - What if you fail to reach the funding target?

    Even if we don't reach  the goal, we will still finish up the project. And Sound4d FX-1200 will be launch on April. All contributions will be get your perks as promised. In fact, what we need more than money is Public Relations and Marketing. We though 'cloud funding' is the perfect solution for that.

    - What is the retail price of Sound4d FX-1200?

    The retail price of FX-1200 will be approx. USD280. The cost of delivery are not included.

    - What warranties apply to the Sound4d FX-1200?

    1 Year manufacturer warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 28 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, Canonical can not cover the cost of the return postage and packaging.

    - Can i extend warranty?

    Yes. you can. Make another contribution and select the perk "3 years warranty".

    - Where can i get A/S and How long will it take?

    This equipment is designed to prevent failure. However, when you need A/S in any case, You have to ship it back to Korea. But Our company will pay all the cost for a postage and repair fee during the warranties except damage of your responsibility. And it will usually take 2-3 business days to fix it except delivery time.

    - What if my question isn’t answered here?

    We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the Sound4d campaign. Email us at Sound4d@hotmail.com

     

     

     Sound4d logo mouse pad.

     

    .

story:
Smartphones already provide an easy and convenient way to record a video.

Although your phone probably has a quality camera with high resolution video recording, it still can not capture the distant and moving sounds with the built-in phone mic.

Traditional voice recorders are too big and incompatible with your phone. 

Wireless mics are expensive and take a lot of work to connect to your phone, with acceptable audio quality only within a small radius.  

Professional audio mixing, on the other hand,  is expensive and time-consuming. 

 

We offer a fast, simple and straightforward way to record distant sounds using your phone!

Just clip on the GoPlay  mic, connect it with the app on your smartphone, and shoot your video!  You'll get CD quality audio at an unlimited range, with the audio stored on the mic's  local memory. The Auto-Sync feature lets you mix stunning videos, sync video from your phone camera with GoPlay audio, without possessing any knowledge of post-production software or a PC!

Tiny to put anywhere

Apart from wearing, there are two more flexible ways you can use GoPlay in many scenarios! It's a very useful gadget that provides you to record a conference or a company meeting memo.

An elegant design. Subtle and universal. Match it with your favorite shirt.

Auto-Sync

You don't need any knowledge of video post-production software and no need to waste your time manually adjusting the audio timing.

Our timestamp mechanism will auto sync the GoPlay audio with your phone video.,

Recording Limit

You can shoot unlimited takes, as long as your phone has some available storage. However, in order for the app to run smoothly on various phone platforms, there are some limited per recording:

  •  Audio only: 2 hours per taking
  • Audio and video: 15 minutes per taking

 

Export 

All the media including audio, phone video or mixed videos can be exported to your PC or Mac for further editing. So, whatever video equipment you've grown used to (DSLR, GoPro, Drone...), you can use GoPlay as your sound resources.

Text Transcript, a new coming feature:

On app version 2.3.6, built-in text transcript and correction function have been implemented.( paid service with free trial)

Why?

Well, it is faster than regular typing (up to 400 words/minutes),with even higher transcript accuracy as the AI technology progresses.

There is another great advantage. Once you convert audio into text, it will help you easily search the content from dozens of shootings.

Also, share or publish it on your web page instantly.

This means that you can save a lot of time on subtitle editing! Just one click and you can watch the video with subtitles in minutes!

So, why not?

Only leading engines in audio software are integrated for speed and accuracy:

 IBM  Google  iflytek

It is so powerful that you can upload large audio files to the server, the app will automatically split them into multiple smaller pieces so audio converting can be faster. 

How fast is the converting process?

It varied on the engine, but, typically, an hour recording takes about 10 minutes to upload and complete the transcript.

Supported Languages:

  • UK English
  • US English
  • French
  • Brazilian Portuguese
  • Mandarin Chinese
  • Japanese
  • Arabic
  • Spanish

Build-in correction editor

Although the average amount of correct transcript is about  86%~95% (claimed by various engines used), you still need to do some minor correcting manually. The built-in correction editor allows you to correct words, and yet maintain the timeline information. Once finished, a subtitle is just a click away!

Multi-Mic control:

The release date for our professional app ver3.0 is estimated to be in August 2017, and it brings the multi mic control feature. You can use one smartphone to control up to 5 GoPlay mics simultaneously. Great for an interview with lots of guests, right?

Yes, Windjammer will also be available also in August 2017.

Upgrade your smartphone into a pro camera, with a clear audio recording.

Try it yourself!

Put one in your pocket and get ready to record some awesome audio.

For more, follow the links:

  "High-end Audio Recording in a Tiny Device"

 

"Change the Way you Think about Shooting iPhone video"

 

                              How does it work?

01 Bluetooth Connection

02 Shooting

03 WiFi Retrieval

04 Mix & Share

 

How-to & Angel users video

 

 
 

Keep it next to your phone at all times.

Always be ready to shoot like a pro!

 
 

A message from Steven

     

   

Hi, I am Steven and I come from Beijing, China. I spent most of my days in the professional sound industry. I’ve been involved in the film industry for decades, participated in the Beijing Olympic 2008 opening ceremony, as well as many on-location recording events. And I am a fan of excellent audio quality.

One day I tried to record a video of my son riding his bike using my smartphone, but I was unable to capture the sound of his voice clearly. That struck me, because that’s one memory I wish I had recorded right. 

 After I failed to find a commercially available product that could solve this problem, I invented a consumer-friendly gadget that can emulate the "double system" technique used in the film industry—meaning the video and audio are recorded and stored separately, and later synchronized and mixed on a PC.

A thought came to me: “Why not use a smartphone app to do auto-syncing"?

And that’s how it all started…

We are both proud and humbled to invite you to try out our new product. It has surpassed my own expectations, and is simply a lot of fun to play with!

We need all the support and feedback to make our product even better. Mass production requires capital and pre-sales. We will continue to conduct further R&D, getting even more out of the current hardware, while keeping an eye out on the future.

Tell your friends if you feel GoPlay might amuse or help them too!

A big thank you!

                                                                                                      Steven Gao

Contact us at:  service@1gospace.com

 

Share our story!

If you love what you see and think your friends will love it too, then why not share it with them?

Build-in correction editorAlthough the average amount of correct transcript is about  86%~95% (claimed by various engines used), you still need to do some minor correcting manually. The built-in correction editor allows you to correct words, and yet maintain the timeline information. Once finished, a subtitle is just a click away!Multi-Mic control:The release date for our professional app ver3.0 is estimated to be in August 2017, and it brings the multi mic control feature. You can use one smartphone to control up to 5 GoPlay mics simultaneously. Great for an interview with lots of guests, right?Yes, Windjammer will also be available also in August 2017.Upgrade your smartphone into a pro camera, with a clear audio recording.Try it yourself!Put one in your pocket and get ready to record some awesome audio.For more, follow the links:  "High-end Audio Recording in a Tiny Device" "Change the Way you Think about Shooting iPhone video"                               How does it work?01 Bluetooth Connection02 Shooting03 WiFi Retrieval04 Mix & Share How-to & Angel users video




 

  Keep it next to your phone at all times.Always be ready to shoot like a pro!  A message from Steven
     
   
Hi, I am Steven and I come from Beijing, China. I spent most of my days in the professional sound industry. I’ve been involved in the film industry for decades, participated in the Beijing Olympic 2008 opening ceremony, as well as many on-location recording events. And I am a fan of excellent audio quality.
One day I tried to record a video of my son riding his bike using my smartphone, but I was unable to capture the sound of his voice clearly. That struck me, because that’s one memory I wish I had recorded right. 
 After I failed to find a commercially available product that could solve this problem, I invented a consumer-friendly gadget that can emulate the "double system" technique used in the film industry—meaning the video and audio are recorded and stored separately, and later synchronized and mixed on a PC.
A thought came to me: “Why not use a smartphone app to do auto-syncing"?
And that’s how it all started…
We are both proud and humbled to invite you to try out our new product. It has surpassed my own expectations, and is simply a lot of fun to play with!
We need all the support and feedback to make our product even better. Mass production requires capital and pre-sales. We will continue to conduct further R&D, getting even more out of the current hardware, while keeping an eye out on the future.
Tell your friends if you feel GoPlay might amuse or help them too!
A big thank you!
                                                                                                      Steven Gao
Contact us at:  service@1gospace.com Share our story!If you love what you see and think your friends will love it too, then why not share it with them?

story:
1,547 orders have been shipped, click HERE to download the shipping template!!

Surge Mini Wireless Earbuds support Advanced Audio Coding (AAC), provide you an amazing audio experience like no other. The latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology ensures a broader signal range and an ultra-stable connectivity.The charging pod can charge the earbuds up to 25 times, providing 100 hours of total play time. It can also function as a 2,000mAh power bank for your Phone. The snug fitting design produces excellent noise cancellation and keeps it securely in place for even the most vigorous exercise routine.

Surge Lite is the 400mAh charging pod version which is smaller and lighter, provides 20 hours total play time.

Surge Pro is the IP67 waterproof & dustproof version, protected from 1 meter water Immersion for up to 30 mins. The earbuds provide 6 hours playtime at one charge.

 

A New Era of Audio Technology

AAC Supported, 100 Hours Play Time

 

 

Happy Backers

 

Seen On

Click HERE to read the full article on MajorHiFi

Click HERE to read the full article on NEW ATLAS

Read the full article on crosseyedpianist.com

Read the full article on mybeerbuzz.com

Read the full article on mob76outlook.com

 

AAC Supported, Superior Sound Quality

Advanced Audio Coding Standard

Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) is an audio coding standard for lossy digital audio compression. Designed to be the successor of the MP3 format, AAC achieves better sound quality than MP3 at the same bit rate.

AAC is the default or standard audio format for YouTube, iPhone, iPod, iPad, iTunes, Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS, DivX Plus Web Player, PlayStation 3 and various Nokia Series 40 phones. It is supported on PlayStation Vita, Wii (with the Photo Channel 1.1 update installed), Sony Walkman MP3 series and later, Android and BlackBerry.

Click HERE to learn more about AAC OKon WIKIPEDIA.

 

Advanced Double-layer Composite Film

6.1mm large custom made dynamic drivers

Equipped with customized driver made of PEEK+PU double-layer composite polymer speaker film.  Surge Mini delivers deeper bass, clearer mids and brighter treble, much more balance even than graphene film which may have a good performance at mid and hight but worse at bass.

 

Designed for An Incredible Audio Experience

Like no other

How to evaluate the Frequency Response Graph? Click HERE to learn more.  A “natural sounding” headphone should be slightly higher in the bass between 40Hz and 500Hz. This compensates for the fact that headphones don't give you the physical punch or 'impact' that the sound waves from a room speaker have. Headphones also need to be rolled-off in the highs to compensate for the drivers being so close to the ear; a gently sloping flat line from 1kHz to about 8-10dB down at 20kHz is about right. Some small dips in the highs may actually be desirable and should exist in the 2kHz to 8kHz region.

The THD (Total Harmonic Distortion) of Surge Mini is lower than 1% which is one of the reason that Surge Mini produce fantastic HiFi sound and crystal-clear acoustics. The latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology provides 2.5 faster connection, which ensures incredible sound and super stable connectivity.

 

Surge Mini vs. Other Products

 

Surge Mini vs. Surge Pro

 

Surge Pro, 1 Meter Immersion for up to 30 Mins

IP67 Waterproof & Dustproof

Surge Mini-2,000mAh Charging Case

Also Works As A Power Bank

The 2,000 mAh charging case can charge the earbuds up to 24 times, provides extra 96 hours of  battery life. It also works as a power bank, powerful enough to charge your iPhone up to 73%.

 

Endless Music with Surge Mini

 

 

 

Latest Bluetooth 5.0 Tech

Faster, Stronger, Safer

Surge Mini features the latest and greatest in Bluetooth technology. With Bluetooth 5, you get the strongest and most reliable connection yet for consistently seamless connectivity between your devices. Strongest connections and speeds means more capacity for data transfer, which means more incredibly detailed and robust sound dimensions and zero audio-video lag, only possible with this cutting edge Bluetooth technology.

 

Snug Fitting Design For Sports

 

The snug fitting design produces excellent noise cancellation and keeps it securely in place for even the most vigorous exercise routine.  Surge Mini is perfect for sports and fitness activities including running, jogging, and other rigorous activity.

Surge Club and our manufacture vendors have spent years collecting data on thousands of ears to create the perfect combination of Surge Mini's proprietary form factor and ear tips.  Surge Mini can achieve a comfortable and secure seal in every ear with its unique system combining the use of both earbud tips.

Stereo Call

Surge Mini outperforms other major brands by overcoming a common limitation in wireless audio tech: the stereo call.

 

Easy Initial Pairing & Instant Auto Pairing

Get connected instantly

Initial Pairing

Pair Mini to your device is so easy, it takes less than 1 second to pair it with iPhone.

Auto Pairing

 

PAIR Mini just once and it will automatically pair when you take them out of the charging case.

Auto Disconnect

When you're done, just put them back in the case and Mini will automatically disconnect from your phone.

Magnetic Secure Design

For the most convenient experience

The magnetic design makes it super easy to secure the earbuds in the case. They won't fall even when the case is opened, guarantee your Mini never get lost or fall out.

 

Active Siri, Button Control, Hands Free

Compatible to Google Assistant and Siri

 

Press Kit

Click HERE to download the press kit. Please contact service@surgeclub.com if you would like to test or review Surge Mini.

Gallery

 

Test & Production

 

Tech Specs

 

Perks

 

Timeline

 

About Surge Mini

Surge Club is a group of designers and engineers who have been in consumer electronics industry for over 10 years. Most of our team members worked in a well-known firm in the industry before, such as HP, Foxconn, Huawei, etc. The team was awarded as Red Dot Design Award Winner and a few other important design awards in the past 5 years.

While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, we also helped designed and manufactured a number of products for other brands. Surge Mini is the second wireless earphone and the first Bluetooth 5.0 earbuds that we designed.

We believe that the convenience shall not be the excuse for awful audio experience, the extraordinary audio performance shall be the key feature of wireless earbuds.

We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. Just compare Surge Mini with any other wireless earbuds, we are confident that the the sound quality of Surge Mini will be one of the best among them.

story:
中文頁面 | 


Featured On

What is the first thing you do when you wake up in the morning? 

What is the first thing you do when you return home from a busy day at work? 

For many of us, there is only one answer: to turn on a speaker and let music flow through personal space. 

The market today is flooded with mass-produced products made with excessive plastic and metal parts. We all miss the time when products embodied craftsmanship, personality, and beauty.

Carpentry is our expertise and we love working with timber. But we are also aware that forestry practices can damage the environment. So we insist on using wood such as Teak, Oak, and Walnut from large furniture. Through special wood splicing technology, we join these wood panels together to create an environmentally friendly product.

Every MIN7 is made of joined solid wood panels of 15mm thickness. Its natural tone beautifully matches your home decor. 

MIN7 embeds 2 amplifier board chips to power 150W 2.1 stereo system. In order to engineer the best sound, our speaker drivers expert with over 26 years of experience specially designed a new 1” silk dome tweeter, 4” paper cone woofer, and 5.25” subwoofer to deliver the best transition from low to high frequencies.

The unique micro-horn design of tweeters and pointed spikes on the bottom improve the overall sound performance. MIN7’s unique 3 sound chamber design reduces interference between the subwoofer and main speaker, making the sound crisp and clear.

The cones on the woofers are made of paper and wool fibers. The cone paper forming technique is between pressed cone and semi-pressed cone to achieve better sound quality. The polypropylene cone subwoofer as low distortion. It is injection-molded with rubber, which yields a high strength bond between the cone and its surroundings.

MIN7 uses a differential amplifier circuit, which has great anti-noise capability and can better suppress electromagnetic interference. It has low distortion and wider dynamic range. 

In addition, every single MIN7 is handmade and exclusively adjusted by craftsman according to each of their qualities. Our tuning expert with more than 20 years of experience ensures it has harmonically rich sound. Any note that slips away from your ear, MIN7 will help you catch it. 

MIN7 has multiple pairing options. You can easily stream music to MIN7 from your favorite devices through WiFi (AirPlay), Bluetooth, USB, optical, coaxial, and analog audio cable.

You can also use MIN7 as WiFi or Bluetooth audio receiver and connect to existing audio devices or an active subwoofer to enhance the bass performance.

In order to support up to 24bit/192kHz resolution (High-Resolution Audio), MIN7 uses:

-amplifier chips TDA7492 and TDA7498 , 300W RMS

-digital audio receiver CS8416

-digital/analog converter (DAC) system CS4398 

-low-noise dual operational amplifier JRC5532 

Its higher sampling frequency and greater bit depth boast greater detail and texture.

                

Work with Muzo Player APP (Powered by LinkPlay)

 Music Services

Teak 

Noble wood from the Southeast Asia. It has high tensile strength, high oil content, and tight grain, which all contribute to making it durable and highly weather-resistant. It is an excellent choice for solid wood cabinet.

Walnut 

Its grain is usually straight, but becomes wavy toward the roots. Its color can vary from dull brown to rich purplish-brown. It is decay resistant and holds its shape well. It is therefore a top choice for furniture and a highly prized wood.

Oak

Heavy, strong, light colored hardwood with mostly straight-grain. It takes finish beautifully. Classic coarse texture and very durable. It is valued for its strength and resiliency. 

Founded in 2013, a group of carpentry, design, engineering, and audio professionals came together to form the Minfort team. The Minfort design language is inspired by the endless blue sea and the splashing waves of Corpus Christi, a coastal city in Texas, USA. Our products aim to bring a sense of peace and nature to the users.

Media Contact

Click Here for Our Press Kit

or Send us an Email: minfortmin7@gmail.com

What is the first thing you do when you wake up in the morning? 
What is the first thing you do when you return home from a busy day at work? 
For many of us, there is only one answer: to turn on a speaker and let music flow through personal space. 


MIN7 is an elegant multi-function wooden speaker that is handcrafted and engineered to produce a pure audio and visual experience.


SEVEN FUNCTION




The market today is flooded with mass-produced products made with excessive plastic and metal parts.  We all miss the time when products embodied craftsmanship, personality, and beauty.

The unique micro-horn design of tweeters and pointed spikes on the bottom improve the overall sound performance. MIN7’s unique 3 sound chamber design reduces interference between the subwoofer and main speaker, making the sound crisp and clear.

Work with Muzo Player APP (Powered by LinkPlay)






 Music Services

Noble wood from the Southeast Asia. It has high tensile strength, high oil content, and tight grain, which all contribute to making it durable and highly weather-resistant. It is an excellent choice for solid wood cabinet.
Walnut 
Its grain is usually straight, but becomes wavy toward the roots. Its color can vary from dull brown to rich purplish-brown. It is decay resistant and holds its shape well. It is therefore a top choice for furniture and a highly prized wood.
Oak
Heavy, strong, light colored hardwood with mostly straight-grain. It takes finish beautifully. Classic coarse texture and very durable. It is valued for its strength and resiliency. 











 
















Founded in 2013, a group of carpentry, design, engineering, and audio professionals came together to form the Minfort team.  The Minfort design language is inspired by the endless blue sea and the splashing waves of Corpus Christi, a coastal city in Texas, USA. Our products aim to bring a sense of peace and nature to the users.

or Send us an Email: minfortmin7@gmail.com
