www.islainstruments.com

story:
We are over 150% funded, and thanks for making it happen.

The S-Series is now available on amazon stores and damsonglobal.com

The S-Series: Dolby Atmos Wireless Home Cinema system is the first truly wireless home cinema system to produce stunning surround sound in Dolby Laboratories latest technology - Atmos. With incredibly simple plug and play set up and truly wireless surround sound, advance your home cinema experience to the next level. 

Dolby® Atmos is changing the sound of entertainment. Moving audio flows around you in three-dimensional space, transporting you to the heart of the action, creating the very best environment for enjoying the cinema experience at home. Now you can experience movies, music videos and your favourite box sets exactly as the director wants.

Damson’s built-in JetStreamNet Wireless Technology means no messy cables. And with 
a simple and intuitive set-up, you’ll be enjoying the sound in next to no time. It has also been tested relentlessly to ensure it is robust, stable and has exceptional low latency (lip sync to you and me!) achieving latency of under 20m/s. 

It is also Damson's own proprietary wireless network and allows you to connect up to 8 speakers, stretching it way beyond just that of a home cinema system. 

The beauty of JetStreamNet is that it's wireless. It's fairly common in relationships that one partner is extremely resistant to housing a surround sound system which has exposed wires trailing across the room, even if it's hidden it can result in ugly trunking or uncomfortable bulges in carpets. 

At last, a home cinema system with surround sound speakers that do not require any cable whatsoever. With up to 8 hours play time on a single charge you could watch Game of Thrones Season 7 right the way through. Of course, if you do have wall sockets near your sofa, plugging them in means they'll work forever and never need audio cables to deliver the sounds. 

Wireless range is impressive too, with a range of up to 50 metres, so if you're looking to set up a multi-room system with speakers located throughout your home you can achieve this in almost all home environments.

 

Designed with today's modern living fully at the fore the S-Series Home Cinema System has been designed to complement typical living room sizes for the modern millennial. Our in-house graphics and electronic design teams laboured extensively on how to deliver an extremely compact looking speaker range that would not look unsightly in minimalists room without having to compromise on the sound we all expect when watching movies. 

Using Damson’s innovative audio technology, the soundbar and subwoofer are designed to be discreet while delivering powerful sound. At just 240mm/9.5 inches wide, your eyes will be on the action, not the soundbar. Wide-Field Stereo technology that was first seen in Damson's Vulcan Bluetooth Speaker was again used to recreate the impression of a stereo speaker yet improved further to give a much wider soundstage. The effect is stunning, in recent tests many listeners were shocked that the sound was coming from a single speaker. 

The S-Woofer is linked permanently to the S-Bar, wirelessly. Inputs include 2 x HDMI input, Aux in, HDMI out to the TV with support for Audio Return Channel (ARC). Using patented technology the super slim subwoofer houses an ultra-slim subwoofer driver. The S-Woofer will not look out of place sitting alongside your television set up or can be discreetly placed out of view. Both S-Bar and S-Woofer are supplied with a universal power supply. 

Let's talk about Dolby Atmos. Dolby Atmos delivers audio in totally different way to the way we are all used to. Instead of sounds being split into 2 channels sound is separated out as objects. Being object based it allows the audio engineers to deliver sound precisely where they want you to hear it. This can be in front, behind or even now (finally) above you. 

Damson delivers this with the Dolby-Atmos speaker extension that slots onto the soundbar pushing sound vertically using the ceiling of the room to reflect the sound so you hear it coming from above you. More than that, surround sound sounds utterly natural, the wind blows all around, rain falls overhead. 

More and more Dolby Atmos supported content is being released daily and currently supports over 300 Hollywood movies. Boxsets are also being produced in Dolby Atmos including Game of Thrones and sports fans can watch live sports events like the English Premier League (EPL), Video streaming providers are delivering Dolby Atmos enabled content with Netflix having even commissioned its own series with Dolby Atmos support. 

Don't worry if the title or boxset you are watching doesn't support Dolby Atmos as the S-Series is fully backwards compatible with all of Dolby's other audio codecs.

More than just surround sound speakers switching them into Bluetooth mode turns them into stereo speakers in their own right.

The S-Cube is a portable speaker with premium audio. you can use a single S-Cube by itself or connect with up to eight additional speakers to create a multi-speaker network of sound. Take them to a field, or the middle of the desert for your own rave or Coachella and dish out awesome wireless sound through up to 8 speakers. The S-Cube features a built-in Lithium Ion battery as well as AC power supply.

Damson will shortly be selling S-Cubes separately allowing users to add to their system.

The S-Series: Dolby Atmos Wireless Home Cinema System supports video pass through for Dolby Vision and HDR-10 Ultra High Definition (UHD) video making it compatible with 4K video and ensuring you are watching the highest possible quality as well as being able to listen to it. At Damson we do not cut corners. 

Knowing that an advanced sound system requires advanced accessories Damson has created a remote control that does not require line of sight for operation, meaning you can place your S-Woofer out of view. If you prefer a universal remote control, like Logitech's Harmony range, then plug the HDMI output into the ARC HDMI of your display and use your remote control to power on/off, change volume or mute etc. 

Damson recognises that technology is constantly on the change. In just 5 years TV's have gone from HD through Full HD to the current Ultra HD and talk is already mooted about Super Hi-Vision (8K) and while many people are prepared to upgrade their TV's the same is not always true of audio systems. 

The S-Series is built with this in mind. It's why we added "Series" to the name. We wanted to ensure what you were buying today would work with you for many years to come, the electronic design was carefully developed to allow it to operate as modular system. This means that when we bring out new models you will not have to upgrade the entire system, just add on that model as you wish. We are already in early planning development for several models which will extend your audio pleasure even further. 

 

 

It's taken a while, we'll be honest with that. Now we are pleased to say we are in final pre-production sampling with full mass production due to begin imminently. We expect to ship out the first orders in Feburary 2018. 

Shipping is a charged at a flat $30 per perk chosen. If you buy multiple perks you will be charged additional shipping fees. This is because the S-Series: Dolby Atmos Home Cinema System weighs in at 6.75kg (15lb) and is an expensive item to ship.

We have not identified fully where we will be shipping from. It is possible that some territories where the import duty threshold is less than the value of the perk price that import duties and other charges will be charged, these are usually lower if paid in advance. If you feel you are in a territory which has a threshold for import duties below this please contact Damson support to discuss options that are available to you in order to minimise your import duty.  

Options could include delivering your order duty paid - at an additional cost where you agree to cover the cost of the duties in advance, or for those in European countries waiting until our sea container shipments have been delivered to York allowing us to ship out internally from within the EU at no additional duty charges to yourselves. 

Please do not ask us to ship this item as a $10 gift. In our past experience customs offices are wise to this and will delay your shipment and charge you, including administration fees. This incurs additional administration for us as well as you will contact us! We will not be liable for any customs charges.
story_txt: We are over 150% funded, and thanks for making it happen.The S-Series is now available on amazon stores and damsonglobal.comThe S-Series: Dolby Atmos Wireless Home Cinema system is the first truly wireless home cinema system to produce stunning surround sound in Dolby Laboratories latest technology - Atmos. With incredibly simple plug and play set up and truly wireless surround sound, advance your home cinema experience to the next level. Dolby® Atmos is changing the sound of entertainment. Moving audio flows around you in three-dimensional space, transporting you to the heart of the action, creating the very best environment for enjoying the cinema experience at home. Now you can experience movies, music videos and your favourite box sets exactly as the director wants.Damson’s built-in JetStreamNet Wireless Technology means no messy cables. And with a simple and intuitive set-up, you’ll be enjoying the sound in next to no time. It has also been tested relentlessly to ensure it is robust, stable and has exceptional low latency (lip sync to you and me!) achieving latency of under 20m/s. It is also Damson's own proprietary wireless network and allows you to connect up to 8 speakers, stretching it way beyond just that of a home cinema system. The beauty of JetStreamNet is that it's wireless. It's fairly common in relationships that one partner is extremely resistant to housing a surround sound system which has exposed wires trailing across the room, even if it's hidden it can result in ugly trunking or uncomfortable bulges in carpets. At last, a home cinema system with surround sound speakers that do not require any cable whatsoever. With up to 8 hours play time on a single charge you could watch Game of Thrones Season 7 right the way through. Of course, if you do have wall sockets near your sofa, plugging them in means they'll work forever and never need audio cables to deliver the sounds. Wireless range is impressive too, with a range of up to 50 metres, so if you're looking to set up a multi-room system with speakers located throughout your home you can achieve this in almost all home environments. Designed with today's modern living fully at the fore the S-Series Home Cinema System has been designed to complement typical living room sizes for the modern millennial. Our in-house graphics and electronic design teams laboured extensively on how to deliver an extremely compact looking speaker range that would not look unsightly in minimalists room without having to compromise on the sound we all expect when watching movies. Using Damson’s innovative audio technology, the soundbar and subwoofer are designed to be discreet while delivering powerful sound. At just 240mm/9.5 inches wide, your eyes will be on the action, not the soundbar. Wide-Field Stereo technology that was first seen in Damson's Vulcan Bluetooth Speaker was again used to recreate the impression of a stereo speaker yet improved further to give a much wider soundstage. The effect is stunning, in recent tests many listeners were shocked that the sound was coming from a single speaker. The S-Woofer is linked permanently to the S-Bar, wirelessly. Inputs include 2 x HDMI input, Aux in, HDMI out to the TV with support for Audio Return Channel (ARC). Using patented technology the super slim subwoofer houses an ultra-slim subwoofer driver. The S-Woofer will not look out of place sitting alongside your television set up or can be discreetly placed out of view. Both S-Bar and S-Woofer are supplied with a universal power supply. Let's talk about Dolby Atmos. Dolby Atmos delivers audio in totally different way to the way we are all used to. Instead of sounds being split into 2 channels sound is separated out as objects. Being object based it allows the audio engineers to deliver sound precisely where they want you to hear it. This can be in front, behind or even now (finally) above you. Damson delivers this with the Dolby-Atmos speaker extension that slots onto the soundbar pushing sound vertically using the ceiling of the room to reflect the sound so you hear it coming from above you. More than that, surround sound sounds utterly natural, the wind blows all around, rain falls overhead. More and more Dolby Atmos supported content is being released daily and currently supports over 300 Hollywood movies. Boxsets are also being produced in Dolby Atmos including Game of Thrones and sports fans can watch live sports events like the English Premier League (EPL), Video streaming providers are delivering Dolby Atmos enabled content with Netflix having even commissioned its own series with Dolby Atmos support. Don't worry if the title or boxset you are watching doesn't support Dolby Atmos as the S-Series is fully backwards compatible with all of Dolby's other audio codecs.More than just surround sound speakers switching them into Bluetooth mode turns them into stereo speakers in their own right.The S-Cube is a portable speaker with premium audio. you can use a single S-Cube by itself or connect with up to eight additional speakers to create a multi-speaker network of sound. Take them to a field, or the middle of the desert for your own rave or Coachella and dish out awesome wireless sound through up to 8 speakers. The S-Cube features a built-in Lithium Ion battery as well as AC power supply.Damson will shortly be selling S-Cubes separately allowing users to add to their system.The S-Series: Dolby Atmos Wireless Home Cinema System supports video pass through for Dolby Vision and HDR-10 Ultra High Definition (UHD) video making it compatible with 4K video and ensuring you are watching the highest possible quality as well as being able to listen to it. At Damson we do not cut corners. Knowing that an advanced sound system requires advanced accessories Damson has created a remote control that does not require line of sight for operation, meaning you can place your S-Woofer out of view. If you prefer a universal remote control, like Logitech's Harmony range, then plug the HDMI output into the ARC HDMI of your display and use your remote control to power on/off, change volume or mute etc. Damson recognises that technology is constantly on the change. In just 5 years TV's have gone from HD through Full HD to the current Ultra HD and talk is already mooted about Super Hi-Vision (8K) and while many people are prepared to upgrade their TV's the same is not always true of audio systems. The S-Series is built with this in mind. It's why we added "Series" to the name. We wanted to ensure what you were buying today would work with you for many years to come, the electronic design was carefully developed to allow it to operate as modular system. This means that when we bring out new models you will not have to upgrade the entire system, just add on that model as you wish. We are already in early planning development for several models which will extend your audio pleasure even further.   It's taken a while, we'll be honest with that. Now we are pleased to say we are in final pre-production sampling with full mass production due to begin imminently. We expect to ship out the first orders in Feburary 2018. Shipping is a charged at a flat $30 per perk chosen. If you buy multiple perks you will be charged additional shipping fees. This is because the S-Series: Dolby Atmos Home Cinema System weighs in at 6.75kg (15lb) and is an expensive item to ship.We have not identified fully where we will be shipping from. It is possible that some territories where the import duty threshold is less than the value of the perk price that import duties and other charges will be charged, these are usually lower if paid in advance. If you feel you are in a territory which has a threshold for import duties below this please contact Damson support to discuss options that are available to you in order to minimise your import duty.  Options could include delivering your order duty paid - at an additional cost where you agree to cover the cost of the duties in advance, or for those in European countries waiting until our sea container shipments have been delivered to York allowing us to ship out internally from within the EU at no additional duty charges to yourselves. Please do not ask us to ship this item as a $10 gift. In our past experience customs offices are wise to this and will delay your shipment and charge you, including administration fees. This incurs additional administration for us as well as you will contact us! We will not be liable for any customs charges.

story:
Control everything — your music and LED display — from Divoom Smart, the easy-to-use mobile application available for iOS and Android devices.

 

 

 

 

 

Join the biggest online pixel art community of 1 million+ talented artists!

Choose from a massive variety of graphics, videos, GIFs and games, or create and upload your own. Whether you’re a novice artist or someone with more experience, our online community is the perfect place for you to improve and become a pixel art animator – we’re constantly updating and improving our drawing aid tools.

Using the free online community, you can even share, like, comment and interact with others’ designs. Meeting other pixel art fans with the same interests as you around the world has never been easier!

Then, to ensure you start your days right, Tivoo-Max’s smart alarm stimulates a real-life sunrise, where both lighting and the audio alarm turn on gradually. It also supports self-recorded alarms, so you can wake up to the voice of someone special to you.

There are over 48 built-in sleep aid and alarm profiles to choose from that guarantee you’ll wake up feeling refreshed!

 

 

The Tivoo-Max is more than just eye candy; every detail is a result of engineering perfection.

Daily convenience tools include music tools, music EQ visualizer, daily activity planner, calendar, weather report, scoreboard, pixel art games, stopwatch, timer, voice messenger, voice morpher and more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Established in 2006, Divoom was formed by a team of music enthusiasts that absolutely loves playing around with speakers. Over the last 12 years, the Divoom team introduced numerous iconic portable speakers to the market. However, they’re always striving to take their work to the next level.

Back in 2014, Terry, the owner and creator of Divoom, came across several interesting LED gadgets in the San Francisco Maker's Faire, which utilized the SD card loading image on LED. At that time, there were barely any LED speakers on the market, so he saw an opportunity. In turn, Terry came up with the idea of LEDs in the form of pixel art.

The original concept for Tivoo-Max was a speaker that displayed different colored pixel art. Since the production of the first Tivoo-Max model, our team continuously worked on improving the function and audio on each generation. We jumbo sized it and put a much more serious audio setup, in addition to adding everyday features such as sleep aid, daily activity planner, games and more. The rest was history.

For a full demonstration of our app, click HERE.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Tivoo-Max a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give five dollars or purchase a Tivoo-Max, you can still help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Get your zeppy now on www.zeppy.com

 

Zeppy was designed to be the highest quality floating bluetooth speaker, but became the most versatile on top: Zeppy changes the way where and how we listen to music. We use materials never used before in HiFi history to achieve this versatility. Water- and saltwater proof, floatable and light weight - all along with incredible stereo sound with no distortion.

Our special massage mode transmits sound waves to your body or water, allowing you to enjoy a sound-massage!  Up to 8 Zeppys can be paired to amplify or distribute the sound across different rooms. A true Sound-Buddy for every situation, that will change the way you listen to music forever.

seen on

Together with Bongiovi Acoustics’ engineers, six specific sound profiles were created utilizing the patented Digital Power Station™ technology. Sound is optimized in real-time for these use cases:

 

Pair up to 8 Zeppys wirelessly to amplify your music and share it across different rooms and areas. Simply place one Zeppy on top of the other, and the tune is automatically synchronized. The integrated circuit on the membrane makes this pairing process so easy. 

 

Zeppy is perfectly engineered with a completely new approach in design and material, resulting in seven submitted patents. Creating a unique audio experience to touch all of your senses. Designed in Austria, made in Germany and thought-out to the smallest detail by renowned designer Johannes Scherr. 

The Housing 

We use ARPRO, a material never used before in HiFi history to achieve the sound quality and versatility, we were aiming for. Its properties let Zeppy transmit sound waves to other surfaces like your body or water. ARPRO consists of 96% air which makes it extremely lightweight, and lets Zeppy even float. Used in the automotive industry to improve vehicle safety it withstands multiple impacts without damage. This makes Zeppy very robust.

The final structure of the housing will look like this, and just feels incredible in your palm: 

 



SELECT ONE OF THE 3 AVAILABLE COLORS

  • Deep Black
  • Urban Silver 
  • Rainbow Edition - Indiegogo only!

The Membrane

Most speakers lose significant sound quality when submerged in water, but Zeppy’s flat panel membrane delivers full-bodied stereo sound with no distortion. On the membrane itself, you can select the sound profile by pressing it downwards and choosing one of the sound profiles from Bongiovi acoustics.



The membrane is made out of Forex which makes it light weight, water resistant and rugged. And the best thing is, it can be customized. Since we haven't made a final decision on the print yet, we will let you VOTE FOR YOUR FAVORITE MEMBRANE DESIGN. The two most popular ones will be available (the voting will be available soon): 

The Loop

A smart design detail that supports the versatility of Zeppy. The loop is nicely integrated in the Design of Zeppy. It can be used as a carry strap, to hang Zeppy somewhere, but also to connect several Zeppys. 


 

  • Bluetooth 4.1 wireless audio speaker
  • „Pick My Tune“ touch feature for pairing up to 8 Zeppys
  • Digital stereo full class D 2 x 8 Watt amplifier
  • Full digital real-time audio processing with Bongiovi's Digital Power Station™
  • 6 DPS Sound Profiles
  • 4200 mAh Li Poly rechargeable battery
  • USB type C 5V charging
  • Waterproof and floating IPX 7
  • Lightweight below 430 g
  • Dimensions:  258 mm x 223 mm x 47 mmm (10,2 x 8,8 x 1,8 inch) 
  • Seamless buttons on Zeppy to control songs, volume, sound profiles
  • Works with iOS, Android, Windows and any other operating system without installing any software or APP
  • EPP housing
  • Forex Membrane
  • 7 patents filled

SHIPPING DATE FOR NEW ORDERS IS JANUARY 2018

Zeppy's global team works with excitement on creating new audio products in combination with new materials. In 2015 the idea was born in Vienna, Austria by Rafael Kubisz: music lover, inventor of the first solar speaker and red dot design award winner. Together with designer Johannes Scherr and partners in Germany, Hong Kong, UK and Florida, Zeppy was born.

We have been working on Zeppy for almost 2 years and started production of the tooling in May 2017! We found trustworthy production partners who can deliver in time and the required quality. The housing is crafted to its perfection by our German team at Overath. The Electronic PCB board is designed by our team at neon ZhongShan City. The membrane material Forex is produced in Switzerland and marketed by our German friends from 3A composite in Singen. We developed a smart supply chain to craft Zeppy to its perfection in Germany. We start shipping your perks from Germany in October 2017.

 

If you are ready to join our exciting journey, please support our campaign and spread the word! A few clicks for you make a big difference for us:

story:
Introducing the WOW-SOUND Speaker!

The ultimate, outdoor,  bluetooth speaker with INSANE battery life. WOW-SOUND was designed to be rugged enough for any outdoor activity.

WOW-SOUND is the perfect speaker for every adventure. Powered to go all day, rugged for any environment and functional enough to compliment any day or night activities. 

  • Unique portable design! - Its unique design makes it easy to hold, take anywhere and even fits in your cupholder!
  • Designed rugged for outdoor activities! - IP67 rating, Waterproof & Floatable
  • Perfect for all weekend! - 50+ hours of battery life, 360-degree LED Lighting.
  • Premium Sound Quality! - Omnidirectional Hi-Fi sound with a 4" passive bass​

​

WHAT's INSIDE THE BOX?

  • 1 WOW-SOUND Speaker
  • 1 WOW Speaker Float
  • 1 WOW Waterproof Phone Holder

 

 

 

 

 

50+ HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE

 

360 DEGREE LED LIGHTS

FLOATABLE

 

WATERPROOF

 

Its unique design makes WOW-SOUND the perfect speaker for any outdoor adventure.

 

We created the WOW-SOUND speaker because we couldn't find any existing bluetooth speakers that were a match for all the fun outdoor water products that we already make. We had a few priorities when designing WOW-SOUND; it had to be loud, it had to sound good, it had to have a battery that could last all day on the water, preferably all weekend, and we wanted it to fit into a cup holder that we include on many of our inflatable products. The farther along we got into the process the more we realized that we were not only building a great speaker for fun on the water, but we were building a great speaker for pretty much any outdoor activity. That is when we started getting really excited and decided that we had to reach as many people who love outdoors as we could. Which is a big reason why we decided to get the project started with the Indiegogo community.

WOW World of Watersports was established in 2010 and has since become a leader in the watersports industry.  Although WOW, the company, was established in 2010, the WOW team has been creating fun on the water for over 30 years.  One of our founding partners, Leroy Peterson, is one of the grandfathers of the business and is responsible for many of the evolutions that have taken place in water inflatables; from the first nylon covered, 48” round towable, to the hundreds of different shapes and sizes on the market today. 

We named ourselves WOW because that is the reaction we want to get when people see our products and interact with our company….and so far so good!  We know the only way to get that reaction is to have unique, fun, high quality products as well as a team that genuinely cares about their customers.  

We are ready for production!

With years in the business, we have established trustworthy relationships with amazing manufacturers. This is not our first product and most certainly won't be our last. We went through several iterations of the product before we came to our final production unit.

This campaign will  help us get WOW-SOUND into your hands much faster. We are excited to already be ready to ship very soon!

WOW World of Watersports has been in the inflatables business since 2010, focusing on constantly producing innovative products for enjoying the water in safe and adventurous ways through inflatable water toys and water ski towables.

Dipping into a brand new category for us, we realized that crowdfunding gives us the unique advantage of communicating directly with our future customers. Being entrenched in the outdoor industry, we decided to create a premium product that we didn't see existed in the market. We stuck to our core mission and values of quality and innovation and created the WOW-SOUND speakers from those same principles.

We are excited for you to be a part of this venture into rugged outdoor gear!

How did a watersports company go from building inflatables to building a speaker?

We hired and worked with a lot of experts in the business to help us design and build the speaker we wanted.  One of the things we believe we have at WOW is good taste and an eye for a good product.  We came up with our vision of what we wanted in a speaker based on our extensive experience of how people use products on the water and in the outdoors and we worked with a professional team that could turn that vision into a great product.  We have an office in the U.S. and near the production facilities in China so we were able to work closely with the design side in the U.S. and the manufacturing side in China on a day to day basis.  We were perhaps overly careful and methodical to make sure we didn't make any mistakes, which is why this project has taken us over 3 years to complete! 

When will I get my WOW-SOUND Speaker?

Great news! We have finalized our tooling and final production and we'll be able to get the WOW-SOUND speaker to you right before you head out to do all those amazing summer activities. WOW- SOUND will begin delivering in June 2017.

What are the main features of the WOW-SOUND Speaker?

We are excited to bring you more than 50 hours of battery life, more than any other bluetooth speaker on the market. WOW-SOUND is waterproof, floats and comes with 360-degree HI-FI sound and 360-degree bright LED lights for visibility at night.

Can I select a color for my Speaker?

Currently, we are offering the speaker in Electric Orange. We hope to reach our stretch goal of $200K so that we can begin producing the additional colors you see in this campaign. With your help we will be able to offer additional colors soon.

Do I need to download an app to listen to my speaker?

No, the WOW-SOUND speaker will connect easily to any bluetooth device. Use existing music apps on your phone. No special apps are needed to listen to the WOW-SOUND speaker.

Can I drop my speaker into the Water?

Yes, the WOW-SOUND Speaker is waterproof up to 3 feet (1 meter) for 30 minutes. The great news is that it floats, so you don't have to worry about diving to retrieve your speaker when you're in the water.

How long does the WOW-SOUND speaker last?

WOW-Sound has 50 hours of battery life. The battery life varies on the volume you are listening at as well as the type of music you are listening to.  It will depend on how much you use the speaker, but it is well equipped to last in the outdoors for any activities including watersports activities, camping and much more. The 360-degree LED lights make it so that you can use it any time of day or night.

Can I connect to other speakers?

Yes, the WOW-SOUND speaker includes the TrueWireless Bluetooth function so you can connect it to an additional WOW-SOUND speaker for booming stereo sound giving you the ultimate outdoor audio experience for pool parties, social occasions, camping and more.

What is IP67 Rated Mean?

IP67 means that the speaker is protected from dust, dirt and sand entering the speaker and that the speaker is waterproof down to 1 meter for up to 30 minutes.

What will be the retail price of the WOW-SOUND Speaker?

We are excited to offer it to our Indiegogo backers first for a great discount. The MSRP for WOW-SOUND will be $229 when it comes to market in June 2017.

With years in the business, we have established trustworthy relationships with amazing manufacturers. This is not our first product and most certainly won't be our last. We went through several iterations of the product before we came to our final production unit.



This campaign will  help us get WOW-SOUND into your hands much faster. We are excited to already be ready to ship very soon!

WOW World of Watersports has been in the inflatables business since 2010, focusing on constantly producing innovative products for enjoying the water in safe and adventurous ways through inflatable water toys and water ski towables.
Dipping into a brand new category for us, we realized that crowdfunding gives us the unique advantage of communicating directly with our future customers. Being entrenched in the outdoor industry, we decided to create a premium product that we didn't see existed in the market. We stuck to our core mission and values of quality and innovation and created the WOW-SOUND speakers from those same principles.
We are excited for you to be a part of this venture into rugged outdoor gear!



How did a watersports company go from building inflatables to building a speaker?
We hired and worked with a lot of experts in the business to help us design and build the speaker we wanted.  One of the things we believe we have at WOW is good taste and an eye for a good product.  We came up with our vision of what we wanted in a speaker based on our extensive experience of how people use products on the water and in the outdoors and we worked with a professional team that could turn that vision into a great product.  We have an office in the U.S. and near the production facilities in China so we were able to work closely with the design side in the U.S. and the manufacturing side in China on a day to day basis.  We were perhaps overly careful and methodical to make sure we didn't make any mistakes, which is why this project has taken us over 3 years to complete! 
When will I get my WOW-SOUND Speaker?
Great news! We have finalized our tooling and final production and we'll be able to get the WOW-SOUND speaker to you right before you head out to do all those amazing summer activities. WOW- SOUND will begin delivering in June 2017.
What are the main features of the WOW-SOUND Speaker?
We are excited to bring you more than 50 hours of battery life, more than any other bluetooth speaker on the market. WOW-SOUND is waterproof, floats and comes with 360-degree HI-FI sound and 360-degree bright LED lights for visibility at night.
Can I select a color for my Speaker?
Currently, we are offering the speaker in Electric Orange. We hope to reach our stretch goal of $200K so that we can begin producing the additional colors you see in this campaign. With your help we will be able to offer additional colors soon.
Do I need to download an app to listen to my speaker?
No, the WOW-SOUND speaker will connect easily to any bluetooth device. Use existing music apps on your phone. No special apps are needed to listen to the WOW-SOUND speaker.
Can I drop my speaker into the Water?
Yes, the WOW-SOUND Speaker is waterproof up to 3 feet (1 meter) for 30 minutes. The great news is that it floats, so you don't have to worry about diving to retrieve your speaker when you're in the water.
How long does the WOW-SOUND speaker last?
WOW-Sound has 50 hours of battery life. The battery life varies on the volume you are listening at as well as the type of music you are listening to.  It will depend on how much you use the speaker, but it is well equipped to last in the outdoors for any activities including watersports activities, camping and much more. The 360-degree LED lights make it so that you can use it any time of day or night.
Can I connect to other speakers?
Yes, the WOW-SOUND speaker includes the TrueWireless Bluetooth function so you can connect it to an additional WOW-SOUND speaker for booming stereo sound giving you the ultimate outdoor audio experience for pool parties, social occasions, camping and more.
What is IP67 Rated Mean?
IP67 means that the speaker is protected from dust, dirt and sand entering the speaker and that the speaker is waterproof down to 1 meter for up to 30 minutes.
What will be the retail price of the WOW-SOUND Speaker?
We are excited to offer it to our Indiegogo backers first for a great discount. The MSRP for WOW-SOUND will be $229 when it comes to market in June 2017.

story:
We designed the AirFoams Pro Premium Memory Ear Tips to be as comfortable as possible while preserving the exact dimensions and quality you find on the AirPods Pro 

  • Detailed manufacturing process
  • Developed our own inner plastic tube and the foam material
  • Months of work and fine tuning that sets AirFoams Pro quality apart.

"By backing AirFoams Pro, you will 100% receive the product.  All our backers received their products on our first Kickstarter Campaign.  Most of them got them in the first week. "

- Charlie, Co-Founder & CEO 

 

AirFoams Pro. One and only.

Our product design team considered every single detail in making our original design. The one shown in the pictures and video is a final prototype. Our final AirFoams Pro will look great. Each part and material is premium, so you can distinguish the ones that fail to compare.

Our Prototyping Process & Design / Manufacturing Sessions

We at CharJenPro took extreme detailed measures to ensure everything fits perfectly and functions wonderfully. After many prototypes, we have made the best Premium Memory Foam Ear Tips that works cohesively with the AirPods Pro.

Numerous design sessions of the curvature of the foam

Process of making the plastic inner piece

Combining the memory foam to the inner piece for a one-piece solution

Testing different memory foam types and density

Color decisions,  Ear Tips sizes, Metal or plastic mesh

AirFoams Pro (both sizes) fits inside the case, perfectly.

CharJenPro, we focus on quality

Located in Los Angeles, California where all the design and innovation starts. We have been producing premium products for over 4 years.  Mainly for MacBook Pro, iPhone, iPad Pro, and all types of USB C products.

With over 4000+ total reviews on all our products, our users love them.

We are excited to share AirFoams Pro with everyone. Our backers from our first successful Kickstarter campaign, Stingray, a Nintendo Switch adapter with Integrated Ethernet port. They are loving it.  We love to make sure our products are useful and the people using it are happy with it. We ensure our trustworthiness and professionalism to deliver on all our products. 

We produced the highest-rated USB C Hub on the market.  With over 1356+ reviews on Amazon, CharJenPro is a trusted brand. We know how to create and deliver quality products. For example, check both our Premium Hub and MacBar.

Check us out:

  •  www.charjenpro.com 
  •  www.instagram.com/charjenpro 
  •  www.facebook.com/charjenpro

story:
The DINO COSTA Show has been airing on New York City radio airwaves since early January 2018.

To date, The SHOW has been received more than positively, by listeners, by the sports media, and by the station it currently airs on, AM-970, WNYM Radio, in New York City.

Unfortunately, in this day and age, the radio industry has been beset by many challenges and obstacles, particularly when it comes to the freedoms of expression and original thought.

The industry is being attacked by an assortment of 'thought-police' individuals who seek to deny the basic tenets of free-speech if that free speech does not coincide with their own specific worldviews and other orthodoxies. 

This has resulted in the industry being stripped clean of individualism, people on the air who have their own personal views, with many of those views being in direct opposition to the thought police individuals who stay up all night seeking ways to undermine those they find objectionable.

The result of all of this is a very homogenized group of on-air people all seemingly reading off the same script with the same talking points who provide their audiences with nothing of edifying or tangible value.

For five (5) years, Dino Costa provided for one of the most uniquely dynamic national radio shows ever broadcast when he was employed by SiriusXM Radio. Despite many accolades over those 5-years, despite building a nationwide audience, and despite being named as one of America's best by publications such as Sports Illustrated and Talkers Magazine (The Bible Of The Talk Radio Industry), Dino has found re-engaging within the field of talk radio to be problematic. It would seem that the talk radio industry is even more risk-averse at this juncture than it was when Dino left SiriusXM Radio back in 2013. An unfortunate environment of 'sameness' has ensconced the industry - and the resulting fall out has seen Dino on the outside looking in for far too long.

In these risk-averse times, and with people apparently unaccustomed to outside the box and visionary thinking in the field of radio, Dino decided to take his show to New York, where he was born and raised, projecting his one of a kind show to New York sports fans in search of something far different from the status-quo, and self-funding his show on AM-970, WNYM Radio.

The inaugural broadcast was in early January of 2018, and since that time The Show has grown more than impressively. For example, The Show is featured on numerous platforms in an archive form - and statistics from iTunes and other like-minded sites show an increase of over 337% in individual downloads of Dino's Show from January 2018 to late May 2018.

In addition, The Show has been mentioned in the sports pages of the NY Daily News a total of ten (10) times since Dino started broadcasting in January 2018, featured in the Daily News sports media column.

The SHOW continues to grow, new listeners continue to come on board, and despite its overnight broadcast hours (12-3AM) The DINO COSTA Show has fast made its way into the New York sports radio scene as a much-looked to outlet for New York sports fans in search of Dino's original thought and opinion on myriad issues and items.

Will this one of a kind, irrepressible, sports-themed radio show ever be picked up by another station that covers sports more thoroughly than Dino's current radio home? That's to be determined, and Dino has gone into this project with the 'long-view' clearly in mind. The emphasis currently, is to continue producing one great and different show after another, solid blocks of sports radio for listeners, with a soundtrack of sports radio unavailable anywhere else.

To date, Dino has self-funded this project and contributed over $15,000 necessary to purchase the airtime for his Show. Now, he is graciously asking for your help to keep this thriving radio platform going for months, and if necessary, years to come.

One of the other changes that have come to the world of radio can be found in 'brokered programming.' In fact, it is difficult to find stations across the country who do not generate much of their revenue streams by incorporating brokered shows into their lineup. Moreover, there are radio stations, including several in the New York area who have fashioned a brokered schedules exclusively for their dial locations.

You are obviously under no obligation to help to keep The DINO COSTA Show on the air. You may continue to listen as often or as little as you like without any financial contribution.

However, each month from now on, The Show will keep a page like this one active, hoping that there are those who not only have a more than healthy enthusiasm for The Show, but who also want to willingly assist The Show to meet its financial obligations each month, and who possess the financial wherewithal to make a contribution of some kind.

Dino will continue to do all that he can do financially on his own in order to ensure that his Show remains of the air and continues to provide a one of a kind sports radio exclusive to a growing base of listeners, both in the New York area and around the country with those who listen to The Show Online.

We thank you for any and all consideration, and if you do contribute, we thank you even more, for helping to keep The DINO COSTA Show on the air, where it belongs, in New York City, today, and hopefully for many days to come.

Thak you.

story:
We really like when music accompanies us in our daily routine . . .

Going to work, commuting by train or during our night run. However listening to music hasn't been so enjoyable as we would liked. During our exercise earphones are slowly falling out of our ears. On our way to work we always meet up with some friends and need to take out our earphones during conversation and for a moment, we don't know what to do with them. We don't want to hold them and if we put them in our pockets, after a few minutes we need to take them out again. Don`t even mention how tangled the earphones are afterwards. We`re pretty sure that everyone who uses earphones is familiar with these situations.

After many years of using different styles of earphones we started to become really frustrated by it and did not want to use headphones in our daily routines, so we started to look for a solution.

After researching the needs of earphones users we came up with conclusion.

 

 

We created a "snap strap" attachable to your earphones which transfers the weight of the wires around your neck into the snap strap, reducing friction & vibration that causes our earphones to fall out frequently.

 

 

Our product allows you to also hang your earphones nicely around your neck while you have a quick chat with your friends.

 

 

And last but not least, say goodbye to your tangled earphones forever!

 

What You Get

You get to be a part of the solution, you get to be one of the first to own the ii Earphones Snap Strap and you get it all for special exclusive prices!

- Perks will ship within 3 weeks of campaign ending successfully

- Get one for yourself, your brother, sister, parents, friends and colleagues, because you won`t see the prices this low again!

 

 

FULL PRODUCT DESCRIPTION :

- ii earphones snap strap is made out of smooth, soft and high quality silicone material combined with anodized aluminium clips

- ii snap strap and clips are available in 11 different colors

(pink, red, purple, yellow, green, blue, orange, turquoise, black, white, silver)

 

( pink, gold, cobalt, blue, red, green, bronze, silver, purple, orange, black)

 

- suit your style and taste

 

- easy assembling and disassembling to your earphones wires

 

 

- two " ii snap strap" types available for classic oval shape wires and flat wires to 3,5mm

 

What We Need:

We need $ 1,000 USD for silicone production mold and aluminium production mold

- The ii Earphones Snap Strap is developed, tested and ready to be sold!

story:
Cory Group is an award-winning crowdfunding agency - for more info click here

 The Tele set is neck DC 8.5k ohms alnico 5  43 gauge wire,  Bridge 7k ohms alnico 5 mags 42 gauge wire reverse built.

The Start set is my Kent special   neck 8,000 turns 42 gauge alnico 5 mags,  middle 9,000 turns  42 gauge wire alnico 5 mags and reverse built and the bridge 10,000 turns 42 gauge wire alnico 5 poles.

The humbuckers currently on the set up I’ve made is for heavy metal playing.  Neck is my Rocker at 18,000 ohms ceramic mag and the bridge is my OTT  25,000 ohms with three ceramic mags  both wound with 44 gauge wire.

Or the Boaz ONE Technical Group for technical discussions. This group is dedicated to the technical and design perfection of the guitar.
You may also follow our channel on YouTube and on Instagram.

story:
For the first time, earbuds are able to change and adapt to fit your preferences at your fingertips! Each connection is formed out of our special McX connectors, created to maintain a secure grip and seamless performance.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

Modularity has its perks! With mXers, you can mix and match colors, designs and sound options to make your music perfectly tailored to you. 

 

mXers are designed with Fray-Resistant Wires and reinforced with aluminum inside each connection and driver to ensure maximum durability. However, if you do manage to break any part, simply swap out the broken part at a fraction of the cost.

 

 

 

We have been constantly working to make sure that this is our Best Product to Date. We have fine tuned our drivers for a deep range at both ends, and boosted our xBass drivers for an intense bass experience. swapping out injected plastics for high-grade steel, and experimenting with wire options until we found the perfect blend of strength and comfort that won't tangle, we have created a premium product, equitable to a 200 dollar set, all for a low price and the ability to make it yours.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Since early 2015 mXers Technologies, LLC, has solved a problem that millions of consumers face: boring and broken earbuds. Advanced by a team dedicated to this cause, our modular platform has thousands of potential opportunities for the everyday listener to change the way their earbuds look and feel, while being able to easily and inexpensively swap parts that break with replacements.

We began with a simple question: how come we have to buy a whole set of earbuds every time a single part on our current set breaks? 

Evolution of our wired system:

 

 

 

 

Bharat and Jarrett are both experienced in the field of consumer electronics. Backed with the tools of their prior ventures, they have dedicated themselves to years of research and design to chase the dream of revolutionizing the consumer electronics industry.

However, B and J know that this could not be done without the help of an amazing team. mXers Technologies has a bright team of passionate individuals (also including Ben Grosse, Dameesh Kumar, Dhruv Methi, Natalie Larkin, Sukhwinder Kaur, and Zach Kennedy) that strive to advance our company’s vision of integrating modularity with consumer electronics across a multitude of products. Entirely self funded apart from small crowdfunding campaigns, we’ve built and continue to maintain and grow our business without major external resources. We are proud to have created great leaps of progress since our inception and plan to continue making big strides throughout the rest of 2017!

CEO Bharat Pulgam is an honored 2017 Business Magazine TITAN OF TECHNOLOGY for mXers, and our company was awarded by Business Journal as the MOST INNOVATIVE product of 2015!

Entirely self funded apart from small crowdfunding campaigns, we’ve built and continue to maintain and grow our business without major external resources. We are proud to have created great leaps of progress since our inception and plan to continue making big strides throughout the rest of 2017!CEO Bharat Pulgam is an honored 2017 Business Magazine TITAN OF TECHNOLOGY for mXers, and our company was awarded by Business Journal as the MOST INNOVATIVE product of 2015!

story:
Can QTV play videos?

QTV can only play the default videos,  videos saved on external devices cannot be displayed.

Why is QTV heavy for its size?

QTV is made out of high-end material with 3.5mm Zinc Alloy coat and other metal parts. Even though it is tiny (98*70*75mm), it weights 470g; the quality says it all!

Does the Antenna have any real functions?

Absolutely! It can be used as a stop button when the alarm is ringing. There’s something even more special about the antenna, but we’re revealing that detail later on.

When will you ship the item?

We will ship the items promised in the perk, but the delivery time depends on local delivery speed and customs clearance, which we cannot fully control. Therefore, we cannot fully guarantee that you will receive the package in September.

VAT or Import tax included?

Due to the customs policy of different countries, we CANNOT control it if there are extra taxes for you. Our product price does not include VAT or import tax of your country. We will try our best to declare a comparatively lower value for the product, If you have further question about the declared value, please feel free to send an email to hello@lofree.co. Thank-you.

About remote area shipping cost.

Shipping cost does NOT include extra costs defined as remote area shipping fees on DHL’s website. Please check here if you think your location may be considered remote: http://www.dhl.com/en.html. Use with your city’s postal code only for accurate checking.

How long can the battery last with a single charge?

Up to five hours.

story:
Welcome, and thanks for checking out the HiddenRadio2! We have spent the last 18 months listening to our backers and the community, to what they wanted most out of a portable speaker. You asked for this and here we have it, welcome HiddenRadio2!

TIMELESS DESIGN, ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY
The new design is a natural evolution and, again, amazingly simple. All visual distractions have been removed to make everything about your music.

It may look similar on the outside, but under the hood it has been completely re-engineered. To deliver ‘best in class’ sound, we completely reinvented the speakers inside, fine tuning and optimizing them for our design and unique form factor.

UNBELIEVABLY POWERFUL, IN A COMPACT FORM
While big speakers typically deliver great bass but poor high frequencies, and smaller speakers tend to give great highs but no bass, our proprietary neodymium dual speaker system combined with our custom software allows for amazing highs and deep, powerful lows. With new engineering solutions, we’ve also managed to more than double the speaker chamber, delivering even deeper bass. Once you hear it, you will need to remind yourself how small and portable the HiddenRadio2 actually is.


WE ADDED MULTI SPEAKER BLUETOOTH
We finally made it! After almost two years of listening to the many requests and undertaking a lot of research, we are thrilled to introduce our MultiPoint feature. This means that you can link two HiddenRadio2’s to one phone and create a wireless audio set-up for your home, easier than ever before. Place the speakers in different areas for a seamless sound experience, or set up two speakers alongside your iPad or computer to create an incredible portable stereo.

MAGIC LIFT TECHNOLOGY
Simply touch the cap or hit play on your phone, and the cap magically lifts, revealing the speaker hidden beneath, as your HiddenRadio2 begins to stream crystal clear music in 360-degree sound. Not only does the elevating cap provide protection from the elements, it also creates a larger bass chamber that delivers deeper bass than ever before.

INTELLIGENT TOUCH CONTROLS
Using an intelligent capacitive touch sensor in the cap, you can operate your music directly from the HiddenRadio2. By simply tapping the cap, you can play, pause, adjust the volume, skip forward or back, fast forward or rewind, answer a phone call, or even activate Siri!

IT’S ALSO A SPEAKERPHONE
Receiving a phone call? Touch the cap and the HiddenRadio2 turns into an incredible speakerphone. We’ve added top-of-the-line noise cancelling microphones to make your call sound even better.

WE ADDED NEAR FIELD COMMUNICATION (NFC)
The intelligent cap sensor also uses NFC, meaning you can instantly sync your HiddenRadio2 with an NFC-enabled phone. With more and more devices featuring NFC, you will be more future-proof than ever.

WE’VE REINVENTED THE SPEAKER
Most speaker companies use off-the-shelf speakers and repackage them in a different box. This type of cookie cutter design and functionality means that you will never have a speaker that is perfectly tuned or optimized for your needs. For this reason, we have redesigned the speaker itself. Using extensive research, we have built custom speaker drivers from the highest-quality materials, previously only used in large expensive sound systems

SLEEK DESIGN, HIGH END COLORS
The HiddenRadio2 is offered in 3 timeless and sleek colors, Platinum Silver, High Gloss Black and Arctic White.  There are also two special edition colors, Gunmetal and Metallic red, limited run available.

GET IT NOW!
The HiddenRadio2 combines timeless industrial design with great sound. You can own this great product at special Indiegogo prices. All products are backed up with a warranty and our customer service center. We have some great specials only available for Indiegogo!

story:
The world’s first wireless Hi-Fi headphone, Panda features never-before-seen tech in a never-leave-at-home design. Thanks to its planar-ribbon drivers (powered by THX AAA™ amplifier technology) with audio delivered from your phone via Sony’s LDAC Bluetooth, Panda puts you closer to your music than ever before—wherever life takes you.

 

 

A collaboration between Drop and THX, Panda lets you discover new details in your favorite songs. Equipped with a THX AAA™ amplifier, planar-ribbon drivers, and a high-bandwidth Bluetooth audio codec (a proprietary never-before-seen combination known as the 3P Signal Path), Panda is the world’s first headphone to deliver an audiophile listening experience—wirelessly. It sets a new standard when listening to music, watching movies, or playing games.

  • World’s first wireless audiophile system
  • World’s first headphone with Drop planar-ribbon drivers (derived from Oppo Digital's PM Series)
  • World’s first headphone with THX AAA™ amplifier technology
  • World’s first headphone with LDAC + Qualcomm QCC5125
  • World’s first headphone with matching FR +THD measurements in passive and active mode

 

Good news: production is underway! Check out these pictures of the left and right earcups being made in the molding-injection tool.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Planar-ribbon drivers are synonymous with high-quality audio. What makes them so special? They feature evenly spaced magnets on both sides of the diaphragm that act on a flat plane—hence the name “planar”—which results in carefully tuned phase-correct sound. Thanks to the evenly suspended diaphragm, planar-ribbon drivers are extremely resistant to distortion, boasting a hyper-realistic sound signature as you’ve never before experienced.

 

 

  • FEM-Optimized Magnet System: To maximize driver sensitivity and consistency, Panda features a FEM-optimized magnet system with high-energy, high-quality Neodymium magnets.
  • True Phase Coherence: Sound travels like a wave. With a traditional driver, the wave can be disrupted, resulting in abnormal peaks and valleys. With a planar-ribbon driver, all parts of the driver diaphragm vibrate together without breakup or delayed resonance.
  • Double-Sided Spiraling Coils: Designed with a flat, spiraling conductor pattern, Panda allows twice as many conductors to be placed within the magnetic field. This creates higher sensitivity, better damping, and even drive force.
  • 7-Layer Diaphragm: Comprised of seven thin layers, the diaphragms inside each driver are engineered for performance and reliability. They perform well under thermal stress and vibration.
  • Purely Resistive Impedance: Absent of inductive components, Panda’s planar-ribbon drivers eliminate inductance-related intermodulation distortion—a common problem found in dynamic drivers.

 

 

Panda is the world’s first headphone with integrated THX AAA™ amplifier technology. Designed to reduce harmonic, intermodulation, and crossover distortions, this technology transmits original audio in its purest possible form. Using patented feed-forward error-correction topology, it reduces distortion by 20 to 100 times—currently the world’s lowest levels of distortion. And no matter how loud you listen, the THX AAA™ amplifier can drive Panda to comfortable listening volumes with headroom to spare.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The year was 1982. George Lucas shocked the world with Star Wars Episodes IV and V, and he was gearing up to complete the trilogy. But something still plagued Lucas. Though he’d spent months creating special sound effects, some of them—like the faint cello in one of Princess Leia’s classic scenes—couldn’t be heard during screening. As a result, Lucas made it his mission to ensure that theaters projected all of the intended sound he heard during the mix. Thus, THX was born.


Today, you may know THX from the goosebump-inducing “Deep Note” played before many blockbuster films. When you see the “THX” insignia, be assured that no piece of equipment earns that label without demonstrating the highest audio or visual quality. It’s a sure sign that the product is powerful enough to transport you to a galaxy far, far away—just like it did in theaters over 40 years ago. For more on this story, click here.

 

(Steve El-Hage, CEO + co-founder)

There’s something magical about forums. Whether you need a crash course on a certain topic or you want to explore its many complexities, forums provide a way for people of all levels of expertise to connect, share, and learn. It’s this magic that inspired the creation of Drop.

Founded in 2012, Drop (originally called Massdrop) helps gear enthusiasts get closer to the things they love. The company’s first initiative was helping members of an Audi forum acquire a rare grille manufactured in Taiwan. After successfully coordinating a $40,000 group buy, it was clear this new kind of forum had legs. So, Drop set its sights on other interest groups, most notably the audiophile community.

Gathering insights from music lovers on its built-in discussion system, Drop reached out to AKG to create an exclusive version of the legendary K702 65th-anniversary-edition headphones. The project was a huge success, and a key turning point for the future. It was then the founders realized the true potential of enthusiasts on Drop—after all, they know these products better than anyone, and know what they want better than anyone.

Since the popular AKG K7XX headset, Drop has launched hundreds of successful collaborations and exclusive designs. Today, it’s a destination for innovative community-inspired products and home to over 7 million members, including more than 3 million audiophiles.

 

Headphone type: Closed, planar ribbon 

Bluetooth wireless technology: 5.0

Effective range: Line of sight, approximately 10 m (30 ft)

Battery life: 30+ hours

Isolation: -40 dB

Impedance: 26 ohms

Sensitivity: 100 dB @ 1kHz / 1mW

THD: 94 dB SPL @ 300Hz < 0.1%

THX-AAA-0™ Amplifier: -130 dB THD, 2.6 uV A-wt noise, and 10 mW power consumption

Frequency response: 10–50,000 Hz

Driver unit: 55mm, ribbon planar magnetic

Microphones: Dual

Weight: 13.2 oz (375 g)

Water Resistance: IPX4 (Protects from splashing water from any direction)

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

To optimize the audio experience for those who want to talk as well as listen, Panda is now available with a boom mic. Durable, adjustable, and designed for gaming, the Panda boom mic comes equipped with a noise-canceling condenser mic capsule for crystal-clear audio and sensitivity far superior to that of dynamic microphones. It also features a volume slider and a mute switch for extra control. To fit any gaming setup, the Panda boom mic package includes a 4-foot cable for consoles, and a 6-foot extension cable to plug into PCs.

story:
PRE-ORDER AT WWW.BYEAOS.COM

 

 

 

 

 

Secure Fit Under Any Helmet

Comfort is key when it comes to riding. SlimBuds have a low-profile design which allow the rider to comfortably slide their helmet over their ears. They are so comfortably that you might even forget they are in you ears. 

 

The silicone ear grips take the natural shape of your ear.  They ensure a secure fitment inside the ear and are skin-friendly. Stop dealing with your earbuds falling out of your ears.  

 

With SlimBuds, ride with any of your helmets without worrying about mounting a speaker system on them. This is the beauty of having SlimBuds, your music doesn't have to stop once you take off your helmet.

 

 

SlimBuds provide passive noise isolation which keeps unwanted wind and engine noise out of your ears, allowing you to listen to your audio with clarity.

 

Enjoy clear conversations while riding. After conducting hundreds of tests, we found that the most ideal place to put a mic is right on the chin below the lower lip.

So we designed a mic exactly at that spot. We call it the "Chin-Mic". It's simple but effective. It gets minimal wind interference for clear conversations while wearing a helmet. On bicycle, you can even use them without a full face helmet. They have been tested and work better then most solutions out there today.

 

If you are riding faster then 40 mph, you are subjected to extreme wind noise which can damage your hearing permanently. Wind noise damages your hearing over a period of time until you wake up one day and realize you can't hear that well anymore. This damage is permanent and can not be fixed. SlimBuds protect the rider's ears from loud engines and wind noise. They provide a safe level of listening for the rider.

 

 

Awareness

 

At EAOS, safety is very important to us. As good as our SlimBuds sound, we are equally focused on keeping you safe while riding. Inside the chin piece there is a secondary microphone dedicated to listening to your environment. It then sends this information in real time to your phone where the co-pilot evaluates it. If it senses something important it will playback the surroundings to the rider. This means that sirens, horns or anything else you need to hear, you’ll hear it with the Co-Pilot. 

 

Our CSR chip uses aptX technology to improve data transmission speeds which allows the Co-Pilot app to warn the rider within split seconds, faster then you can react. It also allows for CD quality audio through Bluetooth.

 

 

Emergency Situations

 

We hope you don't ever need to use it, but in case the situation arises your Co-Pilot is here for you. Using the Co-Pilot app you can send your location to pre-saved emergency contacts with a tap of a button. Your emergency contacts will receive your location so they can find you or send help immediately.

 

 

 

 

Chat With Your Friends

 

Use the EAOS Co-Pilot app to add your friends to your chat before your ride. You can have multiple friends in your chat and be in communication with everyone at the same time.The app will run in the background, only picking up on what you are saying when you hit the push-to-talk button on the SlimRemote. The Co-Pilot app uses your phones LTE capability to allow for unlimited range. No matter the distance you will be able to stay connected with your riding buddies at all times.

 

 

 

Zero Distraction Controls

Controls at the tip of your fingers, the SlimRemote connects via latest Bluetooth technology to your device and allows you to control your audio, pick up phone calls, and activate voice commands all while riding. The SlimRemote is carefully designed to minimize distraction on the road. Inspired by the traditional lever design it allows for control without lifting your hand off the handlebar.

Push-To-Talk

While connected to the EAOS Co-Pilot app, you can talk to your friends with just the click of a button, using the SlimRemote. The SlimRemote features a push-to-talk button for riders to communicate with ease.

Water Resistant

In the case of unpredictable weather, EAOS has you covered. We built the SlimRemote to be water resistant so it can accompany you when you get caught in the rain.  

 

SlimBuds are powered by one of the smallest and most powerful sound drivers, delivering deep lows for immense bass and clear highs for crisp treble. We source our sound drivers from a company that has decades of experience in delivering superior audio quality.

 

The SlimBuds battery is designed to last even during the longest of rides. It pumps out a reliable 6 hours of play time to accompany you everywhere. Our charging port is standard Micro-USB, which means less cable confusion.

We have 2 microphones integrated into the design of the SlimBuds. The first mic is dedicated to the rider's communication. The second mic is solely dedicated to listening to the environment. This data is transferred via a powerful CSR chip through a bluetooth connection in real time to your phone within a thousandth of a second. This is where the Co-Pilot app picks up to assist the rider with crucial sounds.

 

 

 

 

 

We're proud to have SlimBuds fans all over the world! We will ship the SlimBuds worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.
