story:
Short Summary

The NstaJam Nspire is the creation of CEO Harold Brothwell, who founded NstaJam for the love of music, family and the next generation.

About

We believe in the power of music. To celebrate that belief, we have worked hard to develop a wireless waterproof speaker and brand we know you’ll love!

When you're jamming out to your favorite tunes, you want to feel the sounds as they fill the air around you. Nothing should ever seem to squeak or to whisper, and you should be able to bring the music everywhere you go. We believe these tenets wholeheartedly at NstaJam, this is why we have poured our hearts and souls into producing a wireless waterproof speaker of which we can be proud. 

This is a superior speaker featuring durable hardware and crystal-clear sound quality. Whether you are someone who loves music, loves it no matter where you are, or you love listening to your favorite audio book, news or any audio, no matter where you are, then NstaJam's "Nspire" is the speaker for you!

Take your NstaJam "Nspire" speaker wherever you go, even underwater! It's 100% waterproof! Whether you're kayaking, fishing, boating, or hanging out at the pool, you never have to worry about your speaker being near water! You can literally take the party anywhere! Speaker radius is 33'. Choose from 6 different colors: Orange, Pink, Green, Sky Blue, Desert Sand, and Black.

NstaJam speaker is even slobber-proof!

 

 

 

About NstaJam Nspire

Whoever says, "Big things don't come in small packages," has never had a Nspire!  This little Gem of a speaker will never disappoint. It's compact size of 1.65 cubed and weighing in at a mere 2.7oz will literally amaze with its sound quality, range, volume and lack of voice distortion. Covered in soft, durable Silica Gel, this mighty little speaker has superior shockproof enhancement. IPX7 dustproof / waterproof rating gives assurance that water is a friend.  Simple controls, wireless, easy pairing with devices, microphone for answering calls and talking, 6 fun colors to choose from...Nspire does it all. 

Nspire is being introduced as the first speaker in the "Life Collection Line" by NstaJam. We are seeking additional funding to facilitate producing in higher volumes than currently possible and expanding our tooling. We have a fantastic relationship built up with our manufacturer, and we want to insure they can fulfill all the orders we anticipate in a timely manner. We have had an overwhelmingly positive response to the product and do not want to have production/shipping delays due to low inventory supply levels. Funding also will be used to continue the updates and expansion of the "Life Collection Line" of products.

If any complications do arise, they will be dealt with quickly and efficiently. Everyone backing this project will be notified and kept up to date with any changes or challenges we may encounter.

Pitch

In addition to selling the NstaJam wireless waterproof speaker as it is, we are also offering to customize our speaker cases with other corporate logos, nonprofit logos, and even school mascots, making these speakers ideal for fundraising purposes. You can make a difference in people’s lives and know that the speakers you are selling as part of your fundraiser are of the highest quality guaranteed!

The Impact

As part of our own fundraising efforts, we intend to donate a percentage of all gross sales to "Beat Bob", a nonprofit dedicated to fighting bullying and teen suicide. Bob delivers inspirational and motivating messages that change other's lives through his speeches and events. Your contributions will help us to launch this business so that we can start doing good on a much larger stage!

  • The product will also help support the Life Matters campaign of Bob Holmes, who is featured in Ripley’s Believe It or Not as a world record holder for playing more athletic games than any other athlete in any game. Bob has played over 20,000 volleyball games in his lifetime, and his beating the odds messages are seen and heard by over 6 million people. 

By backing NstaJam not only will you get a premium audio device you will help save lives.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise a minimum of $10,000 to help get more tooling and our certifications in place.  should we surpass the minimum we will use that to further do research and development of the next model in the life collection.
  • By supporting NstaJam you will be helping save lives and receive a high quality wireless waterproof speaker that will absolutely astound you at a discount off the retail pricing.
  • We have some great packages for everyone the more support you give the more discount you receive.
  • We know this project will be successful but should it fall short the money will go to a holding tank until we are able to do what we set out to do.. each and every supporter will still receive their speaker or speakers.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • We have completed prototyping, development and testing. Production molds and finished products of each color have been produced and are ship ready, but in more limited quantities than we would like.
  • The funds raised from this project will be used to pay for expanding our tooling and production costs on larger quantities.
  • If any complications do arise, they will be dealt with quickly and efficiently.
  • Everyone backing this project will be notified and kept up to date with any changes or challenges we may encounter.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use.
  • We appreciate all the support we get, both monetary and non-monetary, and we appreciate you taking the time to read about what we are doing.
  • Feel The Power by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

Time Line of conception to finished product

  • March 2017  I purchased a wireless waterproof speaker only to have the product fail on use. It would not connect to the Android device and the device it did connect to, only had limited range of about 3 meters and after using around water, the product completely failed.
  •  After complete failure of the above mentioned product, I set out to design and produce a waterproof speaker of small size that would meet or exceed my expectations at a price everyone could afford.
  • I reached out to a friend who was already well established in the audio market.  This friend and I formed a partnership and together we began using our research and development team to develop a PCBA board that would not fail to connect and would have better range. After many long hours and several attempts, this mission was accomplished. 
  •  May 2017    Our first design thought was to have flashing lights.  After further discussion, a final decision was made that they were not very attractive and we were not going to have them on a product this size.

             Was determined this design would not work. lights did not look attractive enough

June 2017  After doing CAD work and deciding on an acceptable design, the tooling and mold was ordered to be built. 

                                                                       Mold 1

                                                                                   Cad work

Outter casing protecting the PCBA board

July 2017   Research and developing team was consulted to find a durable, shockproof, waterproof outer covering that was eye pleasing and softer to the touch and available in multiple colors.   An outer skin Silicone gel was decided upon and thought to be satisfactory for our needs.

August 2017  The mold was finished and the first working prototype was made 

August 2017  Testing of first working model in water 

 

October 2017  First Model design was received for testing by our team and focus group. 

March 2018   Market Study was finished and product was submitted to Branding company for review.

May 2018    Branding Company suggested a total Re-Brand of Logo, name and packaging.  Therefore, this is why we have two different style logo's showing on this page.  

August 2018   New Logo and Brand was established.  NstaJam

August 2018  New Packaging was decided on  (acrylic case for customization)

 

September 2018   Design Patent application was submitted  

September 2018  New update to PCBA board to connect in 1 second vs 5 seconds 

September 2018  Testing began on being able to connect 2 speakers at once without loss of sound quality 

October 2018   Went Live on indiegogo for funding to start major production

We will continue to do improvements and updates as technology allows.

Watch how simple the Nspire speaker is to pair with a device and to operate:

Our manufacturing team assembling the product ready to ship

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have completed prototyping, development and testing. Production molds and finished products of each color have been produced and are ship ready, but in more limited quantities than we would like. The funds raised from this project will be used to pay for expanding our tooling and production costs on larger quantities. If any complications do arise, they will be dealt with quickly and efficiently. Everyone backing this project will be notified and kept up to date with any changes or challenges we may encounter.

story:
Join us on social media and stay tuned! 

Cut Out the World, Lock into Your Music

Mu6 is more than just headphones! Under the belief that audio quality is the top priority in the headphones, Mu6 has been crafted with incredible Mu6 Signature Sound to change the way we enjoy music.

Overview

After 2 years of working with world-class acoustic labs and audio engineers, Mu6 expresses the best sound quality in 3 ways: Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation Technology reduces background noise for an immersive sound experience, while the powerful 40mm dynamic driver, the high-definition Apt-X LL codec, large but slim polymer diaphragm, and the latest CSR Bluetooth 5.0 elevates every nuance of sound into even finer detail. Furthermore, our invented Hearing Optimization Technology which learns and re-tunes personal hearing helps you reach the full hearing potential. With other innovative technology like infrared proximity sensor, Mu6 is feature-packed headphones with our passion for creating amazing products with the best possible listening experience to every pair of ears.

Mu6: Better than Bose? GiGadgets Unboxing

Featured in

 

 

Being Smart, Being Interactive 

Smart Touch & Talk

If you’re listening to music with the noise cancellation on and need to have a quick conversation with others, you can simply cup the left ear-cup with your hand, temporarily lowering the sound of your music and naturally enlarging the volume of the person talking to you.

Auto Pause & Play

You’ll never miss a beat with the Auto Pause and Play feature. With built-in infrared proximity sensor, the audio pauses automatically when you take off the headphones, then resumes when you put them back on. This innovative approach is more seamless and accurate than other headphones in existence supporting this function. No more rewinding or restarting to find your place again.

Magnetic Wireless Charging Stand

No more wire hassle! The Mu6 Wireless Charging Stand adopts magnetic power contact technology. It is an elegant stainless steel stand that not only showcases your Mu6 headphones but is also a charging station that keeps Mu6 always ready to rock.

Immerse Yourself in Music

Mu6 Top-notch Noise Cancellation

Mu6 noise canceling headphones are designed to provide you with a more enjoyable listening experience. We’re continually striving to improve the noise cancellation performance to achieve maximum noise cancellation while still remaining true to the music.

 

Best Passive Noise Isolation 

Mu6 employs a special high-density memory foam in the earcup padding for noise isolation. The ergonomic design fits snugly over your ears to create an impeccable seal for outside noise cancellation and maximum listening comfort. 

Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation (ANC)

Mu6 Hybrid Active Noise Canceling Technology is an improved system that not only suppresses noise over a wider frequency range but also adapts to and corrects errors while being less sensitive to sound angle and user wear.

With the industry-leading active noise-canceling technology, Mu6 blocks out ambient background noises and gives you a listening experience free of distractions.

ANC ON / OFF and Transparency Mode

You can control the amount of environmental noise you want to let in or block out with ANC ON / OFF Modes and Transparency Mode. Transparency Mode allows users to remain attentive to their surroundings. With accurate position and spatial awareness, it ensures personal safety when walking across busy junctions. There are 2 ANC levels (Quiet / Very Quiet), satisfying all personal needs.

Experience Music Like Never Before

HD Audio Tailored by Hearing Optimization

We build Mu6 down to details in our headset hardware and develop the hearing curve optimization technology which can learn and re-tune your personal hearing curve to achieve the best audio performance for you.

Built for the Premium Sound

Mu6 has been built with a powerful 40mm dynamic driver and utilizes a cutting-edge polymer diaphragm for distortion-free bass and a balanced soundstage.

Powered by Qualcomm Apt-X LL codec and CSR Bluetooth® 5.0, Mu6 elevates every nuance of sound into even finer detail. The latest Bluetooth® 5.0 results in a ‘better-than-CD’ listening experience and clear calls. Apt-X LL audio reduces delay and improves the end-to-end speed of the audio transmission, resulting in a high quality and synchronized sound. With aptX, music lovers can enjoy wired-quality sound - wirelessly. These features unite to deliver the most details sound in your audio.

Mu6 Hearing Optimization

We teamed up with experts in audiology and neurology to perform extensive research on the hearing condition of musicians and professional tuners. Based on international equal-loudness contours standard by ISO and with the lab test results in our research, we defined the Mu6 Golden Curve representing the perfect human hearing condition.

After a simple test on Mu6 App, we map your unique hearing sensitivity to different sounds. Our algorithms then adjust and re-tune the sounds by compensating your hearing loss and filling in your musical blind spots to match with Mu6 Golden Curve. The result is a tailored audio experience custom-fit for your ears only, which will be remembered by Mu6 after you first put them on. No matter what music apps or phones you use, Mu6 identifies you so any music you listen to will be optimized for a complete and rich auditory experience.

After spending thousands of hours’ fine-tuning and enhancing, Mu6 headphones finally deliver the truly authentic sound with rich yet balanced bass, detailed natural mids, and a clean and clear upper register. With more customization options on our APP, Mu6 helps you achieve your full hearing potential. 

Mu6 App

Get tips, unlock product features and personalize your settings with Mu6 App. You can pick between Popular, Rock, Jazz, Hi-Fi, as well as create your own custom equalizer to suit a favorite genre or particular mood.

Mu6 vs. Other Top ANC Headphones

In terms of features, sound quality, comfort design, Mu6 is the most cost-effective headset you can find on the market which showcases our long-term research and determination of reinventing the way we enjoy music.

Color Options

The Design

What's in The Box

Technical Specifications

 

The Journey of Mu6

We are proud of Mu6 because we believe we’ve truly made something better with the most reasonable price than what’s out there. We’re a team of audio engineers, audiophiles, headset designers and marketers with experience of multiple audio products. With the passion for creating amazing products that bring the best possible listening experience to every pair of ears, we've already spent two years on Mu6 and we are in the trial production phase as of today. The funding raised on Indiegogo will be used on mass production and new product development. Purchase yours today and get it in March 2019.

 

Mu6 Timeline

Meet Mu6 Team

Mu6 has operations in Los Angeles, Texas US, and  Shenzhen China. Each member of the team has 10+ years relevant experience in startups and big companies such as Microsoft and Honeywell. Teaming up with engineers and experts in acoustic, holographic audio and Virtual Reality area, we have spent two years developing Mu6 to bring high-quality headphones at a reasonable price with the best listening experience. Combining best-in-class acoustic know-how, cutting-edge digital signal processing technologies, headphone design insights, and manufacturing background, Mu6 is a team with a mission to change the way we hear the sound.

Transparency Mode allows users to remain attentive to their surroundings. With accurate position and spatial awareness, it ensures personal safety when walking across busy junctions. There are 2 ANC levels (Quiet / Very Quiet), satisfying all personal needs.Experience Music Like Never BeforeHD Audio Tailored by Hearing OptimizationWe build Mu6 down to details in our headset hardware and develop the hearing curve optimization technology which can learn and re-tune your personal hearing curve to achieve the best audio performance for you.Built for the Premium SoundMu6 has been built with a powerful 40mm dynamic driver and utilizes a cutting-edge polymer diaphragm for distortion-free bass and a balanced soundstage.Powered by Qualcomm Apt-X LL codec and CSR Bluetooth® 5.0, Mu6 elevates every nuance of sound into even finer detail. The latest Bluetooth® 5.0 results in a ‘better-than-CD’ listening experience and clear calls. Apt-X LL audio reduces delay and improves the end-to-end speed of the audio transmission, resulting in a high quality and synchronized sound. With aptX, music lovers can enjoy wired-quality sound - wirelessly. These features unite to deliver the most details sound in your audio.Mu6 Hearing OptimizationWe teamed up with experts in audiology and neurology to perform extensive research on the hearing condition of musicians and professional tuners. Based on international equal-loudness contours standard by ISO and with the lab test results in our research, we defined the Mu6 Golden Curve representing the perfect human hearing condition.After a simple test on Mu6 App, we map your unique hearing sensitivity to different sounds. Our algorithms then adjust and re-tune the sounds by compensating your hearing loss and filling in your musical blind spots to match with Mu6 Golden Curve. The result is a tailored audio experience custom-fit for your ears only, which will be remembered by Mu6 after you first put them on. No matter what music apps or phones you use, Mu6 identifies you so any music you listen to will be optimized for a complete and rich auditory experience.

After spending thousands of hours’ fine-tuning and enhancing, Mu6 headphones finally deliver the truly authentic sound with rich yet balanced bass, detailed natural mids, and a clean and clear upper register. With more customization options on our APP, Mu6 helps you achieve your full hearing potential. 

Mu6 App
Get tips, unlock product features and personalize your settings with Mu6 App. You can pick between Popular, Rock, Jazz, Hi-Fi, as well as create your own custom equalizer to suit a favorite genre or particular mood.

Mu6 vs. Other Top ANC Headphones
In terms of features, sound quality, comfort design, Mu6 is the most cost-effective headset you can find on the market which showcases our long-term research and determination of reinventing the way we enjoy music.

Color Options

The Design

What's in The Box

Technical Specifications




 
The Journey of Mu6
We are proud of Mu6 because we believe we’ve truly made something better with the most reasonable price than what’s out there. We’re a team of audio engineers, audiophiles, headset designers and marketers with experience of multiple audio products. With the passion for creating amazing products that bring the best possible listening experience to every pair of ears, we've already spent two years on Mu6 and we are in the trial production phase as of today. The funding raised on Indiegogo will be used on mass production and new product development. Purchase yours today and get it in March 2019.
 

Mu6 Timeline

Meet Mu6 Team
Mu6 has operations in Los Angeles, Texas US, and  Shenzhen China. Each member of the team has 10+ years relevant experience in startups and big companies such as Microsoft and Honeywell. Teaming up with engineers and experts in acoustic, holographic audio and Virtual Reality area, we have spent two years developing Mu6 to bring high-quality headphones at a reasonable price with the best listening experience. Combining best-in-class acoustic know-how, cutting-edge digital signal processing technologies, headphone design insights, and manufacturing background, Mu6 is a team with a mission to change the way we hear the sound.

story:
Meet the Tula Mic — a USB mic & mobile recorder that gives you studio-quality sound without the need for an actual studio. Order yours at tulamics.com

 

The Tula is all the equipment you need to intuitively capture and record high-quality sound no matter what you’re doing.

Hosting a podcast, producing digital content, or just attending work meetings from home. The Tula comes equipped with noise cancellation, plus the mic doubles as a mobile recorder.
 

 

The Tula doesn’t just have great features, the mic’s design is unmatched — a true combination  of modern and nostalgic aesthetic. Not only will you capture high-quality audio always, you’ll look great while doing it.

 

 

The Tula was designed for maximum ease and portability. Its base opens and closes with a premium feel and is detachable with a simple quarter-turn mechanism. The Tula Mic’s form factor is based on the golden ratio, allowing for maximum ease and portability.

 

 

 

 

The Tula Mic will allow you to effortlessly capture great audio. Whether you’re a content creator, a work-from-home professional or just somebody who appreciates good sound in Zoom meetings and Skype calls, the Tula could be just what you’re looking for. It’s a high quality USB mic (and so much more).

 

 

Imagine your own little recording studio in your pocket. The Tula makes that a reality. With its own internal battery and memory, the Tula Mic can give you up to 12 hours of continuous recording in high quality 16bit/48K wav format. 

 

 

Not everyone has the luxury of always using a microphone in a silent environment. We teamed up with a well-known Swedish music software company to create an embedded version of their noise-reduction algorithm. With just the touch of a button, you can get rid of unwanted background noise such as fans, air conditioners or even traffic. 

 

 

The Tula was designed in conjunction with Red Dot Award-winning industrial designers in Barcelona. It’s a thoroughly modern device featuring cutting-edge audio technology and yet its soft curves and solid build quality reference a bygone era.

 

 

The folks behind the Tula Mic are no strangers to the world of audio. Founder David Brown is the co-owner of Soyuz Microphones, one of the most well respected high-end microphone brands on the planet. Soyuz is the audio choice of the likes of Coldplay, Radiohead and many more. Plus Tula’s firmware, electronic and mechanical engineers have worked on the iconic OP-Z synthesizer from Teenage Engineering. 

 

 

The Tula Mic features Burr Brown op amps, TI audio codecs and high performance ECMs. It has both uni and omni-directional capsules and its 3.5mm headphone jack doubles as an input for a lavalier microphone. Yet, the priority has always been to keep the Tula so frictionless and user friendly that even a child could use it. 



The Tula was designed with the modern content creator in mind. It’s intuitive, portable and stylish. Podcasters can use it in their studio or remotely as a mobile recorder when conducting interviews in the field. 

 

 

You can use the uni-directional capsule in conjunction with a lavalier microphone plugged into the Tula’s 3.5mm jack to conduct an interview with two separate mono tracks using nothing but Tula. No computer or phone needed! 

 

 

YouTubers, you can use the Tula as your primary audio source for filming videos or streaming from your computer. If you’re recording outdoors you can use the noise cancellation feature to block out any unnecessary background noises.
 

 

Or use it as a mobile recorder. With its internal battery and memory, the Tula will give you up to 12 hours of high quality recording. The device is also equipped to fast-charge via the USB-C port.

 

 

How many work meetings are you attending remotely during the global pandemic? Does this sound familiar: "You're cutting out." "It sounds like you're in a wind tunnel." "Are you on mute?"

We can't clear your calendar, but we can get you the right mic to showcase your ideas with clear, crisp sound.

Bring your best voice to the next team meeting. The Tula gives you high-quality audio always.

Plus you can use the noise cancelling feature to remove unwanted background noise. Fan too loud? Kids too cranky? With the Tula Mic, they won’t end up in your Zoom meeting.

 

 

The Tula is not the first portable USB mic, but it’s the first one that doubles as a mobile recorder, has high-quality sound and  onboard noise cancellation. It’s made from top-notch materials and features a superior design aesthetic.
 

 

Sound samples

Ready to hear the Tula in action? Visit our Soundcloud for samples.

 

 

The Tula has been fully developed, tested (and tested again). So with the help of our crowdfunding backers, we're ready to mass produce and send the mics out in December.

When your Tula arrives in its 100% recycled material box, you'll find a Tula mic, plus a removable folding stand, a USB-C cable and a custom adapter to affix your Tula to standard mic stands and arms.

 

 

Several of your purchase options include these add-ons already. That's the best deal! You save when you buy as a bundle.

But if you want to add one at a time, or maybe pick up an extra shirt, you can do that here or when you check out. If you buy a Tula, you should buy these as an add-on, when you check out. Not using these links.

Here are the add-on options:

Case: The Tula carrying case is perfectly designed to fit your Tula mic, stand, adapter, USB-C cable and even your lav mic. It's perfect for when you're on the road or just out for a bit of mobile recording. Buy now.

Lav mic: The lavalier mic plugs into the 3.5mm jack to allow you close miking of interview subjects. It can also be used in conjunction with the cardioid capsule to record two separate mono tracks of audio (for remote interviews without the need for a a computer or phone). Buy now.

Adapter: The Tula adapter is custom made to give you the same convenient quarter turn mechanism as the Tula stand when using other mic stands and arms. Buy now.

Tula shirt: Natural cotton Tula mic t-shirt featuring a hand drawn Tula on the front. It's unisex and comes in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Buy now.

 

 

One of the most frequent questions we hear: "Can I attach the Tula to a stand?"

You can use the Tula on its own with the included stand. And if you want to attach it to a different mic stand or mic arm, we've got you covered. The adapter uses the our custom quarter turn mechanism to allow you to use the Tula with any stand. With the adapter, you can position the Tula right where you want it to get the very best sound.

The adapter is included with your Tula mic.

 

 

When you're done, store the adapter in the Tula case. (Just make sure the case is part of your purchase!)

 

 

We’re a team from very diverse backgrounds who share a love of making cool stuff! Steven, our mechanical engineer and project manager has brought dozens of hardware products from concept to mass production. Stefan, our electrical and firmware engineer is a master of firmware and embedded systems who was deeply involved in the creation of the iconic synthesizer the OP-Z from Teenage Engineering. And David? He says: "I’m just a singer who likes to imagine and draw cool products, and assemble teams who can turn them into a reality."

 

 

Tula was well on its way to being fully funded by investors earlier this year. Then, on March 9th, the markets of the world collapsed.  

We believe that the need for the Tula has only increased due to the pandemic. Your voice is more important than ever. And for many of us, our voice is what connects us to family, friends, colleagues and new opportunities. We want to carry your voice and far and wide, whether you’re recording an interview, running a meeting or documenting daily life.

We believed that people would see the value in the Tula and that we would be able to raise the funds needed for our first mass production run via an engaged community on Indiegogo.  

Our work continued even after the pandemic pressed pause. We’ve managed to finish virtually all of the development work through spring and summer 2020. That means folks who invest in a Tula Mic will get their microphone less than two months after the campaign ends.

 

 

This is not our first manufacturing and shipment process. It’s not even our first time producing a world-class mic (learn about our first one here).

Ready to press "play"

We’re ready to start mass manufacturing the Tula Mic once we reach our funding goal. We’ve got a factory in place. Our project manager has a very close relationship with the factory and has successfully brought many hardware products to market before. We’re fully committed to delivering your Tula Mic on time, and with proper planning and safety measures, COVID-19 will have no impact on our production.

What this means for you

Generally, the biggest risk for any hardware product is unknown delays in manufacturing as things can always change along the way when bringing a brand new product into the world for the first time. It’s highly unlikely that this will happen for the Tula.

In the unlikely case that delays occur, rest assured we’ll disclose all information in our updates.

 

 

 

Return policy

The Tula has undergone 2+ years of development and testing. The funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture Tula Mics for our backers. With your support, it’s ready to go.

In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. All Tula Mics come with a 12-month warranty, so in the unlikely event that you receive a faulty device, please contact us at info@tulamics.com.

Sustainability

The Tula was designed with longevity and environmental concerns in mind. All the parts either snap or screw together so that the Tula can be easily repaired and when its life is over, it can be separated into its various parts and recycled or disposed of correctly.

Shipping

At the end of the campaign, we’ll reach out for your shipping address. Shipping charges are estimated to be $5 standard shipping in the US, $10 to Canada, and $15 - $20 for international shipping. The charges might increase or decrease slightly.

We're offering both US and international shipping. Please note we're not responsible for additional duty and taxes that may apply to your country. 

For US fulfillment, Tulas will first be sent via air freight from our factory in Malaysia to our fulfillment center in the US and then be shipped to US addresses. US-based backers are expected to receive rewards within 3-8 days from our fulfillment warehouse. 

For the rest of the world, rewards will also be sent from our fulfillment center in the US and should be expected within 4-20 days from shipping depending on the size of the delivery and your country.

story:
FREER: Wi-Fi Your USB Audio DAC

The music in our smart phone just can be played either locally or to a new AirPlay or DLNA speaker. Wanna enjoy the high resolution and high quality music, but need to get rid of your high-end USB Audio DAC, and buy a compromised AirPlay or DLNA speaker system? 

NO! FREER offers you a better solution!

FREER is an wireless bridge, providing a compress-less free way to play your music on mobile devices to your existing Hi-Fi USB Audio DAC system. Simply connect FREER to your Hi-Fi USB DAC via an USB cable, power it on, connect your iDevices or Android devices to FREER.


Play from your devices is simple. At the very first time you use FREER, you can find FREER show as an Wi-Fi access point, simply connect to it, then you can use AirPlay on iOS or Wi-Fi player in Android to play music.  If you want to connect FREER to your home Wi-Fi network, FREER also can play as an Wi-Fi client just with some easy setup. Once FREER connect to your Wi-Fi access point, it will show as an AirPlay device and DLNA renderer in your home network afterwards.


FREER works with all your digital audio streaming devices – iPhone, iPad, Android phones, PC and Mac. Most importantly, you can keep your existing USB audio DAC, either a simple USB audio sound card, or the high-end FPGA based USB audio DAC. We have done the interoperability tests with the most USB audio silicon providers.

*All trademarks mentioned above belong to their respective owners.


The Revolution of FREER

We finish the proof of concept on the evaluation reference board, and finish the driver and application firmware porting, as 1st prototype.


In order to meet the requirement of some small and mobile USB audio DAC, and easy to carry, we decide to miniature the size of the hardware design, which is the FREER!

Hardware/Mechanical Design:


Firmware Design:


Working Sample:


FREER can be either powered by the 5V/500mA AC/DC USB power adapter, especially perfectly matched with the Apple power adapter:


Or, powered by power bank, to reduce AC harmonics and switching power noises.


Specifications

Hardware:

  • IEEE802.11 b/g/n
  • Powered by USB Type-A Connector
  • Connect to USB Audio DAC by microUSB connector
  • Omni-directional antenna
  • Reset button to factory default (Wi-Fi AP Mode)

Software:

  • UAC 2.0 (Tested USB DAC up to 384KHz/24Bit)
  • Airplay 1.0 Compatible (Audio Only)
  • DLNA 1.5 DMR (Renderer)
  • Access Point Mode (FREER directly connected by iOS/Android devices)
  • Client Mode (FREER connected to existing Wi-Fi network)
  • Firmware Upgrade

Supported music format:

  • FLAC (Up to 96KHz/24Bit)
  • MP3
  • WAV
  • ALAC


Where FREER Is

  • Proof of Concept                                   ✔
  • UAC Driver Porting                                ✔
  • AirPlay Application Porting                 ✔
  • DLNA Application Porting                   ✔
  • 1st Working Sample Build                   ✔
  • 2nd Working Sample Build                 ✔
  • Industrial Design                                   ✔
  • Mechanical Design                               ✔
  • Tooling Design                                 ETD 2014/JUL
  • Regulation Certification                ETD 2014/AUG
  • Mass Production/Shipping          ETD 2014/SEP


What We Need

We have not just finished the proof of concept, but also firmware porting, hardware fabrication, and CNC mockup design. Now we need your support to go to the next critical stage- finishing the tooling design, getting the regulation approvals, and making FREER to be mass production!


About US

Mosalink Inc., funded by 3 technology and music buffs, intends to develop awesome device to enjoy both the convenience of the technologies, and the touch of the music. 

Please support us to make FREER spreading!

AirPlay Application Porting                 ✔
DLNA Application Porting                   ✔
1st Working Sample Build                   ✔
2nd Working Sample Build                 ✔
Industrial Design                                   ✔
Mechanical Design                               ✔
Tooling Design                                 ETD 2014/JUL
Regulation Certification                ETD 2014/AUG
Mass Production/Shipping          ETD 2014/SEP
What We NeedWe have not just finished the proof of concept, but also firmware porting, hardware fabrication, and CNC mockup design. Now we need your support to go to the next critical stage- finishing the tooling design, getting the regulation approvals, and making FREER to be mass production!About USMosalink Inc., funded by 3 technology and music buffs, intends to develop awesome device to enjoy both the convenience of the technologies, and the touch of the music. Please support us to make FREER spreading!

story:
POLATAP 7-in-1 Traveler Kit contains following products:

1. Active Noise Canceling Earphones - World-class noise canceling performance, ergonomic fit, superior sound quality, aptX codec, and up to 400 hours of active noise canceling with Battery Hub.

2. Bluetooth Receiver - Turn any wired headphone wireless. Supports any wired audio product, compact size, and compatible with in-flight entertainment using the included 3.5mm audio cable.

3. Metal Clip Accessory - Use with Bluetooth Receiver for easy headphone wire management by clipping onto shirt or pocket.

4. Battery Hub - 5,000mAh capacity, turbo charging, premium aluminum design, and supports Lightning, Micro-USB, and USB-C plugs for charging the battery as well as all three ports for charging your devices.

5. Speaker Block - Efficient 3W audio driver and 200 hours of play time with Battery Hub.

6. Cable Kit - Built-in Lightning & USB C charging cables, and supports simultaneous charging.

7. Carrying Case - One small portable case to carry it all.

Our simple yet comprehensive kit has everything you need for your next trip, all contained in a small dedicated Carrying Case.

 

 

 

The Traveler Kit is a modular set of Bluetooth audio and charging products that uses a 9-pin magnetic system to charge devices and enable active noise canceling feature. The magnets snap together and make this modular system effortless to connect.

POLATAP products can be magnetically connected in any orientation. Any combination works. You can practically do it in the dark or with your eyes closed.

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above image have been changed to a dual USB type-C design.

POLATAP has incredible flexibility when it comes to connectivity. You don't have to carry any additional accessories or cables around because POLATAP supports all connectivity options for all of your devices. 

 

 

 

*Following is an audio sample showing effectiveness of ANC (noise cancelling earphone) earphones.

                                                       
 

 

The active noise cancelling technology works by using POLATAP Earphones together with the Bluetooth Receiver, making the Earphones incredibly lightweight and battery-free.

The Bluetooth Receiver supplies the power and controls the active noise cancelling technology, and they are transmitted to the Earphones over the 3.5mm audio connection.

 

Taking advantage of the huge battery in the Battery Hub, you can enjoy active noise cancelling for longer than one week. All you have to do is snap the Bluetooth Receiver onto the Battery Hub to charge it when you need to. The noise cancelling feature can be used for up to 12 hours without being charged by the Battery Hub, and 6 hours or less when used together with music play-back or voice calls depending on the volume of sound.

 

 

Audio transparency feature allows external sound to not just pass-through, but amplify only the sounds that you want to hear. A dedicated button is easily accessible on the Bluetooth Receiver, instantly letting you hear what's going on around you without having to take your earphones out.

 

There’s a reason why POLATAP’s Earphones are more compact than any other active noise cancelling earphones. There are actually no batteries in the Earphones at all.

Many earphones require dedicated batteries for active noise cancelling. Having to charge the earphones themselves with a separate charger can be annoying and not to mention you might lose the charging cable. However, we developed a way to send power through the earphone wires without requiring a dedicated battery for active noise cancelling.

We partnered with GMK, an innovative fabless semiconductor company who provide proprietary single-wire connectivity solutions. We've achieved a battery-free noise cancelling earphones by adapting GPCI(GMK Power Communication Interface) into POLATAP’s Bluetooth Receiver.

 

We have made a fantastic partnership with CRESYN, one of the most respected names in audio product, and one of the world’s largest manufacturers of consumer electronics. Our team has successfully achieved a superior audio quality while maintaining a compact design thanks to CRESYN’s acoustic team.

We wanted to make POLATAP as affordable as possible for Indiegogo backers. For the limited Indiegogo specials, we priced POLATAP as close to the original production cost as possible. This is possible because we got rid of the middleman.

We've also worked with the manufacturing factories in China to refine the production process, making them cost-efficient.

And POLATAP's modular system means that there are no redundant components, basically making each product in the Traveler Kit cheaper than any other competitors in the same quality level.

We've gone through multiple iterations of testing to perfect the performance of the Earphones.

 

 

 

Plug in the Earphones' 3.5mm audio jack into the Bluetooth Receiver.

 

Switch on the active noise cancelling slider on the Earphones to block out the noise around you.

 

COMPONENTS

 

The Earphones contain a large 14.3mm driver for high-fidelity.

 

The remote on the Earphones has volume, play/pause, and voice assistant buttons as well as a microphone and active noise cancelling power slider.

 

 

We've visited one of the noisiest, yet coolest, place on planet earth, Time Square, New York, with our Noise Cancelling Earphones. See how the people in Time Square reacted to our noise cancelling feature:

 

 

 

 

 

 

3.5mm audio jacks are disappearing from smartphones, but that doesn’t mean you can’t keep using your favorite pair of wired headphones. POLATAP Bluetooth Receiver can turn any wired headphones or speakers into a wireless device, letting you stream your music wirelessly.

 

The Bluetooth Receiver also comes with a metal clip accessory for clipping onto your shirt or pocket, so you can listen to music without getting your wires tangled.

 

In any rental or privately-owned car, plug the Bluetooth Receiver into the 3.5mm audio plug to hear everything that goes on in your smartphone through your car stereo: navigation, music, or hands-free calling. No setup or additional pairing required.

You can even use your favorite hi-fi speakers in your home or office. Just plug and play.

 

 

1. Snap the Bluetooth Receiver and metal clip accessory together.
2. Plug in your audio via 3.5mm audio plug.
3. Pair the Bluetooth Receiver with a device source like your smartphone.
4. Enjoy.

You can clip the Bluetooth Receiver onto your shirt or pocket for a cleaner cable management.

 

To charge the Bluetooth Receiver, just snap it onto the Battery Hub.

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above animation have been changed to a dual USB type-C design.

 

COMPONENTS

Bluetooth Receiver has been designed to be compact and light.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Built-in support for Lightning, Micro-USB, and USB-C charging devices. The 5,000mAh portable battery (3X the battery capacity of iPhone 7) supports simultaneous charging of up to three different devices. The Battery Hub also acts as a charging hub for the Traveler Kit, providing plenty of charge for all of POLATAP’s products.

 

Charge the Battery Hub, and one device
Plug power adaptor to Battery Hub's USB-C port to charge the battery. And plug any charging cable to the USB-C port to charge a device.

Charge two devices simultaneously
Plug a USB-C compatible device to the USB-C port. And plug any charging cable to the USB-C port to charge another device.

While charging two devices with Battery Hub and Cable Kit, you can charge the Battery Hub via its USB-C port with the included USB-C to USB-A charging cable.

 

COMPONENTS

Battery Hub contains a huge 5,000mAh battery and is able to charge any device. (Lightning, micro-USB, USB-C)

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above animation have been changed to a dual USB type-C design..

 

 

 

 

At just 17mm thin, POLATAP Speaker Block is the world's thinnest 2W portable speaker. It contains only the 2W driver, and can be used when connected together with the Battery Hub for source of power and Bluetooth Receiver for wireless connectivity.

 

The Speaker Block can play music continuously for up to 200 hours while connected to the Battery Hub and Bluetooth Receiver.

 

 

 

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above animation have been changed to a dual USB type-C design..

1. Connect Speaker Block to Battery Hub for source of power.
2. Connect Bluetooth Receiver on the other side of the Battery Hub for wireless pairing.
3. Pair with a source device, like your smartphone to start listening.

 

COMPONENTS

 

 

 

 

 

 

POLATAP’s Cable Kit contains both Lightning and Micro-USB charger ports and is able to charge both at the same time. Unlike common portable batteries, you can charge both iPhone and Android devices simultaneously, without having to bring extra charging cables. The chargers fold easily into the Cable Kit, keeping them compact and cleanly organized.

 

 

Connect the Battery Hub to POLATAP’s Cable Kit and charge either Lightning or Micro-USB device using the built-in charging cable. Or use both at the same time!

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above animation have been changed to a dual USB type-C design..

*Due to mass production feasibility issues, Battery Hub design shown in the above .gif image have been changed to a dual USB type-C design.

Charge three devices at the same time
Charge up to three devices simultaneously by using POLATAP Cable Kit (Lightning + micro-USB) and Battery Hub's USB-A port while connected to the power adaptor.

Also charge the Battery Hub itself
The Battery Hub, connected with Cable Kit, allows the battery itself to be charged by any connecting the power adaptor to any one of three ports (Lightning, micro-USB, or USB-C port). Battery Hub's smart ID checker enables it to detect where the power source is coming from and safely charge itself.

Charge up to four devices while charging the Battery Hub
If your friends are running low, your Battery Hub becomes literally the hub for charging your devices as well as your friend's devices.

 

 

 

 

For Indiegogo backers, we are offering an elegant black carrying case!

 

 

 

1. *Begin shipping from August 2018: About 1~3 weeks delivery time
*For all the backers who have pledged  with Wireless Audio Single

2. *Begin shipping from August 2018: About 1~3 week delivery time
*For all the backers who have pledged with All-In-One Traveler Single

Please note that Polatap, inc. is not to be held responsible for the duties and customs that may be different upon the type of country backer resides in.

 

 

In case you haven't already, please share this project and let your friends and family know about us so we can get there even faster!

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

POLATAP is nearly completed and we have made preliminary agreements with our manufacturers. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and ready to meet the estimated delivery times. We’ve done our very best to estimate demand and create a solid production plan, but sometimes forecasts are not able to hit the mark perfectly. In this case, we’ll let you know the reasons and correct it as soon as possible.

We're aware of the challenges during production, packaging and shipping worldwide. However, we have top-notch advisors onboard where, with their extensive background and work experiences, we can hit the ground running. We’ll work hard and deliver you an incredible product, which has been our responsibility since the beginning of this project. We can’t wait for you guys to get your hands on the POLATAP Traveler Kit!

story:
Blip is the lightest Bluetooth receiver you’ll ever see, but don’t be fooled by its size - this tiny device is big on sound and power. It makes any headphones wireless, and delivers crystal clear audio. Just clip it on, pair via Bluetooth, and enjoy wireless music and phone calls anytime, anywhere.

Wireless Music With Any Headphones 

With Blip, add Bluetooth capability and stream music wirelessly with any audio device, such as your smartphone, TV, power speakers, and even the audio system in your car. And thanks to Blip’s 3.5mm stereo output, you can keep your favorite headphones - just plug them into Blip, and they’ll automatically turn into wireless Bluetooth headphones!

Ultra Lightweight & Compact

At just 8 grams/0.28 oz, Blip is the lightest Bluetooth receiver you’ve ever seen. In fact, it’s as light as 2 sheets of paper. Don’t believe us? Just clip it onto your shirt or put it in your pocket - we guarantee you won’t feel a thing.

5-Hour Playback

We don’t mean to brag, but Blip can regenerate even faster than Wolverine. Just put it in the protective charging case - in 15 minutes, it will be fully charged, giving you 5 hours of listening time.

Intuitive Controls

Using your phone to control your music is so yesterday - even your grandma has moved on from that. With Blip, a twist or a touch is all you need to change tracks, adjust volume, or accept calls. It’s as easy as 1 2 3.

Active Noise Reduction   

Nothing should come between you and your music. Blip optimizes the sound quality for music and calls using its own noise reduction circuitry. The built-in microphone continuously listens to and reduces ambient noise, while the chip in Blip is capable of producing a signal-to-noise ratio of up to 105db.

Hands-Free Calling   

Talking on-the-go has never been easier. You can now accept or decline an incoming call with the touch of a button - no need to rummage through your bag or pockets for your phone. With Blip’s built-in echo-cancelling microphone and noise reduction technology, enjoy crisp and clear calls anywhere, whether it is with a loved one, your friends, or your potentially nightmarish boss.

Splash-Resistant   

Blip is made to keep up with your active lifestyle. Whether you’re running (or singing) in the rain, drenched in sweat from an intensive workout, or just careless enough to spill water on Blip, your music will never be interrupted.

The Blip Clip

Use Blip wherever you go - whether you’re working out, commuting to work, at a coffee shop, or just chilling at home. Simply clip it onto your shirt or pocket, and enjoy on-the-go access to music and phone calls, no matter where you are.

Blip was designed to be minimal, stylish, and intuitively functional. The photos below show a closer look at the prototypes.  

Hi Indiegogo, I am Alfred Lam, Founder of Zaffre Labs. As an OEM business, we produced parts and equipment for the big companies, who then stamped their own brand name on the finished product. The industry was once booming, but now our margins are increasingly squeezed under the pressure of these big brands.

That’s when we realized that with over 30 years of experience in manufacturing and consumer electronics, we could take the big leap to create our own product, and sell it as our own. So, we created Blip - a top-quality, affordable Bluetooth receiver - but the risks are still huge. Is there really a market for it? Would people be attracted to our design and features? Indiegogo is the perfect platform to launch Blip: not only will we be able to obtain the minimum order, which will keep our costs low, but we’ll also receive constructive feedback, a lot of which can be used to improve Blip before we go into mass production. Join us to bring the lightest Bluetooth receiver to life!

Risks and challenges

We understand that every project comes with its own unique risks and challenges; and our project is no different. However, our team has over 30 years of manufacturing in consumer electronics, so we are prepared to meet any challenges head on. We also noticed many crowdfunding projects have delays. To prevent the event of any delays for Blip, we waited until all the tooling was completed and we have a production prototype ready before launching our campaign here. If there are any challenges that may arise later, we promise to continue to communicate with everyone and overcome them together.

story:
Combining portability with audiophile-grade sound—UPstage360 has it all! 

UPstage360 upgrades you from sweet spots to a 360° sweet zone, projecting output evenly in an omnidirectional soundstage so you can hear the same Hi-Res audio from anywhere in the room.

Unlike conventional speakers that deliver directional output, chaining listeners to a limited area of sweet spots, UPstage360 creates consistent, high-quality sound regardless of where you stand.

It accomplishes this through a patented ball-cone reflection structure made of aluminum alloy. This creates optimized reflection curves that radiate consistent sound waves while avoiding interference with different frequency ranges. 

UPstage360 enables internal docking with Echo Dot and ChromeCast, and is compatible with various streaming platforms including Tidal, Qobuz, Spotify, and Apple Music!

You can connect UPstage360 to any of your devices via lossless aptX Bluetooth, and adjust the volume from your device or from the UPstage360 speaker buttons. You also have the option to connect your UPstage360 to other systems via AUX-in.

Soundmatters has 30 years of experience in acoustic design and micro-audiophile speaker technology – starting from its founder’s origins as a NASA engineer. We design popular acoustic products, including foxL, named a Top 10 Gadgets of the Year by Time Magazine, and the blockbuster-selling Jawbone Jambox.

We partnered with TB Speaker, the highly regarded speaker manufacturer, to ensure quality production. Working with these experienced and reliable partners enables UPstage360 to deliver the latest in electroacoustic technology.

Level 10 is a passionate team of audio enthusiasts with a vision to reinvent speaker design for today’s lifestyle, with tomorrow’s technologies. To make this possible, we work with Soundmatters, the leading innovator of ultra-compact acoustic designs, to complete the all-in-one solution: UPstage360, which integrates smart technology with the ultimate sound performance.

We’re inviting all audio lovers to join us and create the next-level audio product together. We believe the best sound should be shared, and hope UPstage360 will bring you an unforgettable audio experience.
story_txt:
Combining portability with audiophile-grade sound—UPstage360 has it all! UPstage360 upgrades you from sweet spots to a 360° sweet zone, projecting output evenly in an omnidirectional soundstage so you can hear the same Hi-Res audio from anywhere in the room.Unlike conventional speakers that deliver directional output, chaining listeners to a limited area of sweet spots, UPstage360 creates consistent, high-quality sound regardless of where you stand.It accomplishes this through a patented ball-cone reflection structure made of aluminum alloy. This creates optimized reflection curves that radiate consistent sound waves while avoiding interference with different frequency ranges. 



Click below to read comments by Audio Planet's audiophile guru, Michael Fremer!





UPstage360 is the smartest and best-performing speaker on the market, equipped with an exclusive 3-way integration of 8 drivers and tri-amplification.
It has a rigid structure and patented dispersion architecture, with each driver isolated in its own sealed chamber. This enhances sound output, allowing UPstage360 to maintain an ultra-wide frequency range of 40 Hz – 40 kHz and a max volume of 95 dB SPL. 
UPstage360 includes ultrasound frequencies up to 40 kHz, which enables it to fully reproduce every detailed note in Hi-Res recordings to bring you a dynamic, realistic audio experience.



Even at high frequencies, UPstage360 delivers even sound pressure. Its sound pressure levels (SPL) were tested with the latest Klippel Near Field Scanner (NFS), and the frequency response measured from different angles presented identical SPL responses.



Hear more. Feel more! To obtain the stunningly tight and authoritative bass of UPstage360, we use patented piston wave passive radiators made of natural rubber to maximize the efficiency of air and space in the cabinet, pushing a deep thumping bass of 40 Hz with two 3” woofers and four passive bass radiators.


Built with proprietary technologies, exclusive acoustic arrangement, and precise calibration, UPstage360 delivers harmonic and authentic tones.
It avoids frequency resonance to achieve a distortion-free sound experience with <0.02% THD (Total Harmonic Distortion), making the crossover at 150 Hz and 3 kHz to deliver flawless sound.


 
Think of UPstage360 as the audio equivalent of a hi-res photo, where each note is accurately reproduced. Imagine re-exploring every detail of your favorite music, whether it’s a delicate minuet or a raucous live concert.



UPstage360 uses a TWS (True Wireless Stereo) Bluetooth chip to automatically connect to your system and paired speakers auto-configure into left and right stereo channels for audiophile-grade fidelity. Since they are omnidirectional, they will give you an immersive sound wherever you put them. No more hassles with figuring out that perfect setup – you’ll be enjoying your wireless home theater in no time!

Even better: because it’s portable, your entertainment center can be anywhere. Walk around with it. Dance with it. Take the beat wherever you go.

UPstage360 enables internal docking with Echo Dot and ChromeCast, and is compatible with various streaming platforms including Tidal, Qobuz, Spotify, and Apple Music!



You can connect UPstage360 to any of your devices via lossless aptX Bluetooth, and adjust the volume from your device or from the UPstage360 speaker buttons. You also have the option to connect your UPstage360 to other systems via AUX-in.


UPstage360 has a sound therapy function that combines natural sounds with frequencies associated with peaceful moods. These specially blended mixes of a river, forest, crystal music, and mantra chanting create a tranquil ambiance to help you stay calm, focused, and relaxed for better sleep quality.


UPstage360 comes with a battery and charging cord: charge it while using it so you don’t miss a beat!



Soundmatters has 30 years of experience in acoustic design and micro-audiophile speaker technology – starting from its founder’s origins as a NASA engineer. We design popular acoustic products, including foxL, named a Top 10 Gadgets of the Year by Time Magazine, and the blockbuster-selling Jawbone Jambox.
We partnered with TB Speaker, the highly regarded speaker manufacturer, to ensure quality production. Working with these experienced and reliable partners enables UPstage360 to deliver the latest in electroacoustic technology.



Level 10 is a passionate team of audio enthusiasts with a vision to reinvent speaker design for today’s lifestyle, with tomorrow’s technologies. To make this possible, we work with Soundmatters, the leading innovator of ultra-compact acoustic designs, to complete the all-in-one solution: UPstage360, which integrates smart technology with the ultimate sound performance.
We’re inviting all audio lovers to join us and create the next-level audio product together. We believe the best sound should be shared, and hope UPstage360 will bring you an unforgettable audio experience.
